Ngesonto eledlule ngahambela umhlangano webhodi lokweluleka lesifunda Esikhungweni Sokuqeqeshela Izibalo Empumalanga ne-Afrika e-Tanzania, lapho ngaba nethuba lokuhambela umcimbi wokuthwesa kwemiyezane wama-39 obanjwa minyaka yonke, lapho kwakunabasebenzi bomnyango Wezibalo WaseNingizimu Afrika abahlanu ababebambe iqhaza.
Ngesonto eledlule ngaya emhlanganweni webhodi elelulekayo lesigodi le-East African Statistical Training Centre eTanzania, lapho ngathola khona ithuba lokuba khona emcimbini wokuthweswa kweziqu wama-39 waminyaka yonke walesi sikhungo, okwakukhona kuwo amalungu amahlanu ezisebenzi  ze-Stats SA ezazibambe iqhaza kuwo.  
Ngesonto eledlule ngethamela umhlangano webhodi labeluleki besifunda sesiZinda saseAfrika Esempumalanga sokuqeqesha ngokubala owawuse-Tanzania, lapho engathola ithuba lokuthi ngiyohlanganyela emcimbini wama-39 wesikhungo wokwethwesa iziqu, okwakuhlanganyele khona kuwo abasebenzi abahlanu beseNhlanganweni yaseNingizimu Afrika Yezokubala.
Ngesonto eledlule ngahambela umhlangano webhodi lokweluleka lesifunda Esikhungweni Sokuqeqeshela Izibalo Empumalanga ne-Afrika e-Tanzania, lapho ngaba nethuba lokuhambela umcimbi wokuthwesa kwemiyezane wama-39 obanjwa minyaka yonke, lapho kwakunabasebenzi bomnyango Wezibalo WaseNingizimu Afrika abahlanu ababebambe iqhaza.
Ngesonto eledlule ngaya emhlanganweni webhodi elelulekayo lesigodi le-East African Statistical Training Centre eTanzania, lapho ngathola khona ithuba lokuba khona emcimbini wokuthweswa kweziqu wama-39 waminyaka yonke walesi sikhungo, okwakukhona kuwo amalungu amahlanu ezisebenzi  ze-Stats SA ezazibambe iqhaza kuwo.  
Ngesonto eledlule ngethamela umhlangano wesifunda webhodi loluleko Lesizinda Soqeqesho Kwezezibalo seMpumalanga Afrika eTanzania, lapho engathola khona ithuba lokwethamela umcimbi wama-39 walesi sizinda waminyaka yonke wokwethulwa kweziqu zemfundo, lapho abasebenzi abahlanu Bezezimali eNingizimu Afrika babebambe iqhaza khona.
I-Stats SA inentshisekelo yokuqeqesha abasebenzi bayo.
IziBalo zase-SA ziyakushisekela ukuba abasebenzi bazo baqeqeshwe. 
Ukuqeqeshwa kwabasebenzi Bezezimali eNingizimu Afrika kungenxa kothando lwenhlangano. 
Ukuqeqeshwa kwabasebenzi beseNhlanganweni yaseNingizimu Afrika Yezokubala kuyinto esinentshisekelo enkulu ngayo kule nhlangano. 
IziBalo zase-SA ziyakushisekela ukuba abasebenzi bazo baqeqeshwe. 
Ukuqeqeshwa kwabasebenzi Bezezimali eNingizimu Afrika kungenxa kothando lwenhlangano. 
Ukuqeqeshwa kwabasebenzi beseNhlanganweni yaseNingizimu Afrika Yezokubala kuyinto esinentshisekelo enkulu ngayo kule nhlangano. 
I-Stats SA inentshisekelo yokuqeqesha abasebenzi bayo.
Ukuqeqeshwa kwabasebenzi Bezezimali eNingizimu Afrika kungenxa kothando lwenhlangano. 
Ukuqeqeshwa kwabasebenzi beseNhlanganweni yaseNingizimu Afrika Yezokubala kuyinto esinentshisekelo enkulu ngayo kule nhlangano. 
I-Stats SA inentshisekelo yokuqeqesha abasebenzi bayo.
IziBalo zase-SA ziyakushisekela ukuba abasebenzi bazo baqeqeshwe. 
Ukuqeqeshwa kwabasebenzi beseNhlanganweni yaseNingizimu Afrika Yezokubala kuyinto esinentshisekelo enkulu ngayo kule nhlangano. 
I-Stats SA inentshisekelo yokuqeqesha abasebenzi bayo.
IziBalo zase-SA ziyakushisekela ukuba abasebenzi bazo baqeqeshwe. 
Ukuqeqeshwa kwabasebenzi Bezezimali eNingizimu Afrika kungenxa kothando lwenhlangano. 
Emuva kwesikhashana ngiqokiwe njengombali-jikelele, i-Stats SA, ngokubambisana noMkhandlu Wezokubala, yaqalisa uhlelo lokuphuma inqina kuthungathwa izikhungo ezinezinhlelo ezifanele zokuqeqesha ngemininingwane engahluziwe esemthethweni.
Ngokushesha nje ngemva kokuba ngifakwe esikhundleni sokuba ngusozibalo-jikelele, iziBalo zase-SA, zibambisene noMkhandlu Wezibalo, saqalisa ukufunwa okuphuthumayo kwezinhlangano ezinikeza uqeqesho olufanele kwezemininingwane engokomthetho.
Emva kokuba ngisandakuqokelwa esikhundleni sikasozibalo jikelele Kwezezimali eNingizimu Afrika ngabambisana noMkhandlu Wezezibalo ekwethulweni uhlelo oluphuthumayo lokucinga lezi zikhungo ezihlinzeka ngoqeqesho mayelana nezifundo zedatha esemthethweni. 
Emveni kancane nje kokuba ngiqokwe njengosozibalo-jikelele, Inhlangano yaseNingizimu Afrika Kwezokubala, ngokubambisana noMkhandlu Wezibalo, waqala umkhankaso ophuthumayo wokuhlonza izikhungo ezinekhono lokuqeqesha ngezibalo ezisemthethweni.
Ngokushesha nje ngemva kokuba ngifakwe esikhundleni sokuba ngusozibalo-jikelele, iziBalo zase-SA, zibambisene noMkhandlu Wezibalo, saqalisa ukufunwa okuphuthumayo kwezinhlangano ezinikeza uqeqesho olufanele kwezemininingwane engokomthetho.
Emva kokuba ngisandakuqokelwa esikhundleni sikasozibalo jikelele Kwezezimali eNingizimu Afrika ngabambisana noMkhandlu Wezezibalo ekwethulweni uhlelo oluphuthumayo lokucinga lezi zikhungo ezihlinzeka ngoqeqesho mayelana nezifundo zedatha esemthethweni. 
Emveni kancane nje kokuba ngiqokwe njengosozibalo-jikelele, Inhlangano yaseNingizimu Afrika Kwezokubala, ngokubambisana noMkhandlu Wezibalo, waqala umkhankaso ophuthumayo wokuhlonza izikhungo ezinekhono lokuqeqesha ngezibalo ezisemthethweni.
Emuva kwesikhashana ngiqokiwe njengombali-jikelele, i-Stats SA, ngokubambisana noMkhandlu Wezokubala, yaqalisa uhlelo lokuphuma inqina kuthungathwa izikhungo ezinezinhlelo ezifanele zokuqeqesha ngemininingwane engahluziwe esemthethweni.
Emva kokuba ngisandakuqokelwa esikhundleni sikasozibalo jikelele Kwezezimali eNingizimu Afrika ngabambisana noMkhandlu Wezezibalo ekwethulweni uhlelo oluphuthumayo lokucinga lezi zikhungo ezihlinzeka ngoqeqesho mayelana nezifundo zedatha esemthethweni. 
Emveni kancane nje kokuba ngiqokwe njengosozibalo-jikelele, Inhlangano yaseNingizimu Afrika Kwezokubala, ngokubambisana noMkhandlu Wezibalo, waqala umkhankaso ophuthumayo wokuhlonza izikhungo ezinekhono lokuqeqesha ngezibalo ezisemthethweni.
Emuva kwesikhashana ngiqokiwe njengombali-jikelele, i-Stats SA, ngokubambisana noMkhandlu Wezokubala, yaqalisa uhlelo lokuphuma inqina kuthungathwa izikhungo ezinezinhlelo ezifanele zokuqeqesha ngemininingwane engahluziwe esemthethweni.
Ngokushesha nje ngemva kokuba ngifakwe esikhundleni sokuba ngusozibalo-jikelele, iziBalo zase-SA, zibambisene noMkhandlu Wezibalo, saqalisa ukufunwa okuphuthumayo kwezinhlangano ezinikeza uqeqesho olufanele kwezemininingwane engokomthetho.
Emveni kancane nje kokuba ngiqokwe njengosozibalo-jikelele, Inhlangano yaseNingizimu Afrika Kwezokubala, ngokubambisana noMkhandlu Wezibalo, waqala umkhankaso ophuthumayo wokuhlonza izikhungo ezinekhono lokuqeqesha ngezibalo ezisemthethweni.
Emuva kwesikhashana ngiqokiwe njengombali-jikelele, i-Stats SA, ngokubambisana noMkhandlu Wezokubala, yaqalisa uhlelo lokuphuma inqina kuthungathwa izikhungo ezinezinhlelo ezifanele zokuqeqesha ngemininingwane engahluziwe esemthethweni.
Ngokushesha nje ngemva kokuba ngifakwe esikhundleni sokuba ngusozibalo-jikelele, iziBalo zase-SA, zibambisene noMkhandlu Wezibalo, saqalisa ukufunwa okuphuthumayo kwezinhlangano ezinikeza uqeqesho olufanele kwezemininingwane engokomthetho.
Emva kokuba ngisandakuqokelwa esikhundleni sikasozibalo jikelele Kwezezimali eNingizimu Afrika ngabambisana noMkhandlu Wezezibalo ekwethulweni uhlelo oluphuthumayo lokucinga lezi zikhungo ezihlinzeka ngoqeqesho mayelana nezifundo zedatha esemthethweni. 
Sahlonza izikhungo ezimbili: isikhungo sokuqeqesha esise-Dar es Salaam, e-Tanzania, kanye neSikhungo Sezezibalo Nokusebenza Kwezomnotho esise-Uganda.
Sathola izinhlangano ezimbili: isikhungo sokuqeqesha eDar es Salaam, eTanzania, kanye ne-Institute of Statistics and Applied Economics e-Uganda.
Sahlonza izikhungo ezimbili: isizinda soqeqesho esiseDar es Salaam, eTanzania, Nesikhungo Sezokubala Nokusebenza Kwezomnotho e-Uganda.
Sazithola zambili izikhungo: isizinda sokuqeqesha e-Dar es Salaam, e-Tanzania, kanye neSikhungo sase-Uganda Sezibalo Nezomnotho Ezisebenzisekayo.
Sathola izinhlangano ezimbili: isikhungo sokuqeqesha eDar es Salaam, eTanzania, kanye ne-Institute of Statistics and Applied Economics e-Uganda.
Sahlonza izikhungo ezimbili: isizinda soqeqesho esiseDar es Salaam, eTanzania, Nesikhungo Sezokubala Nokusebenza Kwezomnotho e-Uganda.
Sazithola zambili izikhungo: isizinda sokuqeqesha e-Dar es Salaam, e-Tanzania, kanye neSikhungo sase-Uganda Sezibalo Nezomnotho Ezisebenzisekayo.
Sahlonza izikhungo ezimbili: isikhungo sokuqeqesha esise-Dar es Salaam, e-Tanzania, kanye neSikhungo Sezezibalo Nokusebenza Kwezomnotho esise-Uganda.
Sahlonza izikhungo ezimbili: isizinda soqeqesho esiseDar es Salaam, eTanzania, Nesikhungo Sezokubala Nokusebenza Kwezomnotho e-Uganda.
Sazithola zambili izikhungo: isizinda sokuqeqesha e-Dar es Salaam, e-Tanzania, kanye neSikhungo sase-Uganda Sezibalo Nezomnotho Ezisebenzisekayo.
Sahlonza izikhungo ezimbili: isikhungo sokuqeqesha esise-Dar es Salaam, e-Tanzania, kanye neSikhungo Sezezibalo Nokusebenza Kwezomnotho esise-Uganda.
Sathola izinhlangano ezimbili: isikhungo sokuqeqesha eDar es Salaam, eTanzania, kanye ne-Institute of Statistics and Applied Economics e-Uganda.
Sazithola zambili izikhungo: isizinda sokuqeqesha e-Dar es Salaam, e-Tanzania, kanye neSikhungo sase-Uganda Sezibalo Nezomnotho Ezisebenzisekayo.
Sahlonza izikhungo ezimbili: isikhungo sokuqeqesha esise-Dar es Salaam, e-Tanzania, kanye neSikhungo Sezezibalo Nokusebenza Kwezomnotho esise-Uganda.
Sathola izinhlangano ezimbili: isikhungo sokuqeqesha eDar es Salaam, eTanzania, kanye ne-Institute of Statistics and Applied Economics e-Uganda.
Sahlonza izikhungo ezimbili: isizinda soqeqesho esiseDar es Salaam, eTanzania, Nesikhungo Sezokubala Nokusebenza Kwezomnotho e-Uganda.
Isikhungo sokuqeqesha sasungulwa ngowe-1965 iKhomishane Yezomnotho Yase-Afrika ye-UN, nenhlangano i-Eastern African Common Services naboHlelo Lwezentuthuko lwe-UN.
Isikhungo sokuqeqesha samiswa ngo-1965 yiKhomishane Yezomnotho Yase-Afrika ye-UN, iNhlangano Yamasevisi Afanayo EMpumalanga Afrika kanye noHlelo Lwentuthuko Lwe-UN.
Lesi sizinda sasungulwa ngonyaka we-1965 yiKhomishane Yezomnotho ye-UN, neNhlangano Yamasevisi Okwabelana eMpumalanga Afrika kanye Nohlelo Lwezentuthuko Lwe-UN.
Isizinda sokuqeqesha sasungulwa ngowe-1965 sisungulwa ikhomishani ye-UN yezomnotho wase-Afrika , iNhlangano YaseMpumalanga Afrika Yokubambisana Kumisebenzi kanye ne-Nohlelo lwe-UN Lwentuthuko.
Isikhungo sokuqeqesha samiswa ngo-1965 yiKhomishane Yezomnotho Yase-Afrika ye-UN, iNhlangano Yamasevisi Afanayo EMpumalanga Afrika kanye noHlelo Lwentuthuko Lwe-UN.
Lesi sizinda sasungulwa ngonyaka we-1965 yiKhomishane Yezomnotho ye-UN, neNhlangano Yamasevisi Okwabelana eMpumalanga Afrika kanye Nohlelo Lwezentuthuko Lwe-UN.
Isizinda sokuqeqesha sasungulwa ngowe-1965 sisungulwa ikhomishani ye-UN yezomnotho wase-Afrika , iNhlangano YaseMpumalanga Afrika Yokubambisana Kumisebenzi kanye ne-Nohlelo lwe-UN Lwentuthuko.
Isikhungo sokuqeqesha sasungulwa ngowe-1965 iKhomishane Yezomnotho Yase-Afrika ye-UN, nenhlangano i-Eastern African Common Services naboHlelo Lwezentuthuko lwe-UN.
Lesi sizinda sasungulwa ngonyaka we-1965 yiKhomishane Yezomnotho ye-UN, neNhlangano Yamasevisi Okwabelana eMpumalanga Afrika kanye Nohlelo Lwezentuthuko Lwe-UN.
Isizinda sokuqeqesha sasungulwa ngowe-1965 sisungulwa ikhomishani ye-UN yezomnotho wase-Afrika , iNhlangano YaseMpumalanga Afrika Yokubambisana Kumisebenzi kanye ne-Nohlelo lwe-UN Lwentuthuko.
Isikhungo sokuqeqesha sasungulwa ngowe-1965 iKhomishane Yezomnotho Yase-Afrika ye-UN, nenhlangano i-Eastern African Common Services naboHlelo Lwezentuthuko lwe-UN.
Isikhungo sokuqeqesha samiswa ngo-1965 yiKhomishane Yezomnotho Yase-Afrika ye-UN, iNhlangano Yamasevisi Afanayo EMpumalanga Afrika kanye noHlelo Lwentuthuko Lwe-UN.
Isizinda sokuqeqesha sasungulwa ngowe-1965 sisungulwa ikhomishani ye-UN yezomnotho wase-Afrika , iNhlangano YaseMpumalanga Afrika Yokubambisana Kumisebenzi kanye ne-Nohlelo lwe-UN Lwentuthuko.
Isikhungo sokuqeqesha sasungulwa ngowe-1965 iKhomishane Yezomnotho Yase-Afrika ye-UN, nenhlangano i-Eastern African Common Services naboHlelo Lwezentuthuko lwe-UN.
Isikhungo sokuqeqesha samiswa ngo-1965 yiKhomishane Yezomnotho Yase-Afrika ye-UN, iNhlangano Yamasevisi Afanayo EMpumalanga Afrika kanye noHlelo Lwentuthuko Lwe-UN.
Lesi sizinda sasungulwa ngonyaka we-1965 yiKhomishane Yezomnotho ye-UN, neNhlangano Yamasevisi Okwabelana eMpumalanga Afrika kanye Nohlelo Lwezentuthuko Lwe-UN.
Ngowe-1977, isikhungo sasesiphethwe uhulumeni wase-Tanzania, futhi wangezela isibalo samazwe ase-Afrika esasiwahlinzekela safinyelela ku-13. 
Ngo-1977, uhulumeni waseTanzania wawusuthathe ukulawulwa kwalesi sikhungo, futhi wandisa inani lamazwe ase-Afrika esiwasizayo laba ngu-13.
Ngonyaka we-1977, uhulumeni waseTanzania wathatha ulawulo lwalesi sizinda, wenyusa inani lamazwe ase-Afrika asizwa yilesi sizinda laba yi-13.
Kwathi kufika owe-1977, uhulumeni wase-Tanzania wabe esewathathile amatomu okwengamela lesi sizinda, wanweba ukusebenza kwaso kwaze kwafinyelela kumazwe ase-Afrika ali-13.
Ngo-1977, uhulumeni waseTanzania wawusuthathe ukulawulwa kwalesi sikhungo, futhi wandisa inani lamazwe ase-Afrika esiwasizayo laba ngu-13.
Ngonyaka we-1977, uhulumeni waseTanzania wathatha ulawulo lwalesi sizinda, wenyusa inani lamazwe ase-Afrika asizwa yilesi sizinda laba yi-13.
Kwathi kufika owe-1977, uhulumeni wase-Tanzania wabe esewathathile amatomu okwengamela lesi sizinda, wanweba ukusebenza kwaso kwaze kwafinyelela kumazwe ase-Afrika ali-13.
Ngowe-1977, isikhungo sasesiphethwe uhulumeni wase-Tanzania, futhi wangezela isibalo samazwe ase-Afrika esasiwahlinzekela safinyelela ku-13. 
Ngonyaka we-1977, uhulumeni waseTanzania wathatha ulawulo lwalesi sizinda, wenyusa inani lamazwe ase-Afrika asizwa yilesi sizinda laba yi-13.
Kwathi kufika owe-1977, uhulumeni wase-Tanzania wabe esewathathile amatomu okwengamela lesi sizinda, wanweba ukusebenza kwaso kwaze kwafinyelela kumazwe ase-Afrika ali-13.
Ngowe-1977, isikhungo sasesiphethwe uhulumeni wase-Tanzania, futhi wangezela isibalo samazwe ase-Afrika esasiwahlinzekela safinyelela ku-13. 
Ngo-1977, uhulumeni waseTanzania wawusuthathe ukulawulwa kwalesi sikhungo, futhi wandisa inani lamazwe ase-Afrika esiwasizayo laba ngu-13.
Kwathi kufika owe-1977, uhulumeni wase-Tanzania wabe esewathathile amatomu okwengamela lesi sizinda, wanweba ukusebenza kwaso kwaze kwafinyelela kumazwe ase-Afrika ali-13.
Ngowe-1977, isikhungo sasesiphethwe uhulumeni wase-Tanzania, futhi wangezela isibalo samazwe ase-Afrika esasiwahlinzekela safinyelela ku-13. 
Ngo-1977, uhulumeni waseTanzania wawusuthathe ukulawulwa kwalesi sikhungo, futhi wandisa inani lamazwe ase-Afrika esiwasizayo laba ngu-13.
Ngonyaka we-1977, uhulumeni waseTanzania wathatha ulawulo lwalesi sizinda, wenyusa inani lamazwe ase-Afrika asizwa yilesi sizinda laba yi-13.
Isikhungo esise-Uganda samiswa ngowe-1969, ngaphansi ngohlaka lwezomthetho lweNyuvesi i-Makerere.
Isikhungo sase-Uganda samiswa ngo-1969, ngaphakathi kohlaka olungokomthetho lweNyuvesi yaseMakerere. 
Isikhungo sase-Uganda sasungulwa ngonyaka we-1969, ngaphakathi kohlaka lwezomthetho lwe-Makerere University. 
Isikhungo esise-Uganda sona samiswa ngowe-1969, ngaphansi kwesisekelo sohlaka lwezomthetho saseNyuvesi yase-Makerere. 
Isikhungo sase-Uganda samiswa ngo-1969, ngaphakathi kohlaka olungokomthetho lweNyuvesi yaseMakerere. 
Isikhungo sase-Uganda sasungulwa ngonyaka we-1969, ngaphakathi kohlaka lwezomthetho lwe-Makerere University. 
Isikhungo esise-Uganda sona samiswa ngowe-1969, ngaphansi kwesisekelo sohlaka lwezomthetho saseNyuvesi yase-Makerere. 
Isikhungo esise-Uganda samiswa ngowe-1969, ngaphansi ngohlaka lwezomthetho lweNyuvesi i-Makerere.
Isikhungo sase-Uganda sasungulwa ngonyaka we-1969, ngaphakathi kohlaka lwezomthetho lwe-Makerere University. 
Isikhungo esise-Uganda sona samiswa ngowe-1969, ngaphansi kwesisekelo sohlaka lwezomthetho saseNyuvesi yase-Makerere. 
Isikhungo esise-Uganda samiswa ngowe-1969, ngaphansi ngohlaka lwezomthetho lweNyuvesi i-Makerere.

Isikhungo esise-Uganda sona samiswa ngowe-1969, ngaphansi kwesisekelo sohlaka lwezomthetho saseNyuvesi yase-Makerere. 
Isikhungo esise-Uganda samiswa ngowe-1969, ngaphansi ngohlaka lwezomthetho lweNyuvesi i-Makerere.
Isikhungo sase-Uganda samiswa ngo-1969, ngaphakathi kohlaka olungokomthetho lweNyuvesi yaseMakerere. 
Isikhungo sase-Uganda sasungulwa ngonyaka we-1969, ngaphakathi kohlaka lwezomthetho lwe-Makerere University. 
Impokophelo yayo eyayisobala kwakuwuhlelo lokuqeqesha olusezingeni elicokeme kwezochwepheshe bezokubala kanye nokusebenza kwezomnotho.
Injongo yayo emenyezelwe yayiwukuqeqeshwa kwezinga eliphezulu kochwepheshe kwezezibalo nokusebenza kwezomnotho.
Inhloso yayo kwakungukuhlinzeka ngoqeqesho lwezinga eliphezulu longoti emkhakheni Wezezibalo Nokusebenza Kwezomnotho.
Inhloso esayiveza kwaba ukuqeqeshwa kochwepheshe okusezingeni eliphakeme kuzibalo nezomnotho ezisebenzisekayo.

Selokhu labuya, likhombise ukuthuthuka okukhulu ekuqhutshweni kwemisebenzi, njengoba abanye babo sebenyukele ezikhundleni zokuphatha.
Selokhu labuya, liye labonisa intuthuko enkulu endleleni elenza ngayo izinto, abanye balo manje sebesezikhundleni zokuphatha.
Selokhu babuya, bakhombisa ukuthuthuka okukhulu ekwenzeni umsebenzi wabo, nalapho abanye babo sebekhushulelwe ezikhundleni zokuphatha manje.
Ekubuyeni kwabo, baveza ukuphucuka okukhulu ekusebenzeni kwabo, kanti abanye babo sebeqhwakele ezikhundleni zokuphatha.

Isidingo solwazi lwezokubala oluqondene nokuthathwa kwezinqumo, ezinhlakeni zozintathu zikahulumeni, sesikhuphuke kakhulu.
Isidingo solwazi lwezibalo ukuze kwenziwe izinqumo, kuzo zonke zontathu izigaba zikahulumeni, siye sanda kakhulu. 
Isidingo solwazi lwezezibalo senyuke kakhulu mayelana nokuthathwa kwezinqumo, kuwo wonke amazinga amathathu kahulumeni.
Isidingo semininingwane eyizibalo okuhambisana nokuthathwa kwezinqumo, kuwona omathathu amazinga kahulumeni, sinyukile kakhulu.

Ikakhulukazi, sekunesidingo esikhulu sabantu abaqeqeshelwe ukuqoqa nokusebenzisa ulwazi lwezibalo emazingeni omasipala.
Ikakhulukazi, abantu abaqeqeshwe ekuhlanganiseni nasekusebenziseni ulwazi lwezibalo ezingeni likamasipala baya bedingeka kakhulu.
Ikakhulukazi, abantu abaqeqeshelwe ukuqoqwa nokusetshenziswa kolwazi lwezezibalo emazingeni omasipala baya ngokubaluleka. 
Ikakhulukazi, kubucayi kakhulu ukuthi kube nabantu abaqeqeshelwe ukuqoqa nokusebenzisa imininingwane eyizibalo emazingeni kamasipala.

Ukuze sanelise lesi sidingo, kuzodingeka ukuthi siqeqeshe abantu ezingeni okungenani labantu abangu 2 000 ngonyaka. 
Ukuze sigcwalise lesi sidingo, kuzodingeka siqeqeshe abantu ngezinga okungenani labangu-2 000 ngonyaka. 
Ukuze kuxazululeke lesi sidingo, kuzomele ukuba siqeqeshe abantu okungenani abayizi-2000 ngonyaka.
Ukwenelisa lesi sidingo, sizodinga ukuqeqesha okungenani abantu abazi-2 000 ngonyaka. 
Ukuze sigcwalise lesi sidingo, kuzodingeka siqeqeshe abantu ngezinga okungenani labangu-2 000 ngonyaka. 
Ukuze kuxazululeke lesi sidingo, kuzomele ukuba siqeqeshe abantu okungenani abayizi-2000 ngonyaka.
Ukwenelisa lesi sidingo, sizodinga ukuqeqesha okungenani abantu abazi-2 000 ngonyaka. 
Ukuze sanelise lesi sidingo, kuzodingeka ukuthi siqeqeshe abantu ezingeni okungenani labantu abangu 2 000 ngonyaka. 
Ukuze kuxazululeke lesi sidingo, kuzomele ukuba siqeqeshe abantu okungenani abayizi-2000 ngonyaka.
Ukwenelisa lesi sidingo, sizodinga ukuqeqesha okungenani abantu abazi-2 000 ngonyaka.

Ukuze sigcwalise lesi sidingo, kuzodingeka siqeqeshe abantu ngezinga okungenani labangu-2 000 ngonyaka. 
Ukwenelisa lesi sidingo, sizodinga ukuqeqesha okungenani abantu abazi-2 000 ngonyaka. 
Ukuze sanelise lesi sidingo, kuzodingeka ukuthi siqeqeshe abantu ezingeni okungenani labantu abangu 2 000 ngonyaka.

Isikhungo sokuqeqesha sase-Tanzania kanye neSikhungo Sezezibalo Nokusebenza Kwezomnotho esise-Uganda ngeke zikwazi nhlobo ukumelana nesibalo sabantu esikhulu kangaka.
Isikhungo sokuqeqesha saseTanzania kanye nesiKhungo Sase-Uganda Sezibalo Nokusebenza Komnotho cishe azinakukwazi ukubhekana nalesi sidingo esikhulu kangaka.
Isizinda soqeqesho saseTanzania kanye Nesikhungo Sezezibalo Nokusebenza Kwezomnotho e-Uganda ngeke sikwazi ukubhekana nomthwalo ongaka.
Isizinda sokuqeqesha sase-Tanzania kanjalo neSikhungo sase-Uganda Sezibalo Nezomnotho Ezisebenzisekayo ngeke zakwazi ukumelana nalesi sidingo esiphezulu.
Isikhungo sokuqeqesha saseTanzania kanye nesiKhungo Sase-Uganda Sezibalo Nokusebenza Komnotho cishe azinakukwazi ukubhekana nalesi sidingo esikhulu kangaka.
Isizinda soqeqesho saseTanzania kanye Nesikhungo Sezezibalo Nokusebenza Kwezomnotho e-Uganda ngeke sikwazi ukubhekana nomthwalo ongaka.

Isizinda sokuqeqesha sase-Tanzania kanjalo neSikhungo sase-Uganda Sezibalo Nezomnotho Ezisebenzisekayo ngeke zakwazi ukumelana nalesi sidingo esiphezulu.
Isikhungo sokuqeqesha sase-Tanzania kanye neSikhungo Sezezibalo Nokusebenza Kwezomnotho esise-Uganda ngeke zikwazi nhlobo ukumelana nesibalo sabantu esikhulu kangaka.
Isikhungo sokuqeqesha saseTanzania kanye nesiKhungo Sase-Uganda Sezibalo Nokusebenza Komnotho cishe azinakukwazi ukubhekana nalesi sidingo esikhulu kangaka.
Isizinda soqeqesho saseTanzania kanye Nesikhungo Sezezibalo Nokusebenza Kwezomnotho e-Uganda ngeke sikwazi ukubhekana nomthwalo ongaka.
Ngenkathi kuvulwa ingqungquthela yeNhlangano Yezokubala eNingizimu Afrika ngonyaka odlule, ungqongqoshe wezimali uTrevor Manuel waphosela amanyuvesi aseNingizimu Afrika inselele yokubhekana nokusilela kokutholakala kwamakhono ezibalo angasiza uhulumeni ukuze athathe izinqumo enolwazi olususelwe emininingwaneni yezibalo efanele.
Lapho evula ingqungquthela yeNhlangano Yezibalo Yase-SA ngonyaka odlule, ungqongqoshe wezimali uTrevor Manuel wafakela inselele amanyuvesi aseNingizimu Afrika ukuba axazulule ukusilela kwamakhono ezezibalo atholakalayo ukuze kusizwe uhulumeni ekwenzeni izinqumo ezibonisa ulwazi ngokusekelwe olwazini olunembile lwezibalo.  
Ngesikhathi uNgqongqoshe Wezezimali uTrevor Manuel evula inkomfa yeNhlangano Yezezibalo YaseNingizimu Afrika ngonyaka odlule wacela inselelo amanyuvesi aseNingizimu Afrika ukuba alungise isimo sokwesweleka kwamakhono akhona kwezezibalo ngenhloso yokusiza uhulumeni ekuthatheni izinqumo ezisekelwe olwazini lwezezibalo.
Evula inkomfa Yenhlangano Yezibalo ngonyaka odlule, ungqongqoshe wezezimali u-Trevor Manuel waphonsa inselelo kumanyuvesi aseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi abhekele ukushoda kwamakhono kwezezibalo ukuze loko kusize uhulumeni ekuthatheni izinqumo ezasisekile ezesekwe kulwazi olushaya khona ngokwezibalo.
Lapho evula ingqungquthela yeNhlangano Yezibalo Yase-SA ngonyaka odlule, ungqongqoshe wezimali uTrevor Manuel wafakela inselele amanyuvesi aseNingizimu Afrika ukuba axazulule ukusilela kwamakhono ezezibalo atholakalayo ukuze kusizwe uhulumeni ekwenzeni izinqumo ezibonisa ulwazi ngokusekelwe olwazini olunembile lwezibalo.  
Ngesikhathi uNgqongqoshe Wezezimali uTrevor Manuel evula inkomfa yeNhlangano Yezezibalo YaseNingizimu Afrika ngonyaka odlule wacela inselelo amanyuvesi aseNingizimu Afrika ukuba alungise isimo sokwesweleka kwamakhono akhona kwezezibalo ngenhloso yokusiza uhulumeni ekuthatheni izinqumo ezisekelwe olwazini lwezezibalo.
Evula inkomfa Yenhlangano Yezibalo ngonyaka odlule, ungqongqoshe wezezimali u-Trevor Manuel waphonsa inselelo kumanyuvesi aseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi abhekele ukushoda kwamakhono kwezezibalo ukuze loko kusize uhulumeni ekuthatheni izinqumo ezasisekile ezesekwe kulwazi olushaya khona ngokwezibalo.
Ngenkathi kuvulwa ingqungquthela yeNhlangano Yezokubala eNingizimu Afrika ngonyaka odlule, ungqongqoshe wezimali uTrevor Manuel waphosela amanyuvesi aseNingizimu Afrika inselele yokubhekana nokusilela kokutholakala kwamakhono ezibalo angasiza uhulumeni ukuze athathe izinqumo enolwazi olususelwe emininingwaneni yezibalo efanele.
Ngesikhathi uNgqongqoshe Wezezimali uTrevor Manuel evula inkomfa yeNhlangano Yezezibalo YaseNingizimu Afrika ngonyaka odlule wacela inselelo amanyuvesi aseNingizimu Afrika ukuba alungise isimo sokwesweleka kwamakhono akhona kwezezibalo ngenhloso yokusiza uhulumeni ekuthatheni izinqumo ezisekelwe olwazini lwezezibalo.

Ngenkathi kuvulwa ingqungquthela yeNhlangano Yezokubala eNingizimu Afrika ngonyaka odlule, ungqongqoshe wezimali uTrevor Manuel waphosela amanyuvesi aseNingizimu Afrika inselele yokubhekana nokusilela kokutholakala kwamakhono ezibalo angasiza uhulumeni ukuze athathe izinqumo enolwazi olususelwe emininingwaneni yezibalo efanele.
Lapho evula ingqungquthela yeNhlangano Yezibalo Yase-SA ngonyaka odlule, ungqongqoshe wezimali uTrevor Manuel wafakela inselele amanyuvesi aseNingizimu Afrika ukuba axazulule ukusilela kwamakhono ezezibalo atholakalayo ukuze kusizwe uhulumeni ekwenzeni izinqumo ezibonisa ulwazi ngokusekelwe olwazini olunembile lwezibalo.

Lapho evula ingqungquthela yeNhlangano Yezibalo Yase-SA ngonyaka odlule, ungqongqoshe wezimali uTrevor Manuel wafakela inselele amanyuvesi aseNingizimu Afrika ukuba axazulule ukusilela kwamakhono ezezibalo atholakalayo ukuze kusizwe uhulumeni ekwenzeni izinqumo ezibonisa ulwazi ngokusekelwe olwazini olunembile lwezibalo.  
Ngesikhathi uNgqongqoshe Wezezimali uTrevor Manuel evula inkomfa yeNhlangano Yezezibalo YaseNingizimu Afrika ngonyaka odlule wacela inselelo amanyuvesi aseNingizimu Afrika ukuba alungise isimo sokwesweleka kwamakhono akhona kwezezibalo ngenhloso yokusiza uhulumeni ekuthatheni izinqumo ezisekelwe olwazini lwezezibalo.
I-Stats SA yaqala ukuxoxisana namanyuvesi ngenhloso yokwethula lokhu kuqeqesha.
IziBalo zase-SA ziqalise izingxoxo namanyuvesi  ngenjongo yokwethula uqeqesho olunjalo. 
Ezezibalo eNingizimu Afrika seziqale izingxoxo namanyuvesi ngenhloso yokuqalisa ngalolu qeqesho. 
Inhlangano yaseNingizimu Afrika Kwezokubala useqale izingxoxo namanyuvesi ngenhloso yokuthi kuqalwe ukuqeqeshwa okunjalo. 
IziBalo zase-SA ziqalise izingxoxo namanyuvesi  ngenjongo yokwethula uqeqesho olunjalo. 
Ezezibalo eNingizimu Afrika seziqale izingxoxo namanyuvesi ngenhloso yokuqalisa ngalolu qeqesho. 
Inhlangano yaseNingizimu Afrika Kwezokubala useqale izingxoxo namanyuvesi ngenhloso yokuthi kuqalwe ukuqeqeshwa okunjalo. 
I-Stats SA yaqala ukuxoxisana namanyuvesi ngenhloso yokwethula lokhu kuqeqesha.

I-Stats SA yaqala ukuxoxisana namanyuvesi ngenhloso yokwethula lokhu kuqeqesha.
IziBalo zase-SA ziqalise izingxoxo namanyuvesi  ngenjongo yokwethula uqeqesho olunjalo. 
Ezezibalo eNingizimu Afrika seziqale izingxoxo namanyuvesi ngenhloso yokuqalisa ngalolu qeqesho. 
Nokho, njengamanje ayikho inyuvesi enezifundo zokuqeqeshela esezibalo zikahulumeni eNingizimu Afrika. 
Nokho, okwamanje ayikho emanyuvesi aseNingizimu Afrika ehlinzeka izifundo zezibalo ezisemthethweni.
Nakuba kunjalo, ayikho inyuvesi eNingizimu Afrika ehlinzeka ngesifundo sezezibalo ezisemthethweni.
Yize kunjalo, okwamanje ayikabi khona inyuvesi yaseNigizimu Afrika eyethula izifundo ezisemthethweni kumkhakha wezokubala.
Nokho, okwamanje ayikho emanyuvesi aseNingizimu Afrika ehlinzeka izifundo zezibalo ezisemthethweni.
Nakuba kunjalo, ayikho inyuvesi eNingizimu Afrika ehlinzeka ngesifundo sezezibalo ezisemthethweni.
Yize kunjalo, okwamanje ayikabi khona inyuvesi yaseNigizimu Afrika eyethula izifundo ezisemthethweni kumkhakha wezokubala.

Yize kunjalo, okwamanje ayikabi khona inyuvesi yaseNigizimu Afrika eyethula izifundo ezisemthethweni kumkhakha wezokubala.
Nokho, njengamanje ayikho inyuvesi enezifundo zokuqeqeshela esezibalo zikahulumeni eNingizimu Afrika. 
Nokho, okwamanje ayikho emanyuvesi aseNingizimu Afrika ehlinzeka izifundo zezibalo ezisemthethweni.
Nakuba kunjalo, ayikho inyuvesi eNingizimu Afrika ehlinzeka ngesifundo sezezibalo ezisemthethweni.
I-Stats SA ihlela ukusungula isikhungo sokuqeqesha ngezibalo esikhathini esingatheni esizayo, lapho kuzoqeqeshwa abasebenzi bangaphakathi kanye nabasebenzi bakweminye iminyango ngezibalo zikahulumeni.
IziBalo zase-SA zihlela ukumisa inhlangano yokuqeqesha kwezezibalo esikhathini esizayo esiseduze, ehlinzeka uqeqesho kwezezibalo ezisemthethweni kwakho kokubili abasebenzi bazo bangaphakathi kanye nabasebenzi abavela kweminye iminyango.
Ezezibalo eNingizimu Afrika zihlela ukusungula isikhungo soqeqesho kwezezibalo esikhathini esizayo, esizohlinzeka ngoqeqesho lwezezibalo ezisemthethweni maqondana nabasebenzi bangaphakathi kanye nabasebenzi beminye iminyango.
Inhlangano yaseNingizimu Afrika Kwezokubala ufuna ukusungula isikhungo sokuqeqesha kwezokubala maduze, ukuze kuqeqeshwe abasebenzi bangaphakathi nabakweminye iminyango kwezokubala ezisemthethweni.
IziBalo zase-SA zihlela ukumisa inhlangano yokuqeqesha kwezezibalo esikhathini esizayo esiseduze, ehlinzeka uqeqesho kwezezibalo ezisemthethweni kwakho kokubili abasebenzi bazo bangaphakathi kanye nabasebenzi abavela kweminye iminyango.
Ezezibalo eNingizimu Afrika zihlela ukusungula isikhungo soqeqesho kwezezibalo esikhathini esizayo, esizohlinzeka ngoqeqesho lwezezibalo ezisemthethweni maqondana nabasebenzi bangaphakathi kanye nabasebenzi beminye iminyango.

I-Stats SA ihlela ukusungula isikhungo sokuqeqesha ngezibalo esikhathini esingatheni esizayo, lapho kuzoqeqeshwa abasebenzi bangaphakathi kanye nabasebenzi bakweminye iminyango ngezibalo zikahulumeni.
IziBalo zase-SA zihlela ukumisa inhlangano yokuqeqesha kwezezibalo esikhathini esizayo esiseduze, ehlinzeka uqeqesho kwezezibalo ezisemthethweni kwakho kokubili abasebenzi bazo bangaphakathi kanye nabasebenzi abavela kweminye iminyango.
Inhlangano yaseNingizimu Afrika Kwezokubala ufuna ukusungula isikhungo sokuqeqesha kwezokubala maduze, ukuze kuqeqeshwe abasebenzi bangaphakathi nabakweminye iminyango kwezokubala ezisemthethweni.
I-Stats SA ihlela ukusungula isikhungo sokuqeqesha ngezibalo esikhathini esingatheni esizayo, lapho kuzoqeqeshwa abasebenzi bangaphakathi kanye nabasebenzi bakweminye iminyango ngezibalo zikahulumeni.
IziBalo zase-SA zihlela ukumisa inhlangano yokuqeqesha kwezezibalo esikhathini esizayo esiseduze, ehlinzeka uqeqesho kwezezibalo ezisemthethweni kwakho kokubili abasebenzi bazo bangaphakathi kanye nabasebenzi abavela kweminye iminyango.
Ezezibalo eNingizimu Afrika zihlela ukusungula isikhungo soqeqesho kwezezibalo esikhathini esizayo, esizohlinzeka ngoqeqesho lwezezibalo ezisemthethweni maqondana nabasebenzi bangaphakathi kanye nabasebenzi beminye iminyango.
Ukukhishwa kohlelo lwezibalo kuzwelonke kuzoholela esidingweni sokusungula amaphiko ezokubala eminyangweni kahulumeni ehlukahlukene, okuzokwenza kube nesidingo esikhulu sabasebenzi abanamakhono kwezokubala.
Ukuqalwa kwesimiso sezibalo zikazwelonke kuzoholela ekubeni khona kwesidingo sokumiswa kwezimpiko zezibalo eminyangweni ehlukahlukene kahulumeni, okudala nesidingo esikhulu nakakhulu sabasebenzi bezezibalo abanamakhono.
Uhlelo lokuhlola lwezezibalo kuzwelonke luzokwenza ukuthi kube nesidingo sokusungula amayunithi ezezibalo eminyangweni kahulumeni ehlukahlukene, okuzokwenza ukuthi isidingo sibe sikhulu sabantu abaqeqeshiwe mayelana namakhono ezezibalo.
Ukusabalaliswa kohlelo lwezokubala kuzwelonke kuzoba nemiphumela yokuthi kudingakale amahhovisi ezibalo eminyangweni kahulumeni eyehlukahlukene, loko okuzophehla isidingo sokuthi kukhule umthamo wamakhono kwezokubala.
Ukuqalwa kwesimiso sezibalo zikazwelonke kuzoholela ekubeni khona kwesidingo sokumiswa kwezimpiko zezibalo eminyangweni ehlukahlukene kahulumeni, okudala nesidingo esikhulu nakakhulu sabasebenzi bezezibalo abanamakhono.
Uhlelo lokuhlola lwezezibalo kuzwelonke luzokwenza ukuthi kube nesidingo sokusungula amayunithi ezezibalo eminyangweni kahulumeni ehlukahlukene, okuzokwenza ukuthi isidingo sibe sikhulu sabantu abaqeqeshiwe mayelana namakhono ezezibalo.
Ukusabalaliswa kohlelo lwezokubala kuzwelonke kuzoba nemiphumela yokuthi kudingakale amahhovisi ezibalo eminyangweni kahulumeni eyehlukahlukene, loko okuzophehla isidingo sokuthi kukhule umthamo wamakhono kwezokubala.
Ukukhishwa kohlelo lwezibalo kuzwelonke kuzoholela esidingweni sokusungula amaphiko ezokubala eminyangweni kahulumeni ehlukahlukene, okuzokwenza kube nesidingo esikhulu sabasebenzi abanamakhono kwezokubala.
Uhlelo lokuhlola lwezezibalo kuzwelonke luzokwenza ukuthi kube nesidingo sokusungula amayunithi ezezibalo eminyangweni kahulumeni ehlukahlukene, okuzokwenza ukuthi isidingo sibe sikhulu sabantu abaqeqeshiwe mayelana namakhono ezezibalo.

Ukukhishwa kohlelo lwezibalo kuzwelonke kuzoholela esidingweni sokusungula amaphiko ezokubala eminyangweni kahulumeni ehlukahlukene, okuzokwenza kube nesidingo esikhulu sabasebenzi abanamakhono kwezokubala.

Ukukhishwa kohlelo lwezibalo kuzwelonke kuzoholela esidingweni sokusungula amaphiko ezokubala eminyangweni kahulumeni ehlukahlukene, okuzokwenza kube nesidingo esikhulu sabasebenzi abanamakhono kwezokubala.
Ukuqalwa kwesimiso sezibalo zikazwelonke kuzoholela ekubeni khona kwesidingo sokumiswa kwezimpiko zezibalo eminyangweni ehlukahlukene kahulumeni, okudala nesidingo esikhulu nakakhulu sabasebenzi bezezibalo abanamakhono.
Uhlelo lokuhlola lwezezibalo kuzwelonke luzokwenza ukuthi kube nesidingo sokusungula amayunithi ezezibalo eminyangweni kahulumeni ehlukahlukene, okuzokwenza ukuthi isidingo sibe sikhulu sabantu abaqeqeshiwe mayelana namakhono ezezibalo.
Nokho, ukuthuthukiswa kwabasebenzi kwezokubala kuxhunyaniswa nokungaphezu kwesidingo sikahulumeni sokuthola ulwazi oluyilonalona.
Nokho, ukuthuthukiswa kwabasebenzi bezibalo kuhlanganiswe kokungaphezu nje kwesidingo sikahulumeni sokuthola ulwazi olunembile.
Nakuba kunjalo, ukuthuthukiswa kwamakhono emkhakheni wezezibalo kungaphezulu kwesidingo sikahulumeni mayelana nolwazi olushaya khona.
Yize kunjalo, ukuthuthukiswa komthamo wamakhono kwezokubala akuxhumene nje kuphela nesidingo sikahulumeni sokuthi kube nokwazisa okushaya emhlolweni.
Nokho, ukuthuthukiswa kwabasebenzi bezibalo kuhlanganiswe kokungaphezu nje kwesidingo sikahulumeni sokuthola ulwazi olunembile.
Nakuba kunjalo, ukuthuthukiswa kwamakhono emkhakheni wezezibalo kungaphezulu kwesidingo sikahulumeni mayelana nolwazi olushaya khona.
Yize kunjalo, ukuthuthukiswa komthamo wamakhono kwezokubala akuxhumene nje kuphela nesidingo sikahulumeni sokuthi kube nokwazisa okushaya emhlolweni.
Nokho, ukuthuthukiswa kwabasebenzi kwezokubala kuxhunyaniswa nokungaphezu kwesidingo sikahulumeni sokuthola ulwazi oluyilonalona.
Nakuba kunjalo, ukuthuthukiswa kwamakhono emkhakheni wezezibalo kungaphezulu kwesidingo sikahulumeni mayelana nolwazi olushaya khona.
Yize kunjalo, ukuthuthukiswa komthamo wamakhono kwezokubala akuxhumene nje kuphela nesidingo sikahulumeni sokuthi kube nokwazisa okushaya emhlolweni.
Nokho, ukuthuthukiswa kwabasebenzi kwezokubala kuxhunyaniswa nokungaphezu kwesidingo sikahulumeni sokuthola ulwazi oluyilonalona.
Nokho, ukuthuthukiswa kwabasebenzi bezibalo kuhlanganiswe kokungaphezu nje kwesidingo sikahulumeni sokuthola ulwazi olunembile.
Yize kunjalo, ukuthuthukiswa komthamo wamakhono kwezokubala akuxhumene nje kuphela nesidingo sikahulumeni sokuthi kube nokwazisa okushaya emhlolweni.
Nokho, ukuthuthukiswa kwabasebenzi kwezokubala kuxhunyaniswa nokungaphezu kwesidingo sikahulumeni sokuthola ulwazi oluyilonalona.
Nokho, ukuthuthukiswa kwabasebenzi bezibalo kuhlanganiswe kokungaphezu nje kwesidingo sikahulumeni sokuthola ulwazi olunembile.
Nakuba kunjalo, ukuthuthukiswa kwamakhono emkhakheni wezezibalo kungaphezulu kwesidingo sikahulumeni mayelana nolwazi olushaya khona.
Izibalo ziqonde ngqo enhliziyweni yentandoyeningi.
Izibalo yizo ezilawula intando yeningi. 
Umkhakha wezezibalo uyingqikithi yombuso wentando yeningi.
Izibalo ziya ngqo kummongo wentando yeningi. 
Izibalo yizo ezilawula intando yeningi. 
Umkhakha wezezibalo uyingqikithi yombuso wentando yeningi.
Izibalo ziya ngqo kummongo wentando yeningi. 
Izibalo ziqonde ngqo enhliziyweni yentandoyeningi.
Umkhakha wezezibalo uyingqikithi yombuso wentando yeningi.
Izibalo ziya ngqo kummongo wentando yeningi. 
Izibalo ziqonde ngqo enhliziyweni yentandoyeningi.
Izibalo yizo ezilawula intando yeningi. 
Izibalo ziya ngqo kummongo wentando yeningi. 
Izibalo ziqonde ngqo enhliziyweni yentandoyeningi.
Izibalo yizo ezilawula intando yeningi. 
Umkhakha wezezibalo uyingqikithi yombuso wentando yeningi.
U-HG Wells, washo zibekwa ngekhuluminyaka ka 20, ukuthi esikhathini esizayo, isidingo sezokubalo siyoba semqoka kuzakhamizi njengekhono lokufunda nokubhala.
U-HG Wells, lapho kuqala ikhulu leminyaka lama-20, waveza umbono wokuthi esikhathini esizayo, izibalo zaziyoba ngezidingeke ezakhamizini njengekhono lokukwazi ukufunda nokubhala.
U-HG Wells, ekuqaleni konyakakhulu wama-20, wabeka umbono wokuthi esikhathini esizayo kuzoba nesidingo sokuthi izakhamuzi zibe namakhono emkhakheni wezezibalo njengekhono lokufunda nokubhala.
u-HG Wells, kuqala ikhulunyaka lama-20, waba nombono wokuthi esikhathini esizayo, izibalo zizodingeka kuzakhamizi kanjengoba kudingeka ulwazi lokufunda nelokubhala.
U-HG Wells, lapho kuqala ikhulu leminyaka lama-20, waveza umbono wokuthi esikhathini esizayo, izibalo zaziyoba ngezidingeke ezakhamizini njengekhono lokukwazi ukufunda nokubhala.
U-HG Wells, ekuqaleni konyakakhulu wama-20, wabeka umbono wokuthi esikhathini esizayo kuzoba nesidingo sokuthi izakhamuzi zibe namakhono emkhakheni wezezibalo njengekhono lokufunda nokubhala.
u-HG Wells, kuqala ikhulunyaka lama-20, waba nombono wokuthi esikhathini esizayo, izibalo zizodingeka kuzakhamizi kanjengoba kudingeka ulwazi lokufunda nelokubhala.
U-HG Wells, washo zibekwa ngekhuluminyaka ka 20, ukuthi esikhathini esizayo, isidingo sezokubalo siyoba semqoka kuzakhamizi njengekhono lokufunda nokubhala.
U-HG Wells, ekuqaleni konyakakhulu wama-20, wabeka umbono wokuthi esikhathini esizayo kuzoba nesidingo sokuthi izakhamuzi zibe namakhono emkhakheni wezezibalo njengekhono lokufunda nokubhala.

U-HG Wells, lapho kuqala ikhulu leminyaka lama-20, waveza umbono wokuthi esikhathini esizayo, izibalo zaziyoba ngezidingeke ezakhamizini njengekhono lokukwazi ukufunda nokubhala.

U-HG Wells, lapho kuqala ikhulu leminyaka lama-20, waveza umbono wokuthi esikhathini esizayo, izibalo zaziyoba ngezidingeke ezakhamizini njengekhono lokukwazi ukufunda nokubhala.
U-HG Wells, ekuqaleni konyakakhulu wama-20, wabeka umbono wokuthi esikhathini esizayo kuzoba nesidingo sokuthi izakhamuzi zibe namakhono emkhakheni wezezibalo njengekhono lokufunda nokubhala.
Izibalo zikahulumeni ziyimpumelelo yakamuva ewusiko eyathuthuka ngokuhambisana nokuqala kwentandoyeningi.
Izibalo zomphakathi ziyinto eye yafinyelelwa muva nje ngokwesiko-mpilo efike nokungena kwentando yeningi. 
Ezezibalo zomphakathi ziyimpumelelo esandakwenzeka yamasiko ezithuthuke ngenxa yokufika kombuso wentando yeningi. 
Izibalo kuhulumeni, ziyimpumelelo entsha efike nombuso wentando yeningi. 
Izibalo zomphakathi ziyinto eye yafinyelelwa muva nje ngokwesiko-mpilo efike nokungena kwentando yeningi. 
Ezezibalo zomphakathi ziyimpumelelo esandakwenzeka yamasiko ezithuthuke ngenxa yokufika kombuso wentando yeningi.

Izibalo zikahulumeni ziyimpumelelo yakamuva ewusiko eyathuthuka ngokuhambisana nokuqala kwentandoyeningi.
Izibalo zomphakathi ziyinto eye yafinyelelwa muva nje ngokwesiko-mpilo efike nokungena kwentando yeningi. 
Ezezibalo zomphakathi ziyimpumelelo esandakwenzeka yamasiko ezithuthuke ngenxa yokufika kombuso wentando yeningi. 
Esimweni sase-Afrika, lapho intandoyeningi kusawuhlelo olusha, sizobona kwanda isidingo sezibalo zikahulumeni ngenkathi kugxila intandoyeningi.
Ngokwesimo sase-Afrika, lapho intando yeningi iyisenzakalo esifike muva nje, sizobona ukwanda okuphawulekayo esidingweni sezibalo zomphakathi njengoba intando yeningi iya ijula.
Mayelana ne-Afrika, lapho umbuso wentando yeningi uyinto esandakwenzeka, sizobona ukwenyuka kwezinga lokufuneka kwezezibalo zomphakathi njengoba umbuso wentando yeningi uya ngokuya ujula.
E-Afrika, la intando yeningi kuseyinto entsha khona, sizobona isidingo esithe ukwenyuka sezibalo kuhulumeni kuhambisana nokujula kwentando yeningi.
Ngokwesimo sase-Afrika, lapho intando yeningi iyisenzakalo esifike muva nje, sizobona ukwanda okuphawulekayo esidingweni sezibalo zomphakathi njengoba intando yeningi iya ijula.

Ababali yibo abangabalindi bemigomo yentandoyeningi yokusetshenziswa kwezindlela ezivulelekile kanye nokutholakala, futhi banesibopho sokuphendula.
Ongoti bezezibalo yibo abalawula izimiso zentando yeningi yokudalula izinto obala ezindabeni zokukalwa kwezinto kanye nokutholwa kwazo, futhi ngenxa yalokho nasekubeni nokulandisa.
Ngumsebenzi wosozibalo ukuvikela imigomo yombuso wentando yeningi yokuvuleleka ekulinganiseni nasekufinyeleleni okusho ukuthi bangabavikeli bokwenza izinto ngobuqotho.
OSozibalo, bayinqolobane yezimiso zentando yeningi maqondana nokuba sobala kwezilinganiso nokufinyelela, ngaloko neyokusebenza ngobuqotho.

Ngumsebenzi wosozibalo ukuvikela imigomo yombuso wentando yeningi yokuvuleleka ekulinganiseni nasekufinyeleleni okusho ukuthi bangabavikeli bokwenza izinto ngobuqotho.
Yilokho okuseqhulwini njengoba ohlelweni lokwandisa abasebenzi bezokubala, futhi ukusungulwa kwezikhungo ezidingekayo ukuze kwandiswe ukufundisa ngemininingwane kahulumeni okukhulu nokusheshayo.
Yilokho-ke okubalulekile emkhankasweni wokwandisa abasebenzi bezezibalo, kanye nokumisa izinhlangano ezidingekayo zokwanda okukhulukazi nokusheshayo ekufundisweni kolwazi olusemthethweni.
Yikho lokhu okubalulekile emkhankasweni wokwenyuswa kwamazinga amakhono emkhakheni wezezibalo, kanye nasekwakheni izikhungo ezidingeka maqondana nohlelo lokwelulwa okukhulu nokusheshayo kokufundiswa kwezifundo zedatha esemthethweni.    
Yilokho-ke okungummongo ekuqinisweni komthamo wamakhono kwezokubala, nasekuthuthukiseni izikhungo ezidingekela ukusabalala kabanzi nangokushesha kokufundiswa ngemininingwane engahluziwe.
Yilokho-ke okubalulekile emkhankasweni wokwandisa abasebenzi bezezibalo, kanye nokumisa izinhlangano ezidingekayo zokwanda okukhulukazi nokusheshayo ekufundisweni kolwazi olusemthethweni.
Yikho lokhu okubalulekile emkhankasweni wokwenyuswa kwamazinga amakhono emkhakheni wezezibalo, kanye nasekwakheni izikhungo ezidingeka maqondana nohlelo lokwelulwa okukhulu nokusheshayo kokufundiswa kwezifundo zedatha esemthethweni.

Izinsuku ezingu-16 Zokulwisana Nodlame Olubhekiswe Kubantu Besifazane Nezingane: ingabe bewazi?
Umkhankaso weziNsuku Ezingu-16 Wokulwa Nodlame Olubhekiswe Kwabesifazane Nezingane: ingabe bewazi?
Izinsuku eziyi-16 Zomzabalazo: ingabe ubuwazi yini?
Izinsuku ezili-16 zokulwisana nesihluku esibhekiswe kwabesimame nezingane: uthi bewazi nje?
Umkhankaso weziNsuku Ezingu-16 Wokulwa Nodlame Olubhekiswe Kwabesifazane Nezingane: ingabe bewazi?
Izinsuku eziyi-16 Zomzabalazo: ingabe ubuwazi yini?

Izinsuku ezingu-16 Zokulwisana Nodlame Olubhekiswe Kubantu Besifazane Nezingane: ingabe bewazi?
Umkhankaso weziNsuku Ezingu-16 Wokulwa Nodlame Olubhekiswe Kwabesifazane Nezingane: ingabe bewazi?
Izinsuku ezili-16 zokulwisana nesihluku esibhekiswe kwabesimame nezingane: uthi bewazi nje?
Izinsuku ezingu-16 Zokulwisana Nodlame Olubhekiswe Kubantu Besifazane Nezingane: ingabe bewazi?
Umkhankaso weziNsuku Ezingu-16 Wokulwa Nodlame Olubhekiswe Kwabesifazane Nezingane: ingabe bewazi?
Izinsuku eziyi-16 Zomzabalazo: ingabe ubuwazi yini?
Kusukela ngowe-1994, uHulumeni wasungula umthetho obhekana nezenzo ezingalungile ezithinta abantu besifazane nezingane.
Kusukela ngowe-1994, uHulumeni wamisa imithetho yokulungisa izenzo ezimbi ezithinta abesifazane nezingane.
Kusukela ngonyaka we-1994, uHulumeni usungule umthetho wokulungisa izinto ezimbi ezithinta abantu besifazane nezingane.
Kusukela ngowe-1994, uHulumeni usakhe imithetho yokubhekana nobubi obuthinta abesimame nezingane.
Kusukela ngowe-1994, uHulumeni wamisa imithetho yokulungisa izenzo ezimbi ezithinta abesifazane nezingane.
Kusukela ngonyaka we-1994, uHulumeni usungule umthetho wokulungisa izinto ezimbi ezithinta abantu besifazane nezingane.
Kusukela ngowe-1994, uHulumeni usakhe imithetho yokubhekana nobubi obuthinta abesimame nezingane.
Kusukela ngowe-1994, uHulumeni wasungula umthetho obhekana nezenzo ezingalungile ezithinta abantu besifazane nezingane.
Kusukela ngonyaka we-1994, uHulumeni usungule umthetho wokulungisa izinto ezimbi ezithinta abantu besifazane nezingane.
Kusukela ngowe-1994, uHulumeni usakhe imithetho yokubhekana nobubi obuthinta abesimame nezingane.
Kusukela ngowe-1994, uHulumeni wasungula umthetho obhekana nezenzo ezingalungile ezithinta abantu besifazane nezingane.
Kusukela ngowe-1994, uHulumeni wamisa imithetho yokulungisa izenzo ezimbi ezithinta abesifazane nezingane.
Kusukela ngowe-1994, uHulumeni usakhe imithetho yokubhekana nobubi obuthinta abesimame nezingane.
Kusukela ngowe-1994, uHulumeni wasungula umthetho obhekana nezenzo ezingalungile ezithinta abantu besifazane nezingane.
Kusukela ngowe-1994, uHulumeni wamisa imithetho yokulungisa izenzo ezimbi ezithinta abesifazane nezingane.
Kusukela ngonyaka we-1994, uHulumeni usungule umthetho wokulungisa izinto ezimbi ezithinta abantu besifazane nezingane.
Ukugqugquzelwa koMthetho Wezokulingana Nokuvikelwa Kokucwasa Ngokungalingani, 2000 waphasiswa ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi wonke umuntu uthokozela amalungelo akuMthethosisekelo.
UMthetho Wokugqugquzela Ukulingana Nokuvinjelwa Kokucwasa Okungalungile, 2000 wagunyazwa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi wonke umuntu ufinyelela amalungelo oMthethosisekelo. 
UMthetho Wezokuthuthukiswa Kwezokulingana Nokuvinjelwa Ukucwasa Okungachemile, ka-2000 washaywa ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi wonke umuntu uyasizakala ngamalungelo akuMthethosisekelo. 
Umthetho obhekele Ukulingana Nokuqedwa Kobandlululo olungenabulungiswa,wezi- 2000 waphasiswa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi wonke umuntu usebenzisa amalungelo akhe angokoMthethosisekelo.

Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuthi abantu besifazane bathokozela amalungelo nenkululeko ngokulinganayo, ngokulungiswa kwezenzo ezingalungile zangaphambilini.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuthi abesifazane bawathola ngokulinganayo amalungelo nenkululeko, lapho kulungiswa izenzo ezimbi zesikhathi esidlule.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuthi abantu besifazane basizakale ngokulinganayo mayelana namalungelo nenkululeko ngenhloso yokulungisa izinto ezimbi ebezenzeka esikhathini edlule.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuthi abasifazane banenkululeko namalungelo alinganayo, ukulungisa ububi besikhathi esedlule.

UMthetho Wokuqasha Ngokulingana, 1998 uqinisekisa ukuthi ukucwaswa kwezokuqashwa, ukusebenza kanye neholo emsebenzini okwadalwa imithetho yobandlululo kuyaqedwa.
UMthetho Wokuqasha Ngokulingana, 1998 uqinisekisa ukuthi kuyavinjwa ukucwasa lapho kuqashwa, emsebenzini, kanye nangeholo ngaphakathi kwemakethe yezemisebenzi eyadalwa yimithetho yobandlululo. 
UMthetho Wezokulingana Emsebenzini, ka-1998 uqinisekisa ukuthi ukucwaswa emsebenzini, emsebenzini owenzayo kanye nomholo ezindaweni zomsebenzi okudalwe yimithetho yobandlululo kuyalawulwa. 
UMthetho Wokulinganiswa Emsebenzini we-1998 uqinisekisa ukuthi kuyadambiswa ukucwasa okwadalwa isikhathi sobandlululo emsebenzini, ezikhundleni, nasemaholweni emakethe yabasebenzi.

Ugqugquzela ukumelwa ngokulinganisayo kwabantu besifazane kanye nabanye abantu ababephucwe amathuba ngaphambilini kuwo wonke amazinga amabhizinisi kahulumeni kanye nakumabhizinisi azimele.
Ikhuthaza ukumelelwa okulinganayo kwabesifazane kanye nabanye abantu ababencishwe amalungelo ngokomlando kuwo wonke amazinga ezinkampani zomphakathi nezizimele.
Ugqugquzela ukumeleka ngokungachemile  kwabesifazane kanye nabanye abantu ababebekelwe eceleni esikhathini esidlule kuwo wonke amazinga emkhakheni womphakathi nakulowo ozimele.
Ukhuthaza ukulinganiswa kobukhona kwabesimame nabanye abantu abanomlandu wokucindezelwa kuwona onke amazinga kuzinhlaka zikahulumeni nezizimele.

UMthetho Wesondlo, 1998 uqinisekisa amalungelo omntwana okuthi aphile impilo efanele ezokhuthaza ukukhula ngokwenyama, ngokomqondo, ngokomoya kanye nangokwezenhlalakahle. 
UMthetho Wesondlo, 1998 uqinisekisa amalungelo engane okuthola izinga lokuphila elanele ukuba ithuthuke ngokomzimba, ngokwengqondo, ngokomoya nangokwenhlalo.  
UMthetho Wesondlo, ka-1998 uqinisekisa amalungelo engane okuphila impilo esezingeni elifanele elanele ekukhuleni komzimba, kwengqondo, ngokomoya nangokwenhlalakahle. 
uMthetho Wesondlo, we-1998 uqinisekisa amalungelo ezingane okuthi ziphile ezingeni elenele ngokwentuthuko yomzimba, yengqondo neyokuba ilungu lomphakathi. 
UMthetho Wesondlo, 1998 uqinisekisa amalungelo engane okuthola izinga lokuphila elanele ukuba ithuthuke ngokomzimba, ngokwengqondo, ngokomoya nangokwenhlalo.

UMthetho uqinisekisa ukuthi isondlo sengane siqoqwa kubazali noma kwabanye abantu abanejoka lokuhlinzekelwa komntwana ngokwezezimali.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuthi imali yesondlo yengane iyatholakala kubazali noma abanye abantu abanesibopho sokunakekela ingane ngokwezimali.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuthi isondlo siyatholakala kulabo bazali noma abanye abantu okungumsebenzi wabo ukondla ingane ngokwemali.
UMthetho uqinisekisa ukuthi isondlo sengane siyatholakala kubazali bayo noma kwabanye abantu abanesibopho sokuyondla ngemali.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuthi imali yesondlo yengane iyatholakala kubazali noma abanye abantu abanesibopho sokunakekela ingane ngokwezimali.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuthi isondlo siyatholakala kulabo bazali noma abanye abantu okungumsebenzi wabo ukondla ingane ngokwemali.

UMthetho Wezodlame Lwasekhaya, 1998 wamiselwa  ukuthi abantu abasinde odlameni  bavikelwe odlameni lwasekhaya ngendlela esezingeni eliphezulu. 
UMthetho Wezodlame Lwasekhaya, 1998 washayelwa ukuba labo abayizisulu zodlame bathole ukuvikelwa okukhulu ekuhlukunyezweni kwasekhaya.   
UMthetho Wodlame Lwasekhaya, ka-1998 wasungulelwa ukuthi labo abayizisulu zodlame bathole ukuvikelwa ngokuphelele odlameni lwasekhaya. 
Umthetho Wesihluku Emakhaya, we-1998 wangeniswa ukubhekela ukuvikeleka okukhulu kwalabo abaphunyuke ekuhlukumezweni ukuthi bangabuye bahlukunyezwe emakhaya futhi. 
UMthetho Wezodlame Lwasekhaya, 1998 washayelwa ukuba labo abayizisulu zodlame bathole ukuvikelwa okukhulu ekuhlukunyezweni kwasekhaya.   
UMthetho Wodlame Lwasekhaya, ka-1998 wasungulelwa ukuthi labo abayizisulu zodlame bathole ukuvikelwa ngokuphelele odlameni lwasekhaya. 
Umthetho Wesihluku Emakhaya, we-1998 wangeniswa ukubhekela ukuvikeleka okukhulu kwalabo abaphunyuke ekuhlukumezweni ukuthi bangabuye bahlukunyezwe emakhaya futhi. 
UMthetho Wezodlame Lwasekhaya, 1998 wamiselwa  ukuthi abantu abasinde odlameni  bavikelwe odlameni lwasekhaya ngendlela esezingeni eliphezulu. 
UMthetho Wodlame Lwasekhaya, ka-1998 wasungulelwa ukuthi labo abayizisulu zodlame bathole ukuvikelwa ngokuphelele odlameni lwasekhaya. 
Umthetho Wesihluku Emakhaya, we-1998 wangeniswa ukubhekela ukuvikeleka okukhulu kwalabo abaphunyuke ekuhlukumezweni ukuthi bangabuye bahlukunyezwe emakhaya futhi. 
UMthetho Wezodlame Lwasekhaya, 1998 wamiselwa  ukuthi abantu abasinde odlameni  bavikelwe odlameni lwasekhaya ngendlela esezingeni eliphezulu. 
UMthetho Wezodlame Lwasekhaya, 1998 washayelwa ukuba labo abayizisulu zodlame bathole ukuvikelwa okukhulu ekuhlukunyezweni kwasekhaya.   
Umthetho Wesihluku Emakhaya, we-1998 wangeniswa ukubhekela ukuvikeleka okukhulu kwalabo abaphunyuke ekuhlukumezweni ukuthi bangabuye bahlukunyezwe emakhaya futhi. 
UMthetho Wezodlame Lwasekhaya, 1998 wamiselwa  ukuthi abantu abasinde odlameni  bavikelwe odlameni lwasekhaya ngendlela esezingeni eliphezulu. 
UMthetho Wezodlame Lwasekhaya, 1998 washayelwa ukuba labo abayizisulu zodlame bathole ukuvikelwa okukhulu ekuhlukunyezweni kwasekhaya.   
UMthetho Wodlame Lwasekhaya, ka-1998 wasungulelwa ukuthi labo abayizisulu zodlame bathole ukuvikelwa ngokuphelele odlameni lwasekhaya. 
Abantu besifazane, okuyibo abathinteka kakhulu kudlame lwasekhaya, sebenomthetho abangazivikela ngawo ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi bayavikeleka.
Abesifazane, okuyibona abaxhashazwayo emakhaya, manje sebenodondolo olungokomthetho oluzoqinisekisa ukuthi bayavikelwa.
Labo bantu besifazane abayizisulu zodlame lwasekhaya sebayaluthola usizo lwezomthetho manje oluqinisekisa ukuphepha kwabo. 
Abesimame, okuyibon abasebucayini bokuhlukunyezwa, sebenomgudu womthetho oqinisekisa ukuvikeleka kwabo.
Abesifazane, okuyibona abaxhashazwayo emakhaya, manje sebenodondolo olungokomthetho oluzoqinisekisa ukuthi bayavikelwa.
Labo bantu besifazane abayizisulu zodlame lwasekhaya sebayaluthola usizo lwezomthetho manje oluqinisekisa ukuphepha kwabo. 
Abesimame, okuyibon abasebucayini bokuhlukunyezwa, sebenomgudu womthetho oqinisekisa ukuvikeleka kwabo.
Abantu besifazane, okuyibo abathinteka kakhulu kudlame lwasekhaya, sebenomthetho abangazivikela ngawo ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi bayavikeleka.
Labo bantu besifazane abayizisulu zodlame lwasekhaya sebayaluthola usizo lwezomthetho manje oluqinisekisa ukuphepha kwabo. 
Abesimame, okuyibon abasebucayini bokuhlukunyezwa, sebenomgudu womthetho oqinisekisa ukuvikeleka kwabo.
Abantu besifazane, okuyibo abathinteka kakhulu kudlame lwasekhaya, sebenomthetho abangazivikela ngawo ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi bayavikeleka.
Abesifazane, okuyibona abaxhashazwayo emakhaya, manje sebenodondolo olungokomthetho oluzoqinisekisa ukuthi bayavikelwa.
Abesimame, okuyibon abasebucayini bokuhlukunyezwa, sebenomgudu womthetho oqinisekisa ukuvikeleka kwabo.
Abantu besifazane, okuyibo abathinteka kakhulu kudlame lwasekhaya, sebenomthetho abangazivikela ngawo ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi bayavikeleka.
Abesifazane, okuyibona abaxhashazwayo emakhaya, manje sebenodondolo olungokomthetho oluzoqinisekisa ukuthi bayavikelwa.

UMthetho Wezingane, 2005 kanye noMthethosichibiyelo Wezingane, 2007 wamiswa phakathi kweminye, ukuze uvikele ingane ekuphathweni ngendlela engafanele, ukunganakwa, ukuhlukunyezwa noma ukudicilelwa phansi.
UMthetho Wezingane, 2005 noMthetho Wesichibiyelo Wezingane, 2007 phakathi kokunye, washayelwa ukuvikela ingane ekuphathweni kabi, ukunganakwa, ukuxhashazwa noma ukuwohlozwa.
UMthetho Wezingane, ka-2005 kanye noMthetho Wezingane Woshicilelo, ka-2007 wasungulelwa  phakathi kwezinye izinto, ukuvikela ingane ukuthi ingahlushwa, ingashiywa inganakwe wumuntu, ingahlukunyezwa noma ingehliswa isithunzi.
uMthetho Wezingane, wezi-2005 nesibichiyelo soMthetho Wezingane sezi-2007 wasungulelwa ukuthi, phakathi kwezinye izinto,  uvikele ingane ekuxhashazweni, ukunganakwa, ukuhlukunyezwa, noma ukwehliswa isithunzi.

UHulumeni uqalise futhi wesekela okuningi okusunguliwe okuvikela isithunzi somuntu wesifazane kanye nezingane.
Uhulumeni uye wasebenzisa futhi wasekela izinhlelo eziningi ezivikela isithunzi sobuntu sabesifazane nezingane.
UHulumeni usebenzise, weseka izinhlelo eziningi zokungenelela ezivikela isithunzi sabesifazane nezingane.
UHulumeni usengenelele ngezindlela eziningi futhi waseka izinhlelo zokungenelela ezehlukahlukene ezivikela isithunzi sobuntu sabesimame nesezingane.
Uhulumeni uye wasebenzisa futhi wasekela izinhlelo eziningi ezivikela isithunzi sobuntu sabesifazane nezingane.

Uhulumeni uye wasebenzisa futhi wasekela izinhlelo eziningi ezivikela isithunzi sobuntu sabesifazane nezingane.
UHulumeni usebenzise, weseka izinhlelo eziningi zokungenelela ezivikela isithunzi sabesifazane nezingane.
USomqulu Wamalungelo Ezingane uyabukezwa futhi uzochitshiyelwa ukuze ubandakanye izinselele ezivelayo ezinjengokusetshenziswa kwezingane njengababambiqhaza emibukisweni yezocansi kanye nokuvezela izingane imibukiso yezocansi.
Isivumelwano Samalungelo Ezingane siyabuyekelwa futhi siyalungiswa ukuze sihlanganise nezinselele ezintsha njengokusetshenziswa kwezingane ekubeni yizisulu zezithombe ezingcolile nokuchaywa kwezingane ezithombeni ezingcolile. 
UMqulu Wamalungelo Ezingane uyabuyekezwa futhi kufakwa nolwazi lwakamuva kuwo njengamanje kubandakanya izinselelo eziqubukayo njengokusetshenziswa kwezingane emifanekisweni yezocansi kanye nokuvezela izingane ezintweni ezinemifanekiso yezocansi.
iShatha Yamalungelo Ezingane, iyabuyekezwa ifakwe ulwazi lwakamuva ukuze ifake izinselelo ezintsha ezifana nokusetshenziswa kwezingane ngokocansi kuqoshwe izithombe zalezo zenzo, nokubukisa izingane izithombe zezenzo zocansi.
Isivumelwano Samalungelo Ezingane siyabuyekelwa futhi siyalungiswa ukuze sihlanganise nezinselele ezintsha njengokusetshenziswa kwezingane ekubeni yizisulu zezithombe ezingcolile nokuchaywa kwezingane ezithombeni ezingcolile. 
UMqulu Wamalungelo Ezingane uyabuyekezwa futhi kufakwa nolwazi lwakamuva kuwo njengamanje kubandakanya izinselelo eziqubukayo njengokusetshenziswa kwezingane emifanekisweni yezocansi kanye nokuvezela izingane ezintweni ezinemifanekiso yezocansi.

UHulumeni seyidingidile inselele yokushadiswa kwezingane ngempoqo zishadiswa nabantu abadala ngaphansi kwenqubo yesiko elibizwa ngokuthi “Ukuthwala”.
Uhulumeni uye wasabela kuyinselele yokushadiswa ngenkani kwezingane kubantu abadala ngezaba zokuthi kuyisiko elibizwa ngokuthi “Ukuthwala”. 
UHulumeni usephendulile kule nkinga yemishado ephoqelelwa ezinganeni ukuba zishade nabantu abadala kube kuzitshwa ngesiko elibizwa ngokuthi "Ukuthwala". 
UHulumeni useyiphendulile ingqinamba yokuphoqelelwa emshadweni kwezingane kuthiwe azishade nabantu abadala kube kuqanjwa amanga kuthiwa kugcinwa isiko lakudala elibizwa ngokuthi "Ukuthwala". 
Uhulumeni uye wasabela kuyinselele yokushadiswa ngenkani kwezingane kubantu abadala ngezaba zokuthi kuyisiko elibizwa ngokuthi “Ukuthwala”.

UHulumeni uzibophelele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi amasiko kanye nezinye izinqubo kuyahambisana noMthethosisekelo kanye nomthetho ofanele.
Uhulumeni uzibophezele ukuqinisekisa ukuthi amasiko neminye imikhuba kuyavumelana noMthethosisekelo neminye imithetho ehambisana nalokho.
UHulumeni uzibophezele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi amasiko nokunye okwenziwayo kuhambisana noMthethosisekelo kanye nemithetho efanele.
UHulumeni uzinikele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi izinqubo zamasiko nezinye ziyahambisana noMthethosisekelo kanjalo nemithetho efanele.
Uhulumeni uzibophezele ukuqinisekisa ukuthi amasiko neminye imikhuba kuyavumelana noMthethosisekelo neminye imithetho ehambisana nalokho.
UHulumeni uzibophezele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi amasiko nokunye okwenziwayo kuhambisana noMthethosisekelo kanye nemithetho efanele.
UHulumeni uzinikele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi izinqubo zamasiko nezinye ziyahambisana noMthethosisekelo kanjalo nemithetho efanele.
UHulumeni uzibophelele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi amasiko kanye nezinye izinqubo kuyahambisana noMthethosisekelo kanye nomthetho ofanele.
UHulumeni uzibophezele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi amasiko nokunye okwenziwayo kuhambisana noMthethosisekelo kanye nemithetho efanele.
UHulumeni uzinikele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi izinqubo zamasiko nezinye ziyahambisana noMthethosisekelo kanjalo nemithetho efanele.
UHulumeni uzibophelele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi amasiko kanye nezinye izinqubo kuyahambisana noMthethosisekelo kanye nomthetho ofanele.
Uhulumeni uzibophezele ukuqinisekisa ukuthi amasiko neminye imikhuba kuyavumelana noMthethosisekelo neminye imithetho ehambisana nalokho.
UHulumeni uzinikele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi izinqubo zamasiko nezinye ziyahambisana noMthethosisekelo kanjalo nemithetho efanele.
UHulumeni uzibophelele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi amasiko kanye nezinye izinqubo kuyahambisana noMthethosisekelo kanye nomthetho ofanele.
Uhulumeni uzibophezele ukuqinisekisa ukuthi amasiko neminye imikhuba kuyavumelana noMthethosisekelo neminye imithetho ehambisana nalokho.
UHulumeni uzibophezele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi amasiko nokunye okwenziwayo kuhambisana noMthethosisekelo kanye nemithetho efanele.
Inqubo iyaqhubeka ukuze kusungulwe kabusha amaphiko akhethekile abhekana namacala okuhlukumeza kanye namacala ezocansi kanye nobunye ubugebengu obubhekiswa kubantu besifazane nezingane.
Kunenqubo esasetshenzwa yokumisa kabusha izigaba ezikhethekile zamaphoyisa ezizobhekana namacala okuhlukunyezwa kwasekhaya nangokocansi kanye nobunye ubugebengu obenziwa kwabesifazane nezingane.   
Kusungulwa kabusha amayunithi amaphoyisa akhethekile azobhekana namacala enziwa emakhaya nawezocansi kanye namanye amacala enziwa kubantu besifazane nasezinganeni. 
Kukhona uhlelo olusezithebeni lokuba kuvuselelwe izinkambu zamaphoyisa abhekele ukuhlumezeka kwasemakhaya, amacala ocansi nobunye ubugebengu obubhekiswe kwabesimame nezingane. 
Kunenqubo esasetshenzwa yokumisa kabusha izigaba ezikhethekile zamaphoyisa ezizobhekana namacala okuhlukunyezwa kwasekhaya nangokocansi kanye nobunye ubugebengu obenziwa kwabesifazane nezingane.   
Kusungulwa kabusha amayunithi amaphoyisa akhethekile azobhekana namacala enziwa emakhaya nawezocansi kanye namanye amacala enziwa kubantu besifazane nasezinganeni. 
Kukhona uhlelo olusezithebeni lokuba kuvuselelwe izinkambu zamaphoyisa abhekele ukuhlumezeka kwasemakhaya, amacala ocansi nobunye ubugebengu obubhekiswe kwabesimame nezingane. 
Inqubo iyaqhubeka ukuze kusungulwe kabusha amaphiko akhethekile abhekana namacala okuhlukumeza kanye namacala ezocansi kanye nobunye ubugebengu obubhekiswa kubantu besifazane nezingane.
Kusungulwa kabusha amayunithi amaphoyisa akhethekile azobhekana namacala enziwa emakhaya nawezocansi kanye namanye amacala enziwa kubantu besifazane nasezinganeni. 
Kukhona uhlelo olusezithebeni lokuba kuvuselelwe izinkambu zamaphoyisa abhekele ukuhlumezeka kwasemakhaya, amacala ocansi nobunye ubugebengu obubhekiswe kwabesimame nezingane. 
Inqubo iyaqhubeka ukuze kusungulwe kabusha amaphiko akhethekile abhekana namacala okuhlukumeza kanye namacala ezocansi kanye nobunye ubugebengu obubhekiswa kubantu besifazane nezingane.
Kunenqubo esasetshenzwa yokumisa kabusha izigaba ezikhethekile zamaphoyisa ezizobhekana namacala okuhlukunyezwa kwasekhaya nangokocansi kanye nobunye ubugebengu obenziwa kwabesifazane nezingane.   
Kukhona uhlelo olusezithebeni lokuba kuvuselelwe izinkambu zamaphoyisa abhekele ukuhlumezeka kwasemakhaya, amacala ocansi nobunye ubugebengu obubhekiswe kwabesimame nezingane. 
Inqubo iyaqhubeka ukuze kusungulwe kabusha amaphiko akhethekile abhekana namacala okuhlukumeza kanye namacala ezocansi kanye nobunye ubugebengu obubhekiswa kubantu besifazane nezingane.
Kunenqubo esasetshenzwa yokumisa kabusha izigaba ezikhethekile zamaphoyisa ezizobhekana namacala okuhlukunyezwa kwasekhaya nangokocansi kanye nobunye ubugebengu obenziwa kwabesifazane nezingane.   
Kusungulwa kabusha amayunithi amaphoyisa akhethekile azobhekana namacala enziwa emakhaya nawezocansi kanye namanye amacala enziwa kubantu besifazane nasezinganeni. 
Ukusungulwa kwamaphiko akhethekile kuzosebenzisa ubungcweti obudingekayo ukuze kuthuthukiswe ukuphathwa nokushushiswa ngempumelelo kwamacala abhekiswe kubantu besifazane nezingane.
Ukumiswa kwezigaba ezikhethekile kuzoshukumisa abanamakhono adingekayo ukuze kuthuthukiswe ukuphathwa nokwahlulelwa ngempumelelo kobugebengu obenziwa kwabesifazane nezingane.  
Lokhu kusungulwa kwamayunithi akhethekile kuzolungiselela futhi kuzohlanganise ubungoti obudingekayo ekwenzeni ngcono ukulawula nokushushisa ngempumelelo mayelana namacala enziwe ebantwini besifazane nezingane.  
Ukusungulwa kwalezi zinkambu ezikhethekile kuzoveza isidingo sokuthi kutholakale abantu abanamakhono afanele ukuze ziphathwe kahle lezi zikhungo nokuthi bushushiswe kahle ubugebengu obubhekiswe kwabesimame nezingane.  
Ukumiswa kwezigaba ezikhethekile kuzoshukumisa abanamakhono adingekayo ukuze kuthuthukiswe ukuphathwa nokwahlulelwa ngempumelelo kobugebengu obenziwa kwabesifazane nezingane.  
Lokhu kusungulwa kwamayunithi akhethekile kuzolungiselela futhi kuzohlanganise ubungoti obudingekayo ekwenzeni ngcono ukulawula nokushushisa ngempumelelo mayelana namacala enziwe ebantwini besifazane nezingane.  
Ukusungulwa kwalezi zinkambu ezikhethekile kuzoveza isidingo sokuthi kutholakale abantu abanamakhono afanele ukuze ziphathwe kahle lezi zikhungo nokuthi bushushiswe kahle ubugebengu obubhekiswe kwabesimame nezingane.  
Ukusungulwa kwamaphiko akhethekile kuzosebenzisa ubungcweti obudingekayo ukuze kuthuthukiswe ukuphathwa nokushushiswa ngempumelelo kwamacala abhekiswe kubantu besifazane nezingane.
Lokhu kusungulwa kwamayunithi akhethekile kuzolungiselela futhi kuzohlanganise ubungoti obudingekayo ekwenzeni ngcono ukulawula nokushushisa ngempumelelo mayelana namacala enziwe ebantwini besifazane nezingane.  
Ukusungulwa kwalezi zinkambu ezikhethekile kuzoveza isidingo sokuthi kutholakale abantu abanamakhono afanele ukuze ziphathwe kahle lezi zikhungo nokuthi bushushiswe kahle ubugebengu obubhekiswe kwabesimame nezingane.  
Ukusungulwa kwamaphiko akhethekile kuzosebenzisa ubungcweti obudingekayo ukuze kuthuthukiswe ukuphathwa nokushushiswa ngempumelelo kwamacala abhekiswe kubantu besifazane nezingane.

Lokhu kusungulwa kwamayunithi akhethekile kuzolungiselela futhi kuzohlanganise ubungoti obudingekayo ekwenzeni ngcono ukulawula nokushushisa ngempumelelo mayelana namacala enziwe ebantwini besifazane nezingane.  
Njengamanje kunamaThuthuzela okuyiZikhungo Zokunakekela  ezingu-17 ezisungulwe ezweni lilonke emiphakathini enezigameko zamacala okuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi amaningi kakhulu.
Njengamanje kunezikhungo okuthiwa yiThuthuzela Care Centre ezingu-17 ezimiswe kulo lonke izwe emiphakathini enezigameko eziphezulu zokuhlukumeza ngocansi. 
Okwamanje kunezizinda zonakekelo eziyi-17 ezibizwa ngokuthiwa ngamaThuthuzela Care Centre ezasungulwa kulo lonke leli lizwe emiphakathini ezibhekene nezigameko eziningi ezimayelana nodlame kwezocansi. 
Kumanjena nje sekusungulwe izikhungo ezili-17 zoNakekelo zeThuthuzela ezweni lonke nasemiphakathini okudlange kuyo ubugebengu bocansi.
Njengamanje kunezikhungo okuthiwa yiThuthuzela Care Centre ezingu-17 ezimiswe kulo lonke izwe emiphakathini enezigameko eziphezulu zokuhlukumeza ngocansi. 
Okwamanje kunezizinda zonakekelo eziyi-17 ezibizwa ngokuthiwa ngamaThuthuzela Care Centre ezasungulwa kulo lonke leli lizwe emiphakathini ezibhekene nezigameko eziningi ezimayelana nodlame kwezocansi.

Njengamanje kunezikhungo okuthiwa yiThuthuzela Care Centre ezingu-17 ezimiswe kulo lonke izwe emiphakathini enezigameko eziphezulu zokuhlukumeza ngocansi. 
Okwamanje kunezizinda zonakekelo eziyi-17 ezibizwa ngokuthiwa ngamaThuthuzela Care Centre ezasungulwa kulo lonke leli lizwe emiphakathini ezibhekene nezigameko eziningi ezimayelana nodlame kwezocansi. 
Izikhungo zihlinzeka ngemisebenzi yezempilo neyezenhlalakahle kanjalo nokuqalisa izinqubo zokubika ngendlela enohlonze nokushushisa amacala endaweni enesithunzi nenakekelayo eqhutshwa ochwepheshe abawufundele lowo msebenzi.
Lezi ziKhungo zihlinzeka usizo lwezempilo nezenhlalakahle futhi ziqalisa izinqubo zokuba kubikwe ngokuphumelelayo futhi kwahlulelwe amacala esimweni esinesizotha nesinakekelayo okwenziwa ngochwepheshe abakufundele.
Lezi Zizinda zihlinzeka ngamasevisi onakekelo lwezempilo kanye nenhlalakahle futhi ziqala nezinqubo ezimayelana nokubika kanye nokushushiswa mayelana namacala esimweni esinesithunzi nesinakekelayo kube kwenziwa ngongoti abakuqeqeshelwe ukwenza lokhu.
Izikhungo ziletha usizo lwezempilo nezenhlalakahle, bese ziqala izinhlelo zokuthi kubikwe ngempumelelo, kushushiswe namacala endaweni enesidima nenakekelayo lokho kwenziwa ongoti abagogodile.
Lezi ziKhungo zihlinzeka usizo lwezempilo nezenhlalakahle futhi ziqalisa izinqubo zokuba kubikwe ngokuphumelelayo futhi kwahlulelwe amacala esimweni esinesizotha nesinakekelayo okwenziwa ngochwepheshe abakufundele.

Izimali Zokuqoqwa Kwempahla Yezobugengu zasetshenziselwa ukuxhasa amaphrojekthi okusimamisa izisulu ezingu-19.
Izimali Zokubuyiselwa Kwempahla Yobugebengu zasetshenziselwa ukuxhasa ngezimali amaprojekti angu-19 okusekela abebeyizisulu.
Uhlelo Lwesikhwama Sempahla Yobugebengu Eshaqiwe lwalusetshenziselwa ukuxhasa amaphrojekthi ayi-19 okuvivisa labo abayizisulu.
Kwasetshenziswa Isikhwama Sokufunwa Kwempahla Ezigebengwinise ukweseka ngezimali imikhankaso eli-19 yokuthuthukisa abahlukumezekile.
Izimali Zokubuyiselwa Kwempahla Yobugebengu zasetshenziselwa ukuxhasa ngezimali amaprojekti angu-19 okusekela abebeyizisulu.
Uhlelo Lwesikhwama Sempahla Yobugebengu Eshaqiwe lwalusetshenziselwa ukuxhasa amaphrojekthi ayi-19 okuvivisa labo abayizisulu.

Kwasungula Umbhalo Wemiyalelo Ngemisebenzi Yezisulu Zodlame Nobugebengu oqukethe imisebenzi eyenziwe izinhlangano zikahulumeni kanye nezemiphakathi ezingaphezu kwe-1 500 kuzo zonke izifundazwe.
Kwenziwa iNcwadi Yeziqondiso Enamasevisi Ezisulu Zodlame Nobugebengu enamasevisi ahlinzekwa yizinhlangano zikahulumeni nezomphakathi ezingaphezu kuka-1 500 kuzo zonke izifundazwe. 
Kwasungulwa Ibhuku Elinohla Lwamasevisi Amayelana Nezisulu Zodlame Nobugebengu eliqukethe amasevisi angaphezulu kwayi-1500 ahlinzekwa nguhulumeni nezinhlangano zomphakathi kuzo zonke izifundazwe.
Kwabhalwa Inkomba yemininingwane yamahhovisi osizo kwabahlukumezwayo nabagetshengwayo equkethe usizo oluhlinzekwa izinhlangano ezingaphezulu kweziyi-1 500 zikahulumeni nezomphakathi kuzona zonke izifundazwe. 
Kwenziwa iNcwadi Yeziqondiso Enamasevisi Ezisulu Zodlame Nobugebengu enamasevisi ahlinzekwa yizinhlangano zikahulumeni nezomphakathi ezingaphezu kuka-1 500 kuzo zonke izifundazwe.

Umyalelo obhaliwe usimamisa abantu ukuze bakwazi ukuthola imisebenzi ewusizo ekhona endaweni abakuyo.
Le ncwadi enemininingwane yokuthinta lezi zinhlangano ihlomisa abantu ukuba bathole amasevisi atholakala endaweni abakuyo. 
Leli bhuku livivisa abantu ukuba bakwazi ukufinyelela amasevisi atholakala ezindaweni zabo. 
Le nkomba isiza abantu ukuthi bafinyelele kuzinsiza ezikhona endaweni. 
Le ncwadi enemininingwane yokuthinta lezi zinhlangano ihlomisa abantu ukuba bathole amasevisi atholakala endaweni abakuyo. 
Leli bhuku livivisa abantu ukuba bakwazi ukufinyelela amasevisi atholakala ezindaweni zabo. 
Le nkomba isiza abantu ukuthi bafinyelele kuzinsiza ezikhona endaweni.

Umyalelo obhaliwe usimamisa abantu ukuze bakwazi ukuthola imisebenzi ewusizo ekhona endaweni abakuyo.
Le ncwadi enemininingwane yokuthinta lezi zinhlangano ihlomisa abantu ukuba bathole amasevisi atholakala endaweni abakuyo. 
Leli bhuku livivisa abantu ukuba bakwazi ukufinyelela amasevisi atholakala ezindaweni zabo. 
Kusungulwe izakhiwo ezilungele izisulu eziteshini zamaphoyisa ezibhekana nobugebengu obukhulu.
Kuye kwenziwa izikhungo ezinobungane kwabayizisulu eziteshini zamaphoyisa ezisezindaweni ezigcwele ubugebengu.
Kusungulwe izizinda ezinozwelo kuzisulu eziteshini zamaphoyisa ezibhekana nobugebengu lapho ubugebengu benzeka phakathi kwabantu abazanayo noma lapho omunye azi omunye
Kukhona izinhlelo ezisungulelwe ukunakekelwa kwabahlukumezekile eziteshini zamaphoyisa la kudlange khona ubugebengu
Kuye kwenziwa izikhungo ezinobungane kwabayizisulu eziteshini zamaphoyisa ezisezindaweni ezigcwele ubugebengu.
Kusungulwe izizinda ezinozwelo kuzisulu eziteshini zamaphoyisa ezibhekana nobugebengu lapho ubugebengu benzeka phakathi kwabantu abazanayo noma lapho omunye azi omunye
Kukhona izinhlelo ezisungulelwe ukunakekelwa kwabahlukumezekile eziteshini zamaphoyisa la kudlange khona ubugebengu
Kusungulwe izakhiwo ezilungele izisulu eziteshini zamaphoyisa ezibhekana nobugebengu obukhulu.

Kukhona izinhlelo ezisungulelwe ukunakekelwa kwabahlukumezekile eziteshini zamaphoyisa la kudlange khona ubugebengu

Kuye kwenziwa izikhungo ezinobungane kwabayizisulu eziteshini zamaphoyisa ezisezindaweni ezigcwele ubugebengu.
Kukhona izinhlelo ezisungulelwe ukunakekelwa kwabahlukumezekile eziteshini zamaphoyisa la kudlange khona ubugebengu
Kusungulwe izakhiwo ezilungele izisulu eziteshini zamaphoyisa ezibhekana nobugebengu obukhulu.
Kuye kwenziwa izikhungo ezinobungane kwabayizisulu eziteshini zamaphoyisa ezisezindaweni ezigcwele ubugebengu.
Kusungulwe izizinda ezinozwelo kuzisulu eziteshini zamaphoyisa ezibhekana nobugebengu lapho ubugebengu benzeka phakathi kwabantu abazanayo noma lapho omunye azi omunye
Kwasungulwa Izinkantolo Eziqondene Namacala Ezocansi.
Kwakhiwe iziNkantolo Ezisebenza Ngamacala Ezocansi Kuphela.
Kwasungulwa Izinkantolo Ezizinikele Ezibhekele Amacala Ezocansi.
Kwasungululwa Nezinkantolo Ezibhekele Amacala Ocansi nje kuphela.
Kwakhiwe iziNkantolo Ezisebenza Ngamacala Ezocansi Kuphela.
Kwasungulwa Izinkantolo Ezizinikele Ezibhekele Amacala Ezocansi.
Kwasungululwa Nezinkantolo Ezibhekele Amacala Ocansi nje kuphela.
Kwasungulwa Izinkantolo Eziqondene Namacala Ezocansi.
Kwasungulwa Izinkantolo Ezizinikele Ezibhekele Amacala Ezocansi.
Kwasungululwa Nezinkantolo Ezibhekele Amacala Ocansi nje kuphela.
Kwasungulwa Izinkantolo Eziqondene Namacala Ezocansi.
Kwakhiwe iziNkantolo Ezisebenza Ngamacala Ezocansi Kuphela.
Kwasungululwa Nezinkantolo Ezibhekele Amacala Ocansi nje kuphela.
Kwasungulwa Izinkantolo Eziqondene Namacala Ezocansi.
Kwakhiwe iziNkantolo Ezisebenza Ngamacala Ezocansi Kuphela.
Kwasungulwa Izinkantolo Ezizinikele Ezibhekele Amacala Ezocansi.
UMthetho Wezodlame Lwasekhaya wahlinzekela ukusungulwa kwezakhiwo zokuphephela.
UMthetho Wodlame Lwasekhaya ubhekelele ukuba kwakhiwe izindawo zokukhosela. 
UMthetho Wodlame Lwasekhaya ubhekele ukusungulwa kwamakhaya abahlukumezekile. 
uMthetho Wokuhlukumezeka Emakhaya wabhekela ukusungulwa kwezindawo zokukhoselisa abahlukumezekile. 
UMthetho Wodlame Lwasekhaya ubhekelele ukuba kwakhiwe izindawo zokukhosela. 
UMthetho Wodlame Lwasekhaya ubhekele ukusungulwa kwamakhaya abahlukumezekile. 
uMthetho Wokuhlukumezeka Emakhaya wabhekela ukusungulwa kwezindawo zokukhoselisa abahlukumezekile. 
UMthetho Wezodlame Lwasekhaya wahlinzekela ukusungulwa kwezakhiwo zokuphephela.
UMthetho Wodlame Lwasekhaya ubhekele ukusungulwa kwamakhaya abahlukumezekile. 
uMthetho Wokuhlukumezeka Emakhaya wabhekela ukusungulwa kwezindawo zokukhoselisa abahlukumezekile. 
UMthetho Wezodlame Lwasekhaya wahlinzekela ukusungulwa kwezakhiwo zokuphephela.
UMthetho Wodlame Lwasekhaya ubhekelele ukuba kwakhiwe izindawo zokukhosela. 
uMthetho Wokuhlukumezeka Emakhaya wabhekela ukusungulwa kwezindawo zokukhoselisa abahlukumezekile. 
UMthetho Wezodlame Lwasekhaya wahlinzekela ukusungulwa kwezakhiwo zokuphephela.
UMthetho Wodlame Lwasekhaya ubhekelele ukuba kwakhiwe izindawo zokukhosela. 
UMthetho Wodlame Lwasekhaya ubhekele ukusungulwa kwamakhaya abahlukumezekile. 
Njengamanje kunezakhiwo zokuphephela ezingu-96 eNingizimu Afrika, njengoba zazingu-39 ngo-2001.
Njengamanje kunezindawo zokukhosela ezingu-96 eNingizimu Afrika, kusukela kwezingu-39 ngo-2001.
Njengamanje kunamakhaya abahlukumezekile angama-96 eNingizimu Afrika, ayengama-39 ngonyaka wezi-2001.
Sekunezindawo zokukhosela ezingama-96 eNingizimu Afrika, kusuka kwezingama-39 ngowezi-2001.
Njengamanje kunezindawo zokukhosela ezingu-96 eNingizimu Afrika, kusukela kwezingu-39 ngo-2001.
Njengamanje kunamakhaya abahlukumezekile angama-96 eNingizimu Afrika, ayengama-39 ngonyaka wezi-2001.
Sekunezindawo zokukhosela ezingama-96 eNingizimu Afrika, kusuka kwezingama-39 ngowezi-2001.
Njengamanje kunezakhiwo zokuphephela ezingu-96 eNingizimu Afrika, njengoba zazingu-39 ngo-2001.
Njengamanje kunamakhaya abahlukumezekile angama-96 eNingizimu Afrika, ayengama-39 ngonyaka wezi-2001.
Sekunezindawo zokukhosela ezingama-96 eNingizimu Afrika, kusuka kwezingama-39 ngowezi-2001.
Njengamanje kunezakhiwo zokuphephela ezingu-96 eNingizimu Afrika, njengoba zazingu-39 ngo-2001.
Njengamanje kunezindawo zokukhosela ezingu-96 eNingizimu Afrika, kusukela kwezingu-39 ngo-2001.
Sekunezindawo zokukhosela ezingama-96 eNingizimu Afrika, kusuka kwezingama-39 ngowezi-2001.
Njengamanje kunezakhiwo zokuphephela ezingu-96 eNingizimu Afrika, njengoba zazingu-39 ngo-2001.
Njengamanje kunezindawo zokukhosela ezingu-96 eNingizimu Afrika, kusukela kwezingu-39 ngo-2001.
Njengamanje kunamakhaya abahlukumezekile angama-96 eNingizimu Afrika, ayengama-39 ngonyaka wezi-2001.
Amalungelo akuSomqulu Wezisulu asethela izithelo ezibonakalayo kuzisulu zobugebengu ezibhekana noHlelo Lwezobulungiswa Olubhekela Ubugebengu
Amalungelo esiVumelwano Sezisulu ayasetshenziswa kubantu abayizisulu zobugebengu abathintana neSimiso Sezobulungiswa Samacala Obugebengu 
Amalungelo oMqulu Wezisulu ayabhekelelwa mayelana nezisulu zobugebengu ezizibandakanya Nohlelo Lwezobulungiswa
Amalungelo kuShatha yabahlukumeziwe ayabonakala kulabo abahlukumezwe izinswelaboya uma bexhumana Nohlelo Lwezobulungiswa Elimelene Nobugebengu
Amalungelo esiVumelwano Sezisulu ayasetshenziswa kubantu abayizisulu zobugebengu abathintana neSimiso Sezobulungiswa Samacala Obugebengu

Amalungelo akuSomqulu Wezisulu asethela izithelo ezibonakalayo kuzisulu zobugebengu ezibhekana noHlelo Lwezobulungiswa Olubhekela Ubugebengu
Amalungelo esiVumelwano Sezisulu ayasetshenziswa kubantu abayizisulu zobugebengu abathintana neSimiso Sezobulungiswa Samacala Obugebengu 
Amalungelo kuShatha yabahlukumeziwe ayabonakala kulabo abahlukumezwe izinswelaboya uma bexhumana Nohlelo Lwezobulungiswa Elimelene Nobugebengu
Amalungelo akuSomqulu Wezisulu asethela izithelo ezibonakalayo kuzisulu zobugebengu ezibhekana noHlelo Lwezobulungiswa Olubhekela Ubugebengu
Amalungelo esiVumelwano Sezisulu ayasetshenziswa kubantu abayizisulu zobugebengu abathintana neSimiso Sezobulungiswa Samacala Obugebengu 
Amalungelo oMqulu Wezisulu ayabhekelelwa mayelana nezisulu zobugebengu ezizibandakanya Nohlelo Lwezobulungiswa
USomqulu ubandakanya Imigomo Okungedlulwe ngaphansi kwayo ngemisebenzi Yezisulu Zobugebengu, uhlinzeka ngohlaka lwezomthetho lwezisulu ukuze kugcizelelwe amalungelo azo emisebenzini elindelekile evela oHlelweni Lwezobulungiswa Olubhekela Ubugebengu.
Lo Somqulu uhlanganisa neMigomo Okungedlulwe Ngaphansi Kwayo Yamasevisi Ezisulu Zobugebengu, eveza uhlaka olungokomthetho lokuba abayizisulu bagcizelele amalungelo abo mayelana namasevisi abawalindele eSimisweni Sezobulungisa Samacala Obugebengu.
Lo Mqulu ubandakanya uhlelo Lwamazinga Abekiwe Mayelana Namasevisi Ahlinzekwa Izisulu Zobugebengu okuqala ngawo uhlaka lwezomthetho ukuze uqinisekise amalungelo azo mayelana namasevisi alindelekile Ohlelweni Lwezobulungiswa.  
Le Shatha imbandakanya Amazinga Amasevisi anikezwa labo abahlukumezekile, okuyisekelo sohlaka lwezomthetho olubhekele abahlukumezwayo ukuze basebenzise amalungelo abo ngosizo abangalulindela Ohlelweni Lwezobulungiswa Olumelene Nobugebengu. 
Lo Somqulu uhlanganisa neMigomo Okungedlulwe Ngaphansi Kwayo Yamasevisi Ezisulu Zobugebengu, eveza uhlaka olungokomthetho lokuba abayizisulu bagcizelele amalungelo abo mayelana namasevisi abawalindele eSimisweni Sezobulungisa Samacala Obugebengu.
Lo Mqulu ubandakanya uhlelo Lwamazinga Abekiwe Mayelana Namasevisi Ahlinzekwa Izisulu Zobugebengu okuqala ngawo uhlaka lwezomthetho ukuze uqinisekise amalungelo azo mayelana namasevisi alindelekile Ohlelweni Lwezobulungiswa.  
Le Shatha imbandakanya Amazinga Amasevisi anikezwa labo abahlukumezekile, okuyisekelo sohlaka lwezomthetho olubhekele abahlukumezwayo ukuze basebenzise amalungelo abo ngosizo abangalulindela Ohlelweni Lwezobulungiswa Olumelene Nobugebengu.

Lo Mqulu ubandakanya uhlelo Lwamazinga Abekiwe Mayelana Namasevisi Ahlinzekwa Izisulu Zobugebengu okuqala ngawo uhlaka lwezomthetho ukuze uqinisekise amalungelo azo mayelana namasevisi alindelekile Ohlelweni Lwezobulungiswa.  
Ngokuqaliswa kukaSomqulu Wezisulu, isibalo sezinsuku okuqedwe ngazo icala eNkantolo Yamacala Ezocansi zehla zasuka ezinsukwini ezingama-285 kuya e-142.
Ngokusetshenziswa kwesiVumelwano Sesisulu, inani lezinsuku okwalithatha ukuqeda icala eNkantolo Yamacala Ezocansi lehla lisuka kwezingu-285 ukuya kwezingu-142.
Inani lezinsuku elithathwa ekuphothulweni kwecala Enkantolo Yamacala Ezocansi lehla kusukela ezinsukwini ezingama-285 kweziyi-142 ngokusebenzisa uMqulu Wezisulu.
Ngokusetshenziswa kukaSomqulu Wabahlukunyezwayo, zabe seziyancipha izinsuku ebeziye zithathwe uma kucutshungulwa udaba eNkantolo Yamacala Ocansi zisuka ema-285 zehlela e-142.
Ngokusetshenziswa kwesiVumelwano Sesisulu, inani lezinsuku okwalithatha ukuqeda icala eNkantolo Yamacala Ezocansi lehla lisuka kwezingu-285 ukuya kwezingu-142.
