Imisebenzi Yezempilo Yesikhathi sokukhulelwa (ngaphambi kokubeletha)
Amasevisi Ezempilo Angaphambi Kokubeletha
Amasevisi Ezempilo Okunakekela Abakhulelwe (ngaphambi kokubeletha)
Uhlelo Lwezempilo Lwabakhulelwe (Abangakabelethi)
Amasevisi Ezempilo Angaphambi Kokubeletha
Amasevisi Ezempilo Okunakekela Abakhulelwe (ngaphambi kokubeletha)
Uhlelo Lwezempilo Lwabakhulelwe (Abangakabelethi)
Imisebenzi Yezempilo Yesikhathi sokukhulelwa (ngaphambi kokubeletha)
Amasevisi Ezempilo Okunakekela Abakhulelwe (ngaphambi kokubeletha)
Uhlelo Lwezempilo Lwabakhulelwe (Abangakabelethi)
Imisebenzi Yezempilo Yesikhathi sokukhulelwa (ngaphambi kokubeletha)
Amasevisi Ezempilo Angaphambi Kokubeletha
Uhlelo Lwezempilo Lwabakhulelwe (Abangakabelethi)
Imisebenzi Yezempilo Yesikhathi sokukhulelwa (ngaphambi kokubeletha)
Amasevisi Ezempilo Angaphambi Kokubeletha
Amasevisi Ezempilo Okunakekela Abakhulelwe (ngaphambi kokubeletha)
Amantombazane kanye nabantu besifazane abakhulelwe badluliselwa ophikweni lwemisebenzi yezokubeletha noma kumaPhiko Ababelethisi (MOUs) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, kanye nasemitholampilo eyingxenye yemitholampilo emikhulu noma emitholampilo yasezindaweni zasemakhaya ezinzile.
Amantombazane nabesifazane abakhulelwe badluliselwa kumasevisi abakhulelwe noma emaGunjini Ababelethisi (MOUs) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, nasemitholampilo engomahambanendlwana noma eyakhelwe endaweni eyodwa ezindaweni zasemakhaya.
Amantombazane nabesifazane abakhulelwe badluliselwa kumasevisi aphathelene nokukhulelwa nokubeletha noma kumaYunithi Okubelethisa (ama-MOU) asezindaweni zasemadolobheni, nakuleyo mitholampilo yezibhedlela engekho emagcekeni ezibhedlela noma leyo mitholampilo okungeyona eyezibhedlela ezindaweni ezisemakhaya. 
Amantombazane nabesimame abakhulelwe badluliselwa kuzinhlelo zezokubeletha noma Izikhungo Zababelethisi (MOU) ezindaweni zasemadilobheni, nezikhungo ezingamasathelayithi noma amakliniki ezindaweni zasemaphandleni. 
Amantombazane nabesifazane abakhulelwe badluliselwa kumasevisi abakhulelwe noma emaGunjini Ababelethisi (MOUs) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, nasemitholampilo engomahambanendlwana noma eyakhelwe endaweni eyodwa ezindaweni zasemakhaya.
Amantombazane nabesifazane abakhulelwe badluliselwa kumasevisi aphathelene nokukhulelwa nokubeletha noma kumaYunithi Okubelethisa (ama-MOU) asezindaweni zasemadolobheni, nakuleyo mitholampilo yezibhedlela engekho emagcekeni ezibhedlela noma leyo mitholampilo okungeyona eyezibhedlela ezindaweni ezisemakhaya. 
Amantombazane nabesimame abakhulelwe badluliselwa kuzinhlelo zezokubeletha noma Izikhungo Zababelethisi (MOU) ezindaweni zasemadilobheni, nezikhungo ezingamasathelayithi noma amakliniki ezindaweni zasemaphandleni. 
Amantombazane kanye nabantu besifazane abakhulelwe badluliselwa ophikweni lwemisebenzi yezokubeletha noma kumaPhiko Ababelethisi (MOUs) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, kanye nasemitholampilo eyingxenye yemitholampilo emikhulu noma emitholampilo yasezindaweni zasemakhaya ezinzile.
Amantombazane nabesifazane abakhulelwe badluliselwa kumasevisi aphathelene nokukhulelwa nokubeletha noma kumaYunithi Okubelethisa (ama-MOU) asezindaweni zasemadolobheni, nakuleyo mitholampilo yezibhedlela engekho emagcekeni ezibhedlela noma leyo mitholampilo okungeyona eyezibhedlela ezindaweni ezisemakhaya. 
Amantombazane nabesimame abakhulelwe badluliselwa kuzinhlelo zezokubeletha noma Izikhungo Zababelethisi (MOU) ezindaweni zasemadilobheni, nezikhungo ezingamasathelayithi noma amakliniki ezindaweni zasemaphandleni. 
Amantombazane kanye nabantu besifazane abakhulelwe badluliselwa ophikweni lwemisebenzi yezokubeletha noma kumaPhiko Ababelethisi (MOUs) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, kanye nasemitholampilo eyingxenye yemitholampilo emikhulu noma emitholampilo yasezindaweni zasemakhaya ezinzile.
Amantombazane nabesifazane abakhulelwe badluliselwa kumasevisi abakhulelwe noma emaGunjini Ababelethisi (MOUs) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, nasemitholampilo engomahambanendlwana noma eyakhelwe endaweni eyodwa ezindaweni zasemakhaya.
Amantombazane nabesimame abakhulelwe badluliselwa kuzinhlelo zezokubeletha noma Izikhungo Zababelethisi (MOU) ezindaweni zasemadilobheni, nezikhungo ezingamasathelayithi noma amakliniki ezindaweni zasemaphandleni. 
Amantombazane kanye nabantu besifazane abakhulelwe badluliselwa ophikweni lwemisebenzi yezokubeletha noma kumaPhiko Ababelethisi (MOUs) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, kanye nasemitholampilo eyingxenye yemitholampilo emikhulu noma emitholampilo yasezindaweni zasemakhaya ezinzile.
Amantombazane nabesifazane abakhulelwe badluliselwa kumasevisi abakhulelwe noma emaGunjini Ababelethisi (MOUs) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, nasemitholampilo engomahambanendlwana noma eyakhelwe endaweni eyodwa ezindaweni zasemakhaya.
Amantombazane nabesifazane abakhulelwe badluliselwa kumasevisi aphathelene nokukhulelwa nokubeletha noma kumaYunithi Okubelethisa (ama-MOU) asezindaweni zasemadolobheni, nakuleyo mitholampilo yezibhedlela engekho emagcekeni ezibhedlela noma leyo mitholampilo okungeyona eyezibhedlela ezindaweni ezisemakhaya. 
Ama-MOU angamaphiko okubelethisa aqhutshwa ababelethisi kuziguli ezidinga ukunakekelwa okuyisisekelo emphakathini. 
Ama-MOU yizikhungo zokubelethisa eziqhutshwa ngababelethisi basemphakathini ezigulini ezidinga ukunakekela okuyinhloko kwezempilo. 
Ama-MOU angamayunithi okubelethisa alawulwa ngababelethisi emphakathini mayelana nonakekelo lwezempilo oluyisisekelo  lweziguli. 
Ama-MOU izindawo zokubelethela okusebenza kuzo ababelethisi emphakathini ezibhekele iziguli ezingeni lokuqala lokwelashwa. 
Ama-MOU yizikhungo zokubelethisa eziqhutshwa ngababelethisi basemphakathini ezigulini ezidinga ukunakekela okuyinhloko kwezempilo. 
Ama-MOU angamayunithi okubelethisa alawulwa ngababelethisi emphakathini mayelana nonakekelo lwezempilo oluyisisekelo  lweziguli. 
Ama-MOU izindawo zokubelethela okusebenza kuzo ababelethisi emphakathini ezibhekele iziguli ezingeni lokuqala lokwelashwa. 
Ama-MOU angamaphiko okubelethisa aqhutshwa ababelethisi kuziguli ezidinga ukunakekelwa okuyisisekelo emphakathini. 
Ama-MOU angamayunithi okubelethisa alawulwa ngababelethisi emphakathini mayelana nonakekelo lwezempilo oluyisisekelo  lweziguli.

Ama-MOU yizikhungo zokubelethisa eziqhutshwa ngababelethisi basemphakathini ezigulini ezidinga ukunakekela okuyinhloko kwezempilo. 
Ama-MOU angamayunithi okubelethisa alawulwa ngababelethisi emphakathini mayelana nonakekelo lwezempilo oluyisisekelo  lweziguli. 
Kuwumqondo omuhle ukuthi omama abalindele ukuthola abantwana babekisele ukuvakashela emtholampilo okokuqala ngaphambi kwamasonto angu 20 noma ngokushesha emuva kwalokho.
Omama abakhulelwe belulekwa ukuba babhukhele ukuza kwabo kokuqala emtholampilo ngaphambi kwamaviki angu-20 noma ngokushesha ngangokunokwenzeka ngemva kwalokho.
Ukunconywa ukuthi abomama abakhulelwe babhukhe ukuvakasha kwabo kokuqala emtholampilo ngaphambi kokuphela kwamasonto  angama-20 noma ngokushesha emva kwawo.
Omame abakhulelwe bayelulekwa ukuthi babhukhele ukuvakasha kwabo kokuqala engakahlangani amasonto angama-20 noma baphuthume uma esedlulile.

Umama uhlolwa okokuqala ngokugcwele futhi elulekwe uma efika okokuqala ukuzonakekelwa ngaphambi kokubeletha, okuphinde kubizwe ngokuthi ukuvakasha okubekisiwe.
Umama wenziwa ukuhlolwa kokuqala okugcwele nokwelulekwa lapho eza ekuvakasheni kokuqala kwangaphambi kokubeletha, okwaziwa nangokuthi ukuvakasha kokubhukha. 
Umama unikezwa ukuhlolwa kokuqala okuphelele kanye noluleko ngesikhathi efika ekuvakasheni kwakhe kokuqala okumayelana nokunakekelwa kwabakhulelwe, okubuye kwaziwe ngokuthiwa ukuvakasha okubhukhiwe. 
Umama uhlolwa ngokuphelele futhi anikwe izeluleko uma efika okokuqala ngokukhulelwa, okubuye kwaziwe ngokuvakasha kokubhukha. 
Umama wenziwa ukuhlolwa kokuqala okugcwele nokwelulekwa lapho eza ekuvakasheni kokuqala kwangaphambi kokubeletha, okwaziwa nangokuthi ukuvakasha kokubhukha.

Ukukhulelwa kuqashwa ngokuvama ukuvakashela ama-MOU ulandelela.
Ukukhulelwa kuqashwa ngokuvakasha kokulandelela okunziwa njalo. 
Ukukhulelwa kuqashelwa ngokusebenzisa ukulandelela kokuvakasha okuvamile. 
Uye abe eseyoxukuza ke umame ngezikhathi ezinqunyiwe kubhekwe ingane.

Nesimo sempilo sikamama siyaqashisiswa.
Impilo kamama nayo iqashwa kakhulu. 
Impilo kamama nayo iyabhekisiswa. 
Nempilo kamama iqashwa ngeso elibukhali.

Impilo kamama nayo iyabhekisiswa. 
Nempilo kamama iqashwa ngeso elibukhali.

Nempilo kamama iqashwa ngeso elibukhali. 
Nesimo sempilo sikamama siyaqashisiswa.
Impilo kamama nayo iqashwa kakhulu. 
Nempilo kamama iqashwa ngeso elibukhali. 
Nesimo sempilo sikamama siyaqashisiswa.
Impilo kamama nayo iqashwa kakhulu. 
Impilo kamama nayo iyabhekisiswa. 
Uzoklalwa isisindo, umfutho wegazi lakhe uyahlolwa kuphinde kuhlolwe nomchamo wakhe.
Uzokalwa isisindo, kuthathwe umfutho wakhe wegazi futhi kuhlolwe nomchamo. 
Uzokalwa isisindo, athathwe umfutho wegazi ahlolwe nomchamo. 
Ufakwa esikalini, ahlolwe umfutho wegazi nomchamo kanjalo. 
Uzokalwa isisindo, kuthathwe umfutho wakhe wegazi futhi kuhlolwe nomchamo. 
Uzokalwa isisindo, athathwe umfutho wegazi ahlolwe nomchamo. 
Ufakwa esikalini, ahlolwe umfutho wegazi nomchamo kanjalo.

Uzokalwa isisindo, athathwe umfutho wegazi ahlolwe nomchamo.

Uzokalwa isisindo, kuthathwe umfutho wakhe wegazi futhi kuhlolwe nomchamo. 
Ufakwa esikalini, ahlolwe umfutho wegazi nomchamo kanjalo. 
Uzoklalwa isisindo, umfutho wegazi lakhe uyahlolwa kuphinde kuhlolwe nomchamo wakhe.
Uzokalwa isisindo, kuthathwe umfutho wakhe wegazi futhi kuhlolwe nomchamo. 
Uzokalwa isisindo, athathwe umfutho wegazi ahlolwe nomchamo. 
Uma kungekho zinkinga, kumele abuye ukuzolandelela okokuqala emuva kwamasonto amabili ukuze athole imiphumela yokuhlolwa okwenziwe ngenkathi efika njengoba wayebekise indawo.
Uma kungekho zinkinga, kufanele abuye ekuvakasheni kwakhe kokuqala kokulandelela ngemva kwamaviki amabili azolanda imiphumela yokuhlolwa okwenziwa ngokuvakasha kokubhukha. 
Uma zingekho izinkinga, kumele abuye ngokulandelela kokuvakasha kwakhe kokuqala emva kwamasonto amabili ukuze athole imiphumela yokuhlolwa okwenziwa ngokuvakasha okubhukhiwe. 
Uma kungekho lutho olumxakayo, angabuya kovakasha futhi emva kwamasonto amabili azolanda imiphumela yokuhlolwa okwenziwa mhla eze kukuvakasha kokubhukha. 
Uma kungekho zinkinga, kufanele abuye ekuvakasheni kwakhe kokuqala kokulandelela ngemva kwamaviki amabili azolanda imiphumela yokuhlolwa okwenziwa ngokuvakasha kokubhukha. 
Uma zingekho izinkinga, kumele abuye ngokulandelela kokuvakasha kwakhe kokuqala emva kwamasonto amabili ukuze athole imiphumela yokuhlolwa okwenziwa ngokuvakasha okubhukhiwe. 
Uma kungekho lutho olumxakayo, angabuya kovakasha futhi emva kwamasonto amabili azolanda imiphumela yokuhlolwa okwenziwa mhla eze kukuvakasha kokubhukha. 
Uma kungekho zinkinga, kumele abuye ukuzolandelela okokuqala emuva kwamasonto amabili ukuze athole imiphumela yokuhlolwa okwenziwe ngenkathi efika njengoba wayebekise indawo.

Uma kungekho zinkinga, kumele abuye ukuzolandelela okokuqala emuva kwamasonto amabili ukuze athole imiphumela yokuhlolwa okwenziwe ngenkathi efika njengoba wayebekise indawo.
Uma kungekho zinkinga, kufanele abuye ekuvakasheni kwakhe kokuqala kokulandelela ngemva kwamaviki amabili azolanda imiphumela yokuhlolwa okwenziwa ngokuvakasha kokubhukha. 
Uma zingekho izinkinga, kumele abuye ngokulandelela kokuvakasha kwakhe kokuqala emva kwamasonto amabili ukuze athole imiphumela yokuhlolwa okwenziwa ngokuvakasha okubhukhiwe. 
Emuva kwalokhu, kumele abuyele emtholampilo njalo emasontweni ayisithupha kuze kube amasonto angu 28, bese kube amasonto angu 34, emuva kwalokho  njengoba kusho umsebenzi wasemtholampilo/MOU (ukufika ngokuvamile kungahluka ngokwezindawo).
Ngemva kwalokhu, kumele abuyele emtholampilo njalo emavikini ayisithupha kuze kube ngamaviki angama-28, bese eza emavikini angama-34, ngemva kwalokho njengoba kuboniswe ngabasebenzi basemtholampilo/MOU (ukuthi uza kaningi kangakanani kungase kuhluke kuye ngezindawo).
Emva kwalokhu, kumele abuyele emtholampilo njalo emva kwamasonto ayisithupha kufikela emasontweni angama-28, bese kuba amasonto angama-34 emva kwalokho njengokusho komtholampilo/kwabasebenzi e-MOU (izikhathi okuvakasha zingehluka kuleyo nakuleyo ndawo).
Emva kwalokhu, kufanele aphindele ekliniki njalo emva kwamasonto ayisithupha kuze kuhlangane amasonto okukhulelwa angama-28, bese efika futhi emva kwamasonto angama-34, emva kwaloko eze njengoba kuzobe kusho abasebenza ekliniki/MOU (kuyehluka-ke ngezindawo ngezindawo).
Ngemva kwalokhu, kumele abuyele emtholampilo njalo emavikini ayisithupha kuze kube ngamaviki angama-28, bese eza emavikini angama-34, ngemva kwalokho njengoba kuboniswe ngabasebenzi basemtholampilo/MOU (ukuthi uza kaningi kangakanani kungase kuhluke kuye ngezindawo).
Emva kwalokhu, kumele abuyele emtholampilo njalo emva kwamasonto ayisithupha kufikela emasontweni angama-28, bese kuba amasonto angama-34 emva kwalokho njengokusho komtholampilo/kwabasebenzi e-MOU (izikhathi okuvakasha zingehluka kuleyo nakuleyo ndawo).
Emva kwalokhu, kufanele aphindele ekliniki njalo emva kwamasonto ayisithupha kuze kuhlangane amasonto okukhulelwa angama-28, bese efika futhi emva kwamasonto angama-34, emva kwaloko eze njengoba kuzobe kusho abasebenza ekliniki/MOU (kuyehluka-ke ngezindawo ngezindawo).
Emuva kwalokhu, kumele abuyele emtholampilo njalo emasontweni ayisithupha kuze kube amasonto angu 28, bese kube amasonto angu 34, emuva kwalokho  njengoba kusho umsebenzi wasemtholampilo/MOU (ukufika ngokuvamile kungahluka ngokwezindawo).

Ngemva kwalokhu, kumele abuyele emtholampilo njalo emavikini ayisithupha kuze kube ngamaviki angama-28, bese eza emavikini angama-34, ngemva kwalokho njengoba kuboniswe ngabasebenzi basemtholampilo/MOU (ukuthi uza kaningi kangakanani kungase kuhluke kuye ngezindawo).
Emva kwalokhu, kumele abuyele emtholampilo njalo emva kwamasonto ayisithupha kufikela emasontweni angama-28, bese kuba amasonto angama-34 emva kwalokho njengokusho komtholampilo/kwabasebenzi e-MOU (izikhathi okuvakasha zingehluka kuleyo nakuleyo ndawo).
Omama abakhulelwe bahlolelwa ukubheka ukuthi azikho na izifo ezibeka impilo yabo neyombungu engcupheni.
Omama abakhulelwe bayahlungwa ukuze kubonakale izingozi ezingase zibe khona empilweni yabo nasempilweni yombungu. 
Omama abakhulelwe bahlungelwa mayelana nezingozi ezingabakhona empilweni yabo nasempilweni yombungu. 
Omame abakhulelwe bahlolelwa okungahle kube yingozi empilweni yabo nasempilweni yengane. 
Omama abakhulelwe bayahlungwa ukuze kubonakale izingozi ezingase zibe khona empilweni yabo nasempilweni yombungu. 
Omama abakhulelwe bahlungelwa mayelana nezingozi ezingabakhona empilweni yabo nasempilweni yombungu. 
Omame abakhulelwe bahlolelwa okungahle kube yingozi empilweni yabo nasempilweni yengane. 
Omama abakhulelwe bahlolelwa ukubheka ukuthi azikho na izifo ezibeka impilo yabo neyombungu engcupheni.
Omama abakhulelwe bahlungelwa mayelana nezingozi ezingabakhona empilweni yabo nasempilweni yombungu. 
Omame abakhulelwe bahlolelwa okungahle kube yingozi empilweni yabo nasempilweni yengane. 
Omama abakhulelwe bahlolelwa ukubheka ukuthi azikho na izifo ezibeka impilo yabo neyombungu engcupheni.
Omama abakhulelwe bayahlungwa ukuze kubonakale izingozi ezingase zibe khona empilweni yabo nasempilweni yombungu. 
Omame abakhulelwe bahlolelwa okungahle kube yingozi empilweni yabo nasempilweni yengane. 
Omama abakhulelwe bahlolelwa ukubheka ukuthi azikho na izifo ezibeka impilo yabo neyombungu engcupheni.
Omama abakhulelwe bayahlungwa ukuze kubonakale izingozi ezingase zibe khona empilweni yabo nasempilweni yombungu. 
Omama abakhulelwe bahlungelwa mayelana nezingozi ezingabakhona empilweni yabo nasempilweni yombungu. 
Amantombazane asemancane kanye nabantu besifazane abaneminyaka engaphezu kwa 35 abakhulelwe bathathwa ngokuthi bangabantu abasengcupheni enkulu.
Kokubili amantombazane asemasha nabesifazane abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka-35 ubudala abakhulelwe babhekwa njengabasengozini enkulu. 
Amantombazane asekhulakhulile nabesifazane abangaphezu kweminyaka engama-35 yobudala abakhulelwe bathathwa njengezimo ezisezingeni eliphezulu lobungozi. 
Amatshitshi nabesimamme abakhulelwe abangaphezu kweminyaka engama-35 bathathwa njengabasebucayini obuphezulu. 
Kokubili amantombazane asemasha nabesifazane abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka-35 ubudala abakhulelwe babhekwa njengabasengozini enkulu.

Lokhu kusho ukuthi banamathuba amaningi okubhekana nezinkinga ngesikhathi bekhulelwe nalapho sebebeletha.
Lokhu kusho ukuthi basethubeni elikhulu lokuba nezinkinga ngenkathi yokukhulelwa nokuzala. 
Lokhu kusho ukuthi maningi amathuba okuba babe nezinkinga ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa nesokubeletha. 
Lokhu kusho ukuthi makhulu amathuba okuthi babe nezinkinga besakhulelwe nangenkathi sebebeletha. 
Lokhu kusho ukuthi basethubeni elikhulu lokuba nezinkinga ngenkathi yokukhulelwa nokuzala. 
Lokhu kusho ukuthi maningi amathuba okuba babe nezinkinga ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa nesokubeletha. 
Lokhu kusho ukuthi makhulu amathuba okuthi babe nezinkinga besakhulelwe nangenkathi sebebeletha. 
Lokhu kusho ukuthi banamathuba amaningi okubhekana nezinkinga ngesikhathi bekhulelwe nalapho sebebeletha.
Lokhu kusho ukuthi maningi amathuba okuba babe nezinkinga ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa nesokubeletha. 
Lokhu kusho ukuthi makhulu amathuba okuthi babe nezinkinga besakhulelwe nangenkathi sebebeletha. 
Lokhu kusho ukuthi banamathuba amaningi okubhekana nezinkinga ngesikhathi bekhulelwe nalapho sebebeletha.
Lokhu kusho ukuthi basethubeni elikhulu lokuba nezinkinga ngenkathi yokukhulelwa nokuzala. 
Lokhu kusho ukuthi makhulu amathuba okuthi babe nezinkinga besakhulelwe nangenkathi sebebeletha. 
Lokhu kusho ukuthi banamathuba amaningi okubhekana nezinkinga ngesikhathi bekhulelwe nalapho sebebeletha.
Lokhu kusho ukuthi basethubeni elikhulu lokuba nezinkinga ngenkathi yokukhulelwa nokuzala. 
Lokhu kusho ukuthi maningi amathuba okuba babe nezinkinga ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa nesokubeletha. 
Abantu besifazane abakhulelwe bangathathwa ngokuthi basengcupheni enkulu uma umfutho wegazi wabo uphezulu, benomlando wezifo ezitholakala ngofuzo, bethwele amawele noma ngaphezulu kanye nalapho uma bake bahlinzwa njengokubeletha ngokuhlinzwa.
Abesifazane abakhulelwe nabo bangase babhekwe njengabasengozini enkulu uma benomfutho wegazi ophezulu, umlando wezifo zezakhi zofuzo, ukukhulelwa umbungu ongaphezu kowodwa futhi uma beke bahlinzwa phambilini njengokuhlinzwa kokubeletha.  
Abesifazane abakhulelwe nabo bangathathwa njengabasezingeni eliphezulu lobungozi, uma benomfutho wegazi ophezulu, umlando wokuphazamiseka kwamajini, ukukhulelwa kaningi noma uma bake bahlinzwa ngaphambilini njengokubeletha ngokuhlinzwa. 
Omame abakhulelwe bathathwa njengabasebucayini uma umfutho wegazi labo unyukile, uma benomlandu wezinkinga ngokofuzo, uma bengaqali ukukhulelwa noma uma beke bahlinzwa phambilini njengokubeletha ngomthungo nje. 
Abesifazane abakhulelwe nabo bangase babhekwe njengabasengozini enkulu uma benomfutho wegazi ophezulu, umlando wezifo zezakhi zofuzo, ukukhulelwa umbungu ongaphezu kowodwa futhi uma beke bahlinzwa phambilini njengokuhlinzwa kokubeletha.

Abesifazane abakhulelwe nabo bangathathwa njengabasezingeni eliphezulu lobungozi, uma benomfutho wegazi ophezulu, umlando wokuphazamiseka kwamajini, ukukhulelwa kaningi noma uma bake bahlinzwa ngaphambilini njengokubeletha ngokuhlinzwa. 
Omama okutholakale ukuthi basengcupheni enkulu badluliselwa emitholampilo yeziguli ezikhulelwe ezingalaliswa ezibhedlela ezisezingeni lokudluliselwa noma okudluliselwa kuzo iziguli ukuze zinakekelwe ochwepheshe, lapho kuqhutshekwa khona nophenyo kanye nokuhlola.
Omama abatholwa besengozini enkulu badluliselwa phambili emitholampilo yangaphambi kokubeletha yeziguli ezelashelwa ngaphandle zingalali ezibhedlela ezinkudlwana noma zezinga eliphezulu, lapho kwenziwa khona ucwaningo oluqhubekayo nokuhlolwa kokuhlunga. 
Omama okutholakala ukuthi basezingeni eliphezulu lobungozi badluliselwa phezulu emgqeni yemitholampilo yonakekelo lweziguli ezingalalisiwe esibhedlela ezibhedlela zamazinga aphakeme noma aphezulu lapho kwenziwa khona olunye ucwaningo nokuhlola kokuhlunga. 
Omame abahlonzwe njengabasebucayini baye badluliselwe kunakekelo oluthe thuthu lwasezibhedlela ezijwayelekile kumbe ezokufunda bengezukulaliswa, ukuze benziwe ukuhlolwa okwengeziwe. 
Omama abatholwa besengozini enkulu badluliselwa phambili emitholampilo yangaphambi kokubeletha yeziguli ezelashelwa ngaphandle zingalali ezibhedlela ezinkudlwana noma zezinga eliphezulu, lapho kwenziwa khona ucwaningo oluqhubekayo nokuhlolwa kokuhlunga.

Omama abakhulelwe abasengcupheni enkulu balulekwa ukuthi bahambele imitholampilo yeziguli ezikhulelwe ezingalaliswa njalo uma kunesidingo. 
Omama abanokukhulelwa okusengozini enkulu belulekwa ukuba baye kaningi ngangokunokwenzeka emitholampilo yangaphambi kokubeletha yeziguli ezingalali.
Omama abasezingeni eliphezulu lobungozi bayalwa ukuba bavakashele imitholampilo yonakekelo lwabakhulelwe oluhlinzekwa iziguli ezingalalisiwe ezibhedlela kaningi ngokudingekayo.
Omame abakukhulelwa kwabo kusebucayini bayelulekwa  ukuthi baye kothamela amakilasi abakhulelwe ezibhedlela kaningi ngokungenzeka.
Omama abanokukhulelwa okusengozini enkulu belulekwa ukuba baye kaningi ngangokunokwenzeka emitholampilo yangaphambi kokubeletha yeziguli ezingalali.

Uma uqala ukuya emtholampilo, uzocelwa ukuthi ugcwalise ifomu bese uvulelwe ifayela.
Uma uyisivakashi esiqalayo ngqa kulesi khungo sezempilo, uzocelwa ukuba ugcwalise ifomu futhi uzovulelwa ifolda. 
Uma uyisivakashi esiqalayo esizindeni sezempilo, uzocelwa ukuba ugcwalise ifomu kuzobe sekuvulwa ifayili. 
Uma uvakasha okokuqala esikhungweni sezempilo, uzocelwa ukuthi ugcwalise ifomu uzobe usuvulelwa ifolda. 
Uma uyisivakashi esiqalayo ngqa kulesi khungo sezempilo, uzocelwa ukuba ugcwalise ifomu futhi uzovulelwa ifolda. 
Uma uyisivakashi esiqalayo esizindeni sezempilo, uzocelwa ukuba ugcwalise ifomu kuzobe sekuvulwa ifayili. 
Uma uvakasha okokuqala esikhungweni sezempilo, uzocelwa ukuthi ugcwalise ifomu uzobe usuvulelwa ifolda. 
Uma uqala ukuya emtholampilo, uzocelwa ukuthi ugcwalise ifomu bese uvulelwe ifayela.
Uma uyisivakashi esiqalayo esizindeni sezempilo, uzocelwa ukuba ugcwalise ifomu kuzobe sekuvulwa ifayili. 
Uma uvakasha okokuqala esikhungweni sezempilo, uzocelwa ukuthi ugcwalise ifomu uzobe usuvulelwa ifolda. 
Uma uqala ukuya emtholampilo, uzocelwa ukuthi ugcwalise ifomu bese uvulelwe ifayela.
Uma uyisivakashi esiqalayo ngqa kulesi khungo sezempilo, uzocelwa ukuba ugcwalise ifomu futhi uzovulelwa ifolda. 
Uma uvakasha okokuqala esikhungweni sezempilo, uzocelwa ukuthi ugcwalise ifomu uzobe usuvulelwa ifolda. 
Uma uqala ukuya emtholampilo, uzocelwa ukuthi ugcwalise ifomu bese uvulelwe ifayela.
Uma uyisivakashi esiqalayo ngqa kulesi khungo sezempilo, uzocelwa ukuba ugcwalise ifomu futhi uzovulelwa ifolda. 
Uma uyisivakashi esiqalayo esizindeni sezempilo, uzocelwa ukuba ugcwalise ifomu kuzobe sekuvulwa ifayili. 
Phatha umazisi wakho, nanoma eyiphi imithi oyisebenzisayo kanye nekhadi lasemtholampilo noma lasesibhedlela, uma wake wabhaliswa emtholampilo.
Woza nencwadi yakho kamazisi, nanoma yimiphi imithi oyiphuzayo kanye nekhadi lasemtholampilo noma lasesibhedlela, uma wake wabhaliswa phambilini kuleso sikhungo.
Zana nencwadi yakho kamazisi, noma yimuphi umuthi owusebenzisayo kanye nekhadi lasemtholampilo noma lasesibhedlela, uma wabhalisa kulesi sizinda phambilini. 
Ufike nomazisi wakho i-ID, imithi oyiphuzayo nekhadi lakho lasekliniki noma lasesibhedlela, uma wake wabhalisa esikhungweni phambilini. 
Woza nencwadi yakho kamazisi, nanoma yimiphi imithi oyiphuzayo kanye nekhadi lasemtholampilo noma lasesibhedlela, uma wake wabhaliswa phambilini kuleso sikhungo.

Woza nencwadi yakho kamazisi, nanoma yimiphi imithi oyiphuzayo kanye nekhadi lasemtholampilo noma lasesibhedlela, uma wake wabhaliswa phambilini kuleso sikhungo.
Zana nencwadi yakho kamazisi, noma yimuphi umuthi owusebenzisayo kanye nekhadi lasemtholampilo noma lasesibhedlela, uma wabhalisa kulesi sizinda phambilini. 
Abantu abakhulelwe abangekho engcupheni enkulu baphathwa kuma-MOU (amaphiko okubelethisa aqhutshwa ababelethisi ezigulini ezidinga ukunakekelwa okuyisisekelo emphakathini) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, kanye nasemitholampilo eyingxenye yemitholampilo emikhulu noma emitholampilo yasezindaweni zasemakhaya ezinzile.
Ukukhulelwa okungeyona ingozi kusingathwa kuma-MOU (izindawo zokubeletha eziqhutshwa ngababelethisi emphakathini ezigulini zokunakekelwa kwempilo okuyinhloko) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, nasemitholampilo engomahambanendlwana kanye neyakhelwe endaweni eyodwa ezindaweni zasemaphandleni.
Ukukhulelwa okusezingeni eliphansi lobungozi kulawulwa kuma-MOU (amayunithi okubelethisa alawulwa ngababelethisi emphakathini mayelana nonakekelo lwezempilo oluyisisekelo  lweziguli) ezindaweni ezisemadolobheni, nasemitholampilo yezibhedlela engekho emagcekeni ezibhedlela nakuleyo mitholampilo okungeyona eyezibhedlela ezindaweni ezisemakhaya.
Abangekho sebucayini bekhulelwe babhekwa kuma-MOU (izizinda zokubelethela okusebenza kuzo ababelethisi basemphakathini ababhekele impilo yeziguli) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, nezikhungo ezingamasathelayithi noma amakliniki ezindaweni zasemaphandleni.
Ukukhulelwa okungeyona ingozi kusingathwa kuma-MOU (izindawo zokubeletha eziqhutshwa ngababelethisi emphakathini ezigulini zokunakekelwa kwempilo okuyinhloko) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, nasemitholampilo engomahambanendlwana kanye neyakhelwe endaweni eyodwa ezindaweni zasemaphandleni.
Ukukhulelwa okusezingeni eliphansi lobungozi kulawulwa kuma-MOU (amayunithi okubelethisa alawulwa ngababelethisi emphakathini mayelana nonakekelo lwezempilo oluyisisekelo  lweziguli) ezindaweni ezisemadolobheni, nasemitholampilo yezibhedlela engekho emagcekeni ezibhedlela nakuleyo mitholampilo okungeyona eyezibhedlela ezindaweni ezisemakhaya.
Abangekho sebucayini bekhulelwe babhekwa kuma-MOU (izizinda zokubelethela okusebenza kuzo ababelethisi basemphakathini ababhekele impilo yeziguli) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, nezikhungo ezingamasathelayithi noma amakliniki ezindaweni zasemaphandleni.
Abantu abakhulelwe abangekho engcupheni enkulu baphathwa kuma-MOU (amaphiko okubelethisa aqhutshwa ababelethisi ezigulini ezidinga ukunakekelwa okuyisisekelo emphakathini) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, kanye nasemitholampilo eyingxenye yemitholampilo emikhulu noma emitholampilo yasezindaweni zasemakhaya ezinzile.
Ukukhulelwa okusezingeni eliphansi lobungozi kulawulwa kuma-MOU (amayunithi okubelethisa alawulwa ngababelethisi emphakathini mayelana nonakekelo lwezempilo oluyisisekelo  lweziguli) ezindaweni ezisemadolobheni, nasemitholampilo yezibhedlela engekho emagcekeni ezibhedlela nakuleyo mitholampilo okungeyona eyezibhedlela ezindaweni ezisemakhaya.
Abangekho sebucayini bekhulelwe babhekwa kuma-MOU (izizinda zokubelethela okusebenza kuzo ababelethisi basemphakathini ababhekele impilo yeziguli) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, nezikhungo ezingamasathelayithi noma amakliniki ezindaweni zasemaphandleni.
Abantu abakhulelwe abangekho engcupheni enkulu baphathwa kuma-MOU (amaphiko okubelethisa aqhutshwa ababelethisi ezigulini ezidinga ukunakekelwa okuyisisekelo emphakathini) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, kanye nasemitholampilo eyingxenye yemitholampilo emikhulu noma emitholampilo yasezindaweni zasemakhaya ezinzile.
Ukukhulelwa okungeyona ingozi kusingathwa kuma-MOU (izindawo zokubeletha eziqhutshwa ngababelethisi emphakathini ezigulini zokunakekelwa kwempilo okuyinhloko) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, nasemitholampilo engomahambanendlwana kanye neyakhelwe endaweni eyodwa ezindaweni zasemaphandleni.
Abangekho sebucayini bekhulelwe babhekwa kuma-MOU (izizinda zokubelethela okusebenza kuzo ababelethisi basemphakathini ababhekele impilo yeziguli) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, nezikhungo ezingamasathelayithi noma amakliniki ezindaweni zasemaphandleni.
Abantu abakhulelwe abangekho engcupheni enkulu baphathwa kuma-MOU (amaphiko okubelethisa aqhutshwa ababelethisi ezigulini ezidinga ukunakekelwa okuyisisekelo emphakathini) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, kanye nasemitholampilo eyingxenye yemitholampilo emikhulu noma emitholampilo yasezindaweni zasemakhaya ezinzile.
Ukukhulelwa okungeyona ingozi kusingathwa kuma-MOU (izindawo zokubeletha eziqhutshwa ngababelethisi emphakathini ezigulini zokunakekelwa kwempilo okuyinhloko) ezindaweni zasemadolobheni, nasemitholampilo engomahambanendlwana kanye neyakhelwe endaweni eyodwa ezindaweni zasemaphandleni.
Ukukhulelwa okusezingeni eliphansi lobungozi kulawulwa kuma-MOU (amayunithi okubelethisa alawulwa ngababelethisi emphakathini mayelana nonakekelo lwezempilo oluyisisekelo  lweziguli) ezindaweni ezisemadolobheni, nasemitholampilo yezibhedlela engekho emagcekeni ezibhedlela nakuleyo mitholampilo okungeyona eyezibhedlela ezindaweni ezisemakhaya.
Abantu abakhulelwe abasengcupheni enkulu baphathwa emitholampilo enakekela iziguli ezigulela emakhaya ezindaweni zasemadolobheni kanye nasezibhedlela zezifunda ezindaweni zasemakhaya kanye nasezibhedlela okudluliselwa kuzo iziguli ukuze zinakekelwe ochwepheshe.
Ukukhulelwa okusengozini enkulu kusingathwa emitholampilo yeziguli ezingalali ezibhedlela zasemadolobheni nezezigodi zasemaphandleni nasesibhedlela zezinga eliphezulu.
Ukukhulelwa okusezingeni eliphezulu lobungozi kulawulwa emitholampilo yeziguli ezingalalisiwe esibhedlela yezibhedlela ezisemakhaya nezibhedlela zesifunda nezibhedlela zamazinga aphakeme.
Abakhulelwe okuthiwe basebucayini bona babhekwa kumakliniki eziguli ezingalaliswa asezibhedlela zasemadilobheni noma zasemaphandleni zesifunda kanye nezokufunda.
Ukukhulelwa okusengozini enkulu kusingathwa emitholampilo yeziguli ezingalali ezibhedlela zasemadolobheni nezezigodi zasemaphandleni nasesibhedlela zezinga eliphezulu.
Ukukhulelwa okusezingeni eliphezulu lobungozi kulawulwa emitholampilo yeziguli ezingalalisiwe esibhedlela yezibhedlela ezisemakhaya nezibhedlela zesifunda nezibhedlela zamazinga aphakeme.

Uhlelo Lwezondlamzimba Oludidiyele
Uhlelo Oluhlangene Lokudla Okunomsoco
Uhlelo Lokudla Oludidiyelwe
Uhlelo Oludidiyele Lokuhlinzeka Ukudla okunomsoco
Uhlelo Oluhlangene Lokudla Okunomsoco
Uhlelo Lokudla Oludidiyelwe
Uhlelo Oludidiyele Lokuhlinzeka Ukudla okunomsoco
Uhlelo Lwezondlamzimba Oludidiyele
Uhlelo Lokudla Oludidiyelwe
Uhlelo Oludidiyele Lokuhlinzeka Ukudla okunomsoco
Uhlelo Lwezondlamzimba Oludidiyele
Uhlelo Oluhlangene Lokudla Okunomsoco
Uhlelo Oludidiyele Lokuhlinzeka Ukudla okunomsoco
Uhlelo Lwezondlamzimba Oludidiyele
Uhlelo Oluhlangene Lokudla Okunomsoco
Uhlelo Lokudla Oludidiyelwe
Uhlelo Lwezondlamzimba Oludidiyele (INP) luhlose ukuthuthukisa isimo sokondleka kwabo bonke abantu abahlala esifundazweni saseNtshonalanga Kapa.
Uhlelo Oluhlangene Lokudla Okunomsoco (INP) luhloselwe ukuthuthukisa isimo sokuthola ukudla okunomsoco sabo bonke abantu abahlala esifundazweni saseWestern Cape. 
Uhlelo Lokudla Oludidiyelwe (i-INP) kuhloswe ngalo ukwenza ngcono isimo sokudla sabo bonke abantu abahlala esifundazweni zaseNtshonalanga Kapa.
Uhlelo Oludidiyele Lokuhlinzeka ukudla okunomsoco (INP) lunenjongo yokuphucula ukondleka kwabo bonke abantu abahlala esifundazweni saseNtshonalanga Kapa.
Uhlelo Oluhlangene Lokudla Okunomsoco (INP) luhloselwe ukuthuthukisa isimo sokuthola ukudla okunomsoco sabo bonke abantu abahlala esifundazweni saseWestern Cape. 
Uhlelo Lokudla Oludidiyelwe (i-INP) kuhloswe ngalo ukwenza ngcono isimo sokudla sabo bonke abantu abahlala esifundazweni zaseNtshonalanga Kapa.

Kuyini ukungondleki?
Kuyini ukungondleki?
Kusho ukuthini ukungondleki emzimbeni?
Siyini isifo sokungondleki ngomsoco?
Kuyini ukungondleki?

Siyini isifo sokungondleki ngomsoco?
Kuyini ukungondleki?

Siyini isifo sokungondleki ngomsoco?

Kuyini ukungondleki?
Siyini isifo sokungondleki ngomsoco?
Kuyini ukungondleki?
Kuyini ukungondleki?
Kusho ukuthini ukungondleki emzimbeni?
Ukungondleki kuyinkinga enkulu eNingizimu Afrika futhi kuyingxenye yalokho okunomthelela omkhulu ekuguleni nasekushoneni kwezingane.
Ukungondleki kuyinkinga enkulu eNingizimu Afrika futhi kungenye yezinto ezineqhaza elikhulu kunazo zonke lokugula nokufa kwezingane.
Ukungondleki emzimbeni kuyinkinga enkulu eNingizimu Afrika futhi kungenye yezinto ezidala ukugula nokufa kwezingane.
Ukuswela umsoco kuyinkinga enkulu eNingizimu Afrika kanti kungenye yezimbangela eziqavile zokugula nokufa ezinganeni. 
Ukungondleki kuyinkinga enkulu eNingizimu Afrika futhi kungenye yezinto ezineqhaza elikhulu kunazo zonke lokugula nokufa kwezingane.
Ukungondleki emzimbeni kuyinkinga enkulu eNingizimu Afrika futhi kungenye yezinto ezidala ukugula nokufa kwezingane.
Ukuswela umsoco kuyinkinga enkulu eNingizimu Afrika kanti kungenye yezimbangela eziqavile zokugula nokufa ezinganeni. 
Ukungondleki kuyinkinga enkulu eNingizimu Afrika futhi kuyingxenye yalokho okunomthelela omkhulu ekuguleni nasekushoneni kwezingane.
Ukungondleki emzimbeni kuyinkinga enkulu eNingizimu Afrika futhi kungenye yezinto ezidala ukugula nokufa kwezingane.
Ukuswela umsoco kuyinkinga enkulu eNingizimu Afrika kanti kungenye yezimbangela eziqavile zokugula nokufa ezinganeni. 
Ukungondleki kuyinkinga enkulu eNingizimu Afrika futhi kuyingxenye yalokho okunomthelela omkhulu ekuguleni nasekushoneni kwezingane.
Ukungondleki kuyinkinga enkulu eNingizimu Afrika futhi kungenye yezinto ezineqhaza elikhulu kunazo zonke lokugula nokufa kwezingane.
Ukuswela umsoco kuyinkinga enkulu eNingizimu Afrika kanti kungenye yezimbangela eziqavile zokugula nokufa ezinganeni. 
Ukungondleki kuyinkinga enkulu eNingizimu Afrika futhi kuyingxenye yalokho okunomthelela omkhulu ekuguleni nasekushoneni kwezingane.
Ukungondleki kuyinkinga enkulu eNingizimu Afrika futhi kungenye yezinto ezineqhaza elikhulu kunazo zonke lokugula nokufa kwezingane.
Ukungondleki emzimbeni kuyinkinga enkulu eNingizimu Afrika futhi kungenye yezinto ezidala ukugula nokufa kwezingane.
Zilinganiselwa kuma-30% izingane zaseNingizimu Afrika ezibhekene nokushoda kokudla okunezondlamzimba ebuncaneni bazo.
Kulinganiselwa ukuthi izingane zaseNingizimu Afrika ezingaba ngu-30% azikhuli kahle ngenxa yokuntuleka kokudla okwanele okunomsoco eminyakeni yokuqala yokuphila kwazo.
Izingane zaseNingizimu Afrika ezingakhuli kahle ngenxa yokungondleki ngokulingene eminyakeni yokuqala yempilo zazo zilinganiselwa kuma-30% .
Zilinganiselwa kuma-30% izingane zaseNingizimu Afrika ezibhashile ngenxa yokungatholi umsoco owenele uma zisencane.
Kulinganiselwa ukuthi izingane zaseNingizimu Afrika ezingaba ngu-30% azikhuli kahle ngenxa yokuntuleka kokudla okwanele okunomsoco eminyakeni yokuqala yokuphila kwazo.
Izingane zaseNingizimu Afrika ezingakhuli kahle ngenxa yokungondleki ngokulingene eminyakeni yokuqala yempilo zazo zilinganiselwa kuma-30% .
Zilinganiselwa kuma-30% izingane zaseNingizimu Afrika ezibhashile ngenxa yokungatholi umsoco owenele uma zisencane.

Zilinganiselwa kuma-30% izingane zaseNingizimu Afrika ezibhekene nokushoda kokudla okunezondlamzimba ebuncaneni bazo.
Kulinganiselwa ukuthi izingane zaseNingizimu Afrika ezingaba ngu-30% azikhuli kahle ngenxa yokuntuleka kokudla okwanele okunomsoco eminyakeni yokuqala yokuphila kwazo.
Izingane zaseNingizimu Afrika ezingakhuli kahle ngenxa yokungondleki ngokulingene eminyakeni yokuqala yempilo zazo zilinganiselwa kuma-30% .
Ukungakudli ukudla okwanele, ukugula kanye nokuba nengcindezi emqondweni ngokwezenhlakalahle/ukwethuka kuyimbangela enkulu edala ukushoda kwezondlamzimba ngaleso sikhathi.
Ukudla ukudla okungenele, ukugula nokucindezeleka/ukuhlukumezeka kwengqondo ngenxa yezenhlalo yikho okuyizimbangela ezishesha kakhulu zokungondleki.
Ukungadli ukudla okwanele, ukugula nengcindezi yengqondo neyenhlalakahle/usizi yizo izinto ezinkulu ezidala ukungondleki kahle emzimbeni.
Ukungadli ngokwenele, ukugula nengcindezi yengqondo neyasemphakathini/isihluku yizona zimbangela eziseduze zokweseleka komsoco. 
Ukudla ukudla okungenele, ukugula nokucindezeleka/ukuhlukumezeka kwengqondo ngenxa yezenhlalo yikho okuyizimbangela ezishesha kakhulu zokungondleki.
Ukungadli ukudla okwanele, ukugula nengcindezi yengqondo neyenhlalakahle/usizi yizo izinto ezinkulu ezidala ukungondleki kahle emzimbeni.
Ukungadli ngokwenele, ukugula nengcindezi yengqondo neyasemphakathini/isihluku yizona zimbangela eziseduze zokweseleka komsoco. 
Ukungakudli ukudla okwanele, ukugula kanye nokuba nengcindezi emqondweni ngokwezenhlakalahle/ukwethuka kuyimbangela enkulu edala ukushoda kwezondlamzimba ngaleso sikhathi.
Ukungadli ukudla okwanele, ukugula nengcindezi yengqondo neyenhlalakahle/usizi yizo izinto ezinkulu ezidala ukungondleki kahle emzimbeni.
Ukungadli ngokwenele, ukugula nengcindezi yengqondo neyasemphakathini/isihluku yizona zimbangela eziseduze zokweseleka komsoco. 
Ukungakudli ukudla okwanele, ukugula kanye nokuba nengcindezi emqondweni ngokwezenhlakalahle/ukwethuka kuyimbangela enkulu edala ukushoda kwezondlamzimba ngaleso sikhathi.
Ukudla ukudla okungenele, ukugula nokucindezeleka/ukuhlukumezeka kwengqondo ngenxa yezenhlalo yikho okuyizimbangela ezishesha kakhulu zokungondleki.
Ukungadli ngokwenele, ukugula nengcindezi yengqondo neyasemphakathini/isihluku yizona zimbangela eziseduze zokweseleka komsoco. 
Ukungakudli ukudla okwanele, ukugula kanye nokuba nengcindezi emqondweni ngokwezenhlakalahle/ukwethuka kuyimbangela enkulu edala ukushoda kwezondlamzimba ngaleso sikhathi.
Ukudla ukudla okungenele, ukugula nokucindezeleka/ukuhlukumezeka kwengqondo ngenxa yezenhlalo yikho okuyizimbangela ezishesha kakhulu zokungondleki.
Ukungadli ukudla okwanele, ukugula nengcindezi yengqondo neyenhlalakahle/usizi yizo izinto ezinkulu ezidala ukungondleki kahle emzimbeni.
Ububha kanye nokushoda ngezinsiza kuyizimo eziyisisekelo ezinegalelo esimweni sokungondleki.
Inhlupheko nokuntuleka kwezimali kuyizici eziyisisekelo ezineqhaza ekungondlekini.
Ukuhlupheka kanye nokwesweleka kokudla kuyizinto eziyisisekelo ezidala ukungondleki kahle emzimbeni.
Indlala nokuntula yizona zinto ezisondelene kakhulu nokungondleki. 
Inhlupheko nokuntuleka kwezimali kuyizici eziyisisekelo ezineqhaza ekungondlekini.
Ukuhlupheka kanye nokwesweleka kokudla kuyizinto eziyisisekelo ezidala ukungondleki kahle emzimbeni.
Indlala nokuntula yizona zinto ezisondelene kakhulu nokungondleki.

I-INP izama ukubhekana nale nkinga engagqamile ngezindlela ezinhlobonhlobo.
I-INP izama ukubhekana nalolu bhubhane oluthulile ngezindlela eziningana.
I-INP izama ukubhekana nalokhu kubhebhetheka okusabuthule ngezindlela eziningi.
i-INP izama ukubhekana nalolu bhubhane olucathama buthule ngezindlela eziningi.

Izongezo zokudla zezingane 
Izithasiselo zempilo zezingane
Izinezelelo zokudla zezingane
Izengezo kudla zezingane
Izithasiselo zempilo zezingane
Izinezelelo zokudla zezingane
Izengezo kudla zezingane
Izongezo zokudla zezingane 
Izinezelelo zokudla zezingane
Izengezo kudla zezingane
Izongezo zokudla zezingane 
Izithasiselo zempilo zezingane
Izengezo kudla zezingane
Izongezo zokudla zezingane 
Izithasiselo zempilo zezingane
Izinezelelo zokudla zezingane
Ezingeni lasemtholampilo izingane ezihlolwayo nezihlonzwa njengalezo ezingondlekile ngokwanele (lokhu kubandakanya izingane nabantu abadala abane-HIV nesifo sofuba) zizonikwa izongezo zokudla okubandakanya impuphu enezakhimzimba kanye nesiphuzo esinika umfutho omkhulu.
Ezingeni lokunakekelwa kwempilo emiphakathini izingane ezihlolwayo futhi kuthiwe azondlekile (lokhu kuhlanganisa izingane nabantu abadala abane-HIV nesifo sofuba) zizonikezwa izithasiselo zempilo eziwukudla  kuhlanganise nempuphu eqiniswe ngezakhi ezithile nesiphuzo esifakwe amandla amakhulu.
Izingane ezisezingeni lonakekelo lapho zihlala khona, ezihlolwa, zihlonzwe njengezingondlekile kahle emzimbeni (lokhu kubandakanya izingane nabantu abadala abane-HIV nesifo sofuba) bazonikezwa izinezelelo zokudla kubandakanya impuphu enomsoco owengeziwe neziphuzo ezinikeza amandla.
Kuzikhungo zezempilo emphakathini izingane okuthi lapho zihlolwa kutholakale ukuthi azondlekile (loku kumbandakanya izingane nabadala abane-HIV nabanofuba) zizophiwa izengezo kudla kumbandakanya impuphu enongwe ngezithako ezinomsoco nesiphuzo samandla. 
Ezingeni lokunakekelwa kwempilo emiphakathini izingane ezihlolwayo futhi kuthiwe azondlekile (lokhu kuhlanganisa izingane nabantu abadala abane-HIV nesifo sofuba) zizonikezwa izithasiselo zempilo eziwukudla  kuhlanganise nempuphu eqiniswe ngezakhi ezithile nesiphuzo esifakwe amandla amakhulu.

Amaklayenti ahlonziwe anikwa izongezo zokudla kulandelwa uhlelo oluthile.
Izithasiselo zempilo zinikezwa amakhasimende ahlonzwe ngokuvumelana nezidingo ezithile. 
Izinezelelo zokudla zinikezwa lawo makhasimende ahlonziwe ngokuya ngemigomo.
Izengezo ziye zinikezwe abathize abahlonziwe ngokwemigomo ebekiwe. 
Izithasiselo zempilo zinikezwa amakhasimende ahlonzwe ngokuvumelana nezidingo ezithile.

Izinezelelo zokudla zinikezwa lawo makhasimende ahlonziwe ngokuya ngemigomo.
Nabasebenzi bezempilo bahlinzeka ngezeluleko, ulwazi kanye nezimfundiso mayelana nezindlela zokudla ukudla okunempilo kanye nezindlela eziphuma phambili zokudidiyela ukudla okunempilo.
Abasebenzi bezempilo nabo banikeza izeluleko, ulwazi nemfundo mayelana nokudla okunempilo nezindlela ezinempilo kakhulu zokulungiselela ukudla.
Osompilo bahlinzeka nangoluleko, ulwazi nezemfundo mayelana nokudla okunomsoco nangezindlela ezinempilo zokupheka ukudla.
Abasebenzi bezempilo babuye bahlinzedke ukweluleka, ulwazi nokufundisa ngezinhlelo zokudla okunempilo nezindlela ezinempilo zokulungisa ukudla.
Abasebenzi bezempilo nabo banikeza izeluleko, ulwazi nemfundo mayelana nokudla okunempilo nezindlela ezinempilo kakhulu zokulungiselela ukudla.
Osompilo bahlinzeka nangoluleko, ulwazi nezemfundo mayelana nokudla okunomsoco nangezindlela ezinempilo zokupheka ukudla.

Nochwepheshe bezokudla  bahlinzeka ngomsebenzi othile emphakathini.
Ongoti bezokudla nabo bahlinzeka amasevisi akhethekile emphakathini.
Ongoti bohlelo lokudla nabo bahlinzeka umphakathi ngamasevisi akhethekile. 
Ongoti kwezokudla babuye basize umphakathi ngokukhethekile ngolwazi lomkhakha wabo.
Ongoti bezokudla nabo bahlinzeka amasevisi akhethekile emphakathini.

Ukuncelisa ibele
Ukuncelisa 
Emzabalazweni wokulwisana nokungondleki kwezingane zisezincane abasebenzi bezempilo bagqugquzela abantu besifazane ukuthi bondle izingane zabo ngokuzincelisa zize zibe nezinyanga eziyisithupha futhi emuva kwalokho baqhubeke nokuncelisa bebe beyifundisa ukudla okufanele nokuyilungele, ingane ize ibe neminyaka emibili.
Ukuze basize ekulweni nokungondleki lapho izingane zisezincane abasebenzi bezempilo bakhuthaza abesifazane ukuba bancelise izingane zabo ibele lona lodwa zize zibe nezinyanga eziyisithupha ubudala futhi ngemva kwalokho baqhubeke nokuzincelisa ibele ngaphezu kokuqala ukunikezwa ukudla okufanele kokugcwalisela, ingane ize ibe neminyaka emibili ubudala.
Ukusiza ekulwiseni ukungondleki kahle emzimbeni eminyakeni yokuqala yezingane, osompilo bagqugquzela abesifazane ukuthi bancelise izingane zabo kuphela bangaziphi okunye ukudla zize zibe nezinyanga eziyisithupha bese kuthi emva kwalokho baqhubeke bazincelise nangesikhathi sebeqala ukuzipha ukudla okufanele zize zibe neminyaka emibili ubudala.  
Ukusiza ukulwa nokungondleki ingane uma isencane, abasebenzi bezempilo baye bakhuthaze omame ukuba bazincelise kuphela izingane zabo zize zibe nezinyanga ezisithupha kuthi emva kwaloko baqhubeke nokuncelisa ngaphezu kokuqala okunye ukudla okufanele kokugcwalisela, ingane ize ibe neminyaka  emibili yobudala. 
Ukuze basize ekulweni nokungondleki lapho izingane zisezincane abasebenzi bezempilo bakhuthaza abesifazane ukuba bancelise izingane zabo ibele lona lodwa zize zibe nezinyanga eziyisithupha ubudala futhi ngemva kwalokho baqhubeke nokuzincelisa ibele ngaphezu kokuqala ukunikezwa ukudla okufanele kokugcwalisela, ingane ize ibe neminyaka emibili ubudala.
Ukusiza ekulwiseni ukungondleki kahle emzimbeni eminyakeni yokuqala yezingane, osompilo bagqugquzela abesifazane ukuthi bancelise izingane zabo kuphela bangaziphi okunye ukudla zize zibe nezinyanga eziyisithupha bese kuthi emva kwalokho baqhubeke bazincelise nangesikhathi sebeqala ukuzipha ukudla okufanele zize zibe neminyaka emibili ubudala.  
Ukusiza ukulwa nokungondleki ingane uma isencane, abasebenzi bezempilo baye bakhuthaze omame ukuba bazincelise kuphela izingane zabo zize zibe nezinyanga ezisithupha kuthi emva kwaloko baqhubeke nokuncelisa ngaphezu kokuqala okunye ukudla okufanele kokugcwalisela, ingane ize ibe neminyaka  emibili yobudala.

Kuxoxwa nomama abane-HIV ngezinye izindlela zokuncelisa izingane.
Ezinye izindlela zokudlisa izingane kuxoxwa ngazo nomama abane-HIV.
Ezinye izindlela zokudlisa izingane kuxoxwa ngazo nomama abanesandulelangculaza.
Ezinye izindlela zokufunza ingane kuye kuxoxwe ngazo nabomama abane-HIV. 
Ezinye izindlela zokudlisa izingane kuxoxwa ngazo nomama abane-HIV.
Ezinye izindlela zokudlisa izingane kuxoxwa ngazo nomama abanesandulelangculaza.
Ezinye izindlela zokufunza ingane kuye kuxoxwe ngazo nabomama abane-HIV. 
Kuxoxwa nomama abane-HIV ngezinye izindlela zokuncelisa izingane.
Ezinye izindlela zokudlisa izingane kuxoxwa ngazo nomama abanesandulelangculaza.

Ezinye izindlela zokudlisa izingane kuxoxwa ngazo nomama abane-HIV.

Kuxoxwa nomama abane-HIV ngezinye izindlela zokuncelisa izingane.

Isibhedlela iVredendal neSikhungo Sezokubeletha saseGroote Schuur yizibhedlela ezilungele izingane esifundazweni ngokoHlelo Lwezibhedlela Ezilungele  Izingane.
Isibhedlela saseVredendal kanye neGroote Schuur Maternity Centre ziyiziBhedlela Eziyinzuzo Kakhulu Ezinganeni kulesi sifundazwe ngokoMkhankaso Wezibhedlela Eziyinzuzo Kakhulu Ezinganeni. 
Isibhedlela se-Vredendal nesibhedlela sokubelethela se-Groote Schuur Ziyizibhedlela Ezizwana Nabantwana kulesi sifundazwe ngokuya ngemigomo Yohlelo Lwezibhedlela Ezizwana Nabantwana.
Isibhedlela saseVredendal neSizinda Sokunakekela Abazobeletha sase-Groote Schuur yizibhedlela eZingabangane Bezingane esifundazweni ngokomkhankaso Wezibhedlela Ezingabangane Bezingane.

Ukuqashelwa kokukhula
Ukuqapha ukukhula
Ukuqapha ukukhula
Ukuqashelwa kokukhula
Ukuqapha ukukhula

Ukuqapha ukukhula

Ukuqashelwa kokukhula
Ukuqapha ukukhula
Ukuqapha ukukhula
Ukuqapha ukukhula
Zonke izingane ziklalwa isisindo njalo njengengxenye yohlelo lokuqapha ukukhula, njengenkomba ebonisa ukuthi ngabe ingane iyakhula na.
Zonke izingane zikalwa isisindo njalo nje njengengxenye yohlelo lokuqapha ukukhula, uphawu olubonisa ngokushesha ukuthi ingane iyakhula yini.
Zonke izingane zikalwa njalo ngezikhathi ezithile njengengxenye yohlelo lokuqapha ukukhula, okuyinkomba esheshe ithole ukuthi ingabe ingane iyakhula yini.
Zonke izingane ziyakalwa njalo njalo njengengxenye yohlelo lokuqashelwa kokukhula, okuyinkomba ebalulekile yokuthi ingane iyakhula. 
Zonke izingane zikalwa isisindo njalo nje njengengxenye yohlelo lokuqapha ukukhula, uphawu olubonisa ngokushesha ukuthi ingane iyakhula yini.
Zonke izingane zikalwa njalo ngezikhathi ezithile njengengxenye yohlelo lokuqapha ukukhula, okuyinkomba esheshe ithole ukuthi ingabe ingane iyakhula yini.

Isisindo sifakwa eKhadini Lendlela Eyisa Empilweni.
Isisindo somzimba sibhalwa ekhadini elibizwa iKhadi leNdlela eya Empilweni.
Isisindo sifakwa ekhadini Lomzila Oya Ekuphileni. 
Isisindo sifakwa eKhadini Lendlela Eyisa Empilweni.

Isisindo sengane sibhalwa Ekhadini Lomgomo.

Isisindo sengane sibhalwa Ekhadini Lomgomo.
Isisindo sifakwa eKhadini Lendlela Eyisa Empilweni.
Isisindo sifakwa ekhadini Lomzila Oya Ekuphileni. 
Isisindo sengane sibhalwa Ekhadini Lomgomo.
Isisindo sifakwa eKhadini Lendlela Eyisa Empilweni.
Isisindo somzimba sibhalwa ekhadini elibizwa iKhadi leNdlela eya Empilweni.
Kubhekwa izimbangela zokwehla kwesisindo somzimba ezinjengezifo ezisulelanayo, ukushoda kokudla ekhaya kanye nokunganakekelwa kwengane.
Izimbangela ezingumsuka zokuncipha kwesisindo ziyabhekisiswa ezintweni ezinjengezifo ezithathelwanayo, ukuntuleka kokudla ekhaya kanye nokunganakwa kwengane.
Kubhekwa lokho okudala ukuncipha emzimbeni njengezifo ezithathelanayo, ukwesweleka kokudla ekhaya kanye nokunganakwa kwezingane.
Kubhekwa zizathu eziyimbangela yokwehlelwa isisindo ezifana nezifo ezithathelanwayo, indlala ekhaya nokunganakwa kwengane. 
Izimbangela ezingumsuka zokuncipha kwesisindo ziyabhekisiswa ezintweni ezinjengezifo ezithathelwanayo, ukuntuleka kokudla ekhaya kanye nokunganakwa kwengane.
Kubhekwa lokho okudala ukuncipha emzimbeni njengezifo ezithathelanayo, ukwesweleka kokudla ekhaya kanye nokunganakwa kwezingane.

Kubhekwa izimbangela zokwehla kwesisindo somzimba ezinjengezifo ezisulelanayo, ukushoda kokudla ekhaya kanye nokunganakekelwa kwengane.

Izifo ezisulelanayo ziyimbangela enkulu yokungondleki futhi lezi zifo ziyalapheka ezingeni lasemtholampilo.
Izifo ezithathelwanayo zinendima enkulu ekungondlekini futhi lezi zifo zelashwa ezingeni lokunakekelwa kwempilo okuyinhloko.
Izifo ezithathelanayo zibamba iqhaza elikhulu ekungondleki kahle kwengane kanti lezi zifo zelashwa ezingeni lonakekelo lwezempilo oluyisisekelo.
Izifo ezithathelwanayo zidlala indima enkulu ekungondlekini ngokufanele kanti lezi zifo ziyelashwa ezingeni lokuqala lonakekelompilo. 
Izifo ezithathelwanayo zinendima enkulu ekungondlekini futhi lezi zifo zelashwa ezingeni lokunakekelwa kwempilo okuyinhloko.
Izifo ezithathelanayo zibamba iqhaza elikhulu ekungondleki kahle kwengane kanti lezi zifo zelashwa ezingeni lonakekelo lwezempilo oluyisisekelo.
Izifo ezithathelwanayo zidlala indima enkulu ekungondlekini ngokufanele kanti lezi zifo ziyelashwa ezingeni lokuqala lonakekelompilo. 
Izifo ezisulelanayo ziyimbangela enkulu yokungondleki futhi lezi zifo ziyalapheka ezingeni lasemtholampilo.
Izifo ezithathelanayo zibamba iqhaza elikhulu ekungondleki kahle kwengane kanti lezi zifo zelashwa ezingeni lonakekelo lwezempilo oluyisisekelo.

Izifo ezisulelanayo ziyimbangela enkulu yokungondleki futhi lezi zifo ziyalapheka ezingeni lasemtholampilo.
Izifo ezithathelwanayo zinendima enkulu ekungondlekini futhi lezi zifo zelashwa ezingeni lokunakekelwa kwempilo okuyinhloko.

Isifo sohudo siyamaniswa kakhulu nokungahlanzeki kwendawo ngokwanele (ukuhlinzeka ngezindawo zokulahlwa kwendle kanye nokutholakala kwamanzi) kanye nokungondleki - noma ukungondleki ngokwanele kosana, okugcina sekulwenza lube sengcupheni yokuphathwa isifo sohudo esibucayi nesidonsa isikhathi eside. 
Isifo sohudo sihlobene kakhulu nokungacoceki kwendawo (ukukhucululwa kwendle nokuhlinzekwa kwamanzi) kanye nokungondleki noma ukondleka kancane kosana, okuholela ekubeni lube yisisulu sokuba nohudo olubi kakhulu noluthatha isikhathi eside.
Isifo sohudo sisondelene kakhulu ezimweni ezingahlanzekile (ukuthuthwa kwendle nokuhlinzekwa kwamanzi) nasezimweni lapho umntwana engondlekile kahle, okwenza ukuthi abe sengcupheni yokuba nohudo olubi kabi noluqhubeka izikhathi eside. 
Uhudo lusondelene kakhulu nokungahlanzeki kwendawo (izindlu zangasese nokuhlinzekwa kwamanzi) kanjalo nokungondleki kosana, okuye kulandelwe ukuthi kube lula ukuthi ingenwe uhudo olubi futhi ludonse isikhathi eside.
Isifo sohudo sihlobene kakhulu nokungacoceki kwendawo (ukukhucululwa kwendle nokuhlinzekwa kwamanzi) kanye nokungondleki noma ukondleka kancane kosana, okuholela ekubeni lube yisisulu sokuba nohudo olubi kakhulu noluthatha isikhathi eside.
Isifo sohudo sisondelene kakhulu ezimweni ezingahlanzekile (ukuthuthwa kwendle nokuhlinzekwa kwamanzi) nasezimweni lapho umntwana engondlekile kahle, okwenza ukuthi abe sengcupheni yokuba nohudo olubi kabi noluqhubeka izikhathi eside. 
Uhudo lusondelene kakhulu nokungahlanzeki kwendawo (izindlu zangasese nokuhlinzekwa kwamanzi) kanjalo nokungondleki kosana, okuye kulandelwe ukuthi kube lula ukuthi ingenwe uhudo olubi futhi ludonse isikhathi eside.

Ukwehliswa kwezinga kokuhlupheka
Ukudambiswa kobubha
Ukuqedwa kobumpofu
Ukwehliswa kwezinga kokuhlupheka
Ukudambiswa kobubha
Ukuqedwa kobubha
Ukwehliswa kwezinga kokuhlupheka
Ukudambiswa kobubha
Ukuqedwa kobubha
Ukuqedwa kobumpofu
Ukudambiswa kobubha
Ukuqedwa kobubha
Ukuqedwa kobumpofu
Ukwehliswa kwezinga kokuhlupheka
Amakhaya akhungethwe ububha ayahlonzwa futhi adluliselwe kolunye lwezinhlelo zikahulumeni zokuqedwa kobubha.
Amakhaya akhungethwe yinhlupheko ayahlonzwa futhi adluliselwe kwezinye zezinhlelo zikahulumeni zokuqedwa kwenhlupheko.
Imindeni ehluphekayo iyahlonzwa bese idluliselwa kolunye lwezinhlelo zikahulumeni zokwehlisa izinga lokuhlupheka.
Amakhaya akhungethwe ububha ayahlonzwa bese ethunyelwa kuzinhlelo zikahulumeni zokudambiswa kobubha. 
Amakhaya akhungethwe yinhlupheko ayahlonzwa futhi adluliselwe kwezinye zezinhlelo zikahulumeni zokuqedwa kwenhlupheko.
Imindeni ehluphekayo iyahlonzwa bese idluliselwa kolunye lwezinhlelo zikahulumeni zokwehlisa izinga lokuhlupheka.
Amakhaya akhungethwe ububha ayahlonzwa bese ethunyelwa kuzinhlelo zikahulumeni zokudambiswa kobubha. 
Amakhaya akhungethwe ububha ayahlonzwa futhi adluliselwe kolunye lwezinhlelo zikahulumeni zokuqedwa kobubha.
Imindeni ehluphekayo iyahlonzwa bese idluliselwa kolunye lwezinhlelo zikahulumeni zokwehlisa izinga lokuhlupheka.
Amakhaya akhungethwe ububha ayahlonzwa bese ethunyelwa kuzinhlelo zikahulumeni zokudambiswa kobubha. 
Amakhaya akhungethwe ububha ayahlonzwa futhi adluliselwe kolunye lwezinhlelo zikahulumeni zokuqedwa kobubha.
Amakhaya akhungethwe yinhlupheko ayahlonzwa futhi adluliselwe kwezinye zezinhlelo zikahulumeni zokuqedwa kwenhlupheko.
Amakhaya akhungethwe ububha ayahlonzwa bese ethunyelwa kuzinhlelo zikahulumeni zokudambiswa kobubha. 
Amakhaya akhungethwe ububha ayahlonzwa futhi adluliselwe kolunye lwezinhlelo zikahulumeni zokuqedwa kobubha.
Amakhaya akhungethwe yinhlupheko ayahlonzwa futhi adluliselwe kwezinye zezinhlelo zikahulumeni zokuqedwa kwenhlupheko.
Imindeni ehluphekayo iyahlonzwa bese idluliselwa kolunye lwezinhlelo zikahulumeni zokwehlisa izinga lokuhlupheka.
Kubhekanwa nokutholakala kokudla emakhaya ngokwamagatsha futhi kusetshenziswa izindlela zokungenelela ezifanele aphinde asekelwe.
Kubhekelelwa ukutholakala kokudla kwemindeni ngokwezigaba bese kuhlinzekwa izindlela ezifanele zokungenelela nokusekela.
Ukuhlinzekwa kokudla okwanele nokunomsoco kubhekwana nakho phakathi kwezigaba zengxenye yomkhakha wezempilo nezinye izingxenye zomunye umkhakha bese kuhlinzekwa ngezinhlelo zokungenelela nokweseka ezifanele.  
Ukusimama ngokudla kwamakhaya kubhekelwa ngokuxube imikhakha kanti kuhlinzekwa ungenelelo nokwesekwa okufanele.
Kubhekelelwa ukutholakala kokudla kwemindeni ngokwezigaba bese kuhlinzekwa izindlela ezifanele zokungenelela nokusekela.
Ukuhlinzekwa kokudla okwanele nokunomsoco kubhekwana nakho phakathi kwezigaba zengxenye yomkhakha wezempilo nezinye izingxenye zomunye umkhakha bese kuhlinzekwa ngezinhlelo zokungenelela nokweseka ezifanele.

Izinezelelo zamavithamini
Ukulawula izifo zokushoda ngamamakhroniyuthriyenti kuyingxenye enkulu yalo msebenzi.
Ukulawula izinto ezintulekayo zezakhi ezincanyana ezinomsoco kuyingxenye ebalulekile yesevisi.
Ukulawulwa kokusweleka kwamamayikhronyuthrenti kuyingxenye ebalulekile yesevisi yethu.
Ukulawula ukushoda komsosco ezingeni le-mayikhro kuyingxenye ebalulekile yesevisi. 
Ukulawula izinto ezintulekayo zezakhi ezincanyana ezinomsoco kuyingxenye ebalulekile yesevisi.
Ukulawulwa kokusweleka kwamamayikhronyuthrenti kuyingxenye ebalulekile yesevisi yethu.

Amamakhroniyuthriyenti ayizakhi zemvelo ezinjengamavithamini namaminerali, atholakala ekudleni okuncane futhi abaluleke kakhulu ekuzigcineni uphile saka.
Izakhi ezincanyana ezinomsoco yizinto ezinjengamavithamini namaminerali, ezitholakala ngamazinga amancane ekudleni futhi zibaluleke kakhulu ekulondolozeni impilo enhle.
Lawa mamayikhronyuthrenti ayizinto zemvelo ezinjengamavithamini namaminerali atholakala ngamanani amancane ekudleni futhi abaluleke kakhulu ekugcineni impilo enhle. 
umsoco oyiMayikhro uwumongo wemvelo ofana nama-vithamini namaminerali, otholakala ngomthamo omncane ekudleni kanti ubaluleke ngempela ukugcina isimo esihle sempilo. 
Izakhi ezincanyana ezinomsoco yizinto ezinjengamavithamini namaminerali, ezitholakala ngamazinga amancane ekudleni futhi zibaluleke kakhulu ekulondolozeni impilo enhle.

I-INP ihlinzeka ngesongezo sokudla iVithamini A okuqondiswe ezinganeni.
I-INP ihlinzeka izinto zokwenezela impilo zeVithamini A ezinganeni ezihlosiwe.
I-INP ihlinzeka ngesinezelelo uVithamini A kulezo zingane ezihlonziwe.
i-INP inikeza izengezo zika-Vithamini A ezinganeni ezikhethekile. 
I-INP ihlinzeka izinto zokwenezela impilo zeVithamini A ezinganeni ezihlosiwe.
I-INP ihlinzeka ngesinezelelo uVithamini A kulezo zingane ezihlonziwe.
i-INP inikeza izengezo zika-Vithamini A ezinganeni ezikhethekile. 
I-INP ihlinzeka ngesongezo sokudla iVithamini A okuqondiswe ezinganeni.
I-INP ihlinzeka ngesinezelelo uVithamini A kulezo zingane ezihlonziwe.
i-INP inikeza izengezo zika-Vithamini A ezinganeni ezikhethekile. 
I-INP ihlinzeka ngesongezo sokudla iVithamini A okuqondiswe ezinganeni.
I-INP ihlinzeka izinto zokwenezela impilo zeVithamini A ezinganeni ezihlosiwe.
i-INP inikeza izengezo zika-Vithamini A ezinganeni ezikhethekile. 
I-INP ihlinzeka ngesongezo sokudla iVithamini A okuqondiswe ezinganeni.
I-INP ihlinzeka izinto zokwenezela impilo zeVithamini A ezinganeni ezihlosiwe.
I-INP ihlinzeka ngesinezelelo uVithamini A kulezo zingane ezihlonziwe.
Izingane ezishoda ngeVithamini A ziyazaca, zingakhuli ngendlela efanele futhi zisemathubeni amakhulu okusuleleka ngezifo bese zishone ngenxa yazo.
Izingane ezintula uVithamini A ziyancipha isisindo, azikhuli kahle futhi zisethubeni elikhulu lokungenwa yizifo futhi zife ngenxa yazo.
Izingane ezishoda ngoVithamini A ziyehla emzimbeni, zingakhuli kahle futhi zivame ukuba sengcupheni yokuthola izifo nokubulawa yizo.
Izingane ezishoda ngo-Vithamini A zehlelwa isisindo, zingakhuli kahle kanti zingenwa izifo kalula zife futhi zibulawa izifo.

Ukushoda ngeVithamini A kuphinde kulimaze iso futhi kungenye yezimbangela ezinkulu zobumpumputhe ezinganeni.
Ukuntuleka kweVithamini A kulimaza namehlo futhi kungenye yezimbangela eziyinhloko zobumpumputhe phakathi kwezingane.
Ukwesweleka kukaVithamini A kulimaza namehlo futhi ngenye yezinto ezidala ukungaboni ezinganeni.

Izingane ezizalwa zinesisindo ezincane zinikwa amaphilisi eVithamini A, okulekelela amasosha omzimba futhi kusize izingane ukuze zikhule.
Izingane ezizalwa zinesisindo esiphansi zinikwa amakhepsuli eVithamini A, aqinisa isimiso somzimba sokuzivikela futhi asize ingane ukuba ikhule ngokuqhubekayo.
Izingane ezizalwa zinesisindo esincane zinikezwa amakhephsuli kaVithamini A onikeza amasotsha omzimba amandla futhi usize nasekukhuleni kwengane.
Izingane ezizalwe zinesisindo esiphansi zinikezwa amakhepsuli ka-Vithamini A, akhuthaza uhlelo lomzimba lokuzivikela asize ukukhula kwengane ngokuthuthukayo.

Izinsana kusukela ezinyangeni ezingu 6-11 zinikwa iVithamini A (1000 000 IU) kube kanye ukuze kuvikelwe ukugula okubucayi.
Izinsana ezinezinyanga ezingu-6-11 zinikwa umthamo owodwa kaVithamini A (100 000 IU) ukuvimbela ukugula okubi kakhulu.
Izinsana ezinezinyanga kusukela kweziyi-6 kuya kweziyi-11 zinikezwa umthamo owodwa kaVithamini A (100 000 IU) ukuze kuvinjelwe ukugula okubi.
Izinsana zezinyanga ezi-6-11 zobudala zinikezwa isilinganiso esisodwa sika-Vithamini A (100 000 IU) ukuvimbela ukugula. 
Izinsana ezinezinyanga ezingu-6-11 zinikwa umthamo owodwa kaVithamini A (100 000 IU) ukuvimbela ukugula okubi kakhulu.

Izingane kusukela ezinyangeni ezingu 12 kuya eminyakeni emihlanu zinikwa 200 000 IU eyodwa ngenkathi inezinyanga ezingu 12 emuva kwalokho zithole 200 000 IU njalo ezinyangeni eziyisithupha  ize ibe neminyaka emihlanu.
Izingane ezisukela ezinyangeni ezingu-12 ukuya eminyakeni emihlanu ubudala zinikwa umthamo owodwa we-200 000 IU lapho zinezinyanga ezingu-12 bese kuba umthamo ongu-200 000 IU njalo ezinyangeni eziyisithupha zize zibe neminyaka emihlanu ubudala.
Izingane ezinezinyanga eziyi-12 kuya eminyakeni emihlanu ubudala zinikezwa umthamo owodwa ongu-200 000 IU ezinyangeni eziyi-12 bese umthamo ongu-200 000 IU njalo ezinyangeni eziyisithupha zize zibe neminyaka emihlanu yobudala.
Izingane kusuka kuzinyanga ezili-12 kuya eminyakeni emihlanu ubudala zinikezwa isilinganiso esisodwa sezi-200 000 IU uma sezinezinyanga ezili-12 bese kuba yizi-200 000 IU njalo ezinyangeni ezithupha zize zihlanganise iminyaka emihlanu.
Izingane ezisukela ezinyangeni ezingu-12 ukuya eminyakeni emihlanu ubudala zinikwa umthamo owodwa we-200 000 IU lapho zinezinyanga ezingu-12 bese kuba umthamo ongu-200 000 IU njalo ezinyangeni eziyisithupha zize zibe neminyaka emihlanu ubudala.
Izingane ezinezinyanga eziyi-12 kuya eminyakeni emihlanu ubudala zinikezwa umthamo owodwa ongu-200 000 IU ezinyangeni eziyi-12 bese umthamo ongu-200 000 IU njalo ezinyangeni eziyisithupha zize zibe neminyaka emihlanu yobudala.
Izingane kusuka kuzinyanga ezili-12 kuya eminyakeni emihlanu ubudala zinikezwa isilinganiso esisodwa sezi-200 000 IU uma sezinezinyanga ezili-12 bese kuba yizi-200 000 IU njalo ezinyangeni ezithupha zize zihlanganise iminyaka emihlanu.
Izingane kusukela ezinyangeni ezingu 12 kuya eminyakeni emihlanu zinikwa 200 000 IU eyodwa ngenkathi inezinyanga ezingu 12 emuva kwalokho zithole 200 000 IU njalo ezinyangeni eziyisithupha  ize ibe neminyaka emihlanu.
Izingane ezinezinyanga eziyi-12 kuya eminyakeni emihlanu ubudala zinikezwa umthamo owodwa ongu-200 000 IU ezinyangeni eziyi-12 bese umthamo ongu-200 000 IU njalo ezinyangeni eziyisithupha zize zibe neminyaka emihlanu yobudala.
Izingane kusuka kuzinyanga ezili-12 kuya eminyakeni emihlanu ubudala zinikezwa isilinganiso esisodwa sezi-200 000 IU uma sezinezinyanga ezili-12 bese kuba yizi-200 000 IU njalo ezinyangeni ezithupha zize zihlanganise iminyaka emihlanu.
Izingane kusukela ezinyangeni ezingu 12 kuya eminyakeni emihlanu zinikwa 200 000 IU eyodwa ngenkathi inezinyanga ezingu 12 emuva kwalokho zithole 200 000 IU njalo ezinyangeni eziyisithupha  ize ibe neminyaka emihlanu.
Izingane ezisukela ezinyangeni ezingu-12 ukuya eminyakeni emihlanu ubudala zinikwa umthamo owodwa we-200 000 IU lapho zinezinyanga ezingu-12 bese kuba umthamo ongu-200 000 IU njalo ezinyangeni eziyisithupha zize zibe neminyaka emihlanu ubudala.
Izingane kusuka kuzinyanga ezili-12 kuya eminyakeni emihlanu ubudala zinikezwa isilinganiso esisodwa sezi-200 000 IU uma sezinezinyanga ezili-12 bese kuba yizi-200 000 IU njalo ezinyangeni ezithupha zize zihlanganise iminyaka emihlanu.
Izingane kusukela ezinyangeni ezingu 12 kuya eminyakeni emihlanu zinikwa 200 000 IU eyodwa ngenkathi inezinyanga ezingu 12 emuva kwalokho zithole 200 000 IU njalo ezinyangeni eziyisithupha  ize ibe neminyaka emihlanu.
Izingane ezisukela ezinyangeni ezingu-12 ukuya eminyakeni emihlanu ubudala zinikwa umthamo owodwa we-200 000 IU lapho zinezinyanga ezingu-12 bese kuba umthamo ongu-200 000 IU njalo ezinyangeni eziyisithupha zize zibe neminyaka emihlanu ubudala.
Izingane ezinezinyanga eziyi-12 kuya eminyakeni emihlanu ubudala zinikezwa umthamo owodwa ongu-200 000 IU ezinyangeni eziyi-12 bese umthamo ongu-200 000 IU njalo ezinyangeni eziyisithupha zize zibe neminyaka emihlanu yobudala.
IVithamini A yokwengezela inikwa izingane ezingondlekanga kakhulu, noma enezifo ezisulelanayo eziyimbelesela njengesifo sohudo, isimungumungwane noma isandulela ngculazi.
Imithamo eyengeziwe kaVithamini A inikezwa izingane ezingondlekile ngezinga elikhulu, noma ezinezifo ezithathelwanayo eziphikelelayo njengohudo, isimungumungwana noma i-HIV.
Imithamo eyengeziwe kaVithamini A inikezwa lezo zingane ezisesimweni esibi kakhulu sokungondleki, noma eziba nezifo ezithathelanayo njalo njengesifo sohudo, isimungumungwane noma isandulelangculaza.
Izilinganiso ezengeziwe zika-Vithamini A zinikwa izingane ezikhungethwe indlala ngokudlulele, noma ezibeleselwe izifo ezithathelwanayo njengohudo, isimungumungwane noma i-HIV.
Imithamo eyengeziwe kaVithamini A inikezwa izingane ezingondlekile ngezinga elikhulu, noma ezinezifo ezithathelwanayo eziphikelelayo njengohudo, isimungumungwana noma i-HIV.

Ukukhishwa kwezikelemu
Isindo somzimba sabantwana singancishiswa nawukuba nezikelemu futhi lokhu kungalashwa emtholampilo ngamakhambi okubulala izikelemu.
Ukuncipha isisindo ezinganeni kungase kubangelwe nawukungenwa yizilo futhi lokhu kungelashwa emtholampilo ngomuthi wokubulala izilo.
Ukwehla emzimbeni ezinganeni kungadalwa ukuba khona kwezikelemu kanti lokhu kungelashwa emtholampilo onemithi yokukhipha izikelemu.
Ukwehlelwa isisindo ezinganeni kungadalwa nawukuhlaselwa zibungu kanti zingakhishwa ngomuthi ekliniki.
Ukuncipha isisindo ezinganeni kungase kubangelwe nawukungenwa yizilo futhi lokhu kungelashwa emtholampilo ngomuthi wokubulala izilo.

Izeluleko ngokondleka komzimba
Izeluleko zokudla okunomsoco sezimo ezithile
Iseluleko esiphathelene nokudla ezimweni ezithile
Izeluleko zokondleka ngokudla maqondana nezimo ezithile
Izeluleko zokudla okunomsoco sezimo ezithile
Iseluleko esiphathelene nokudla ezimweni ezithile
Izeluleko zokondleka ngokudla maqondana nezimo ezithile
Izeluleko ngokondleka komzimba
Iseluleko esiphathelene nokudla ezimweni ezithile
Izeluleko zokondleka ngokudla maqondana nezimo ezithile
Izeluleko ngokondleka komzimba
Izeluleko zokudla okunomsoco sezimo ezithile
Izeluleko zokondleka ngokudla maqondana nezimo ezithile
Izeluleko ngokondleka komzimba
Izeluleko zokudla okunomsoco sezimo ezithile
Iseluleko esiphathelene nokudla ezimweni ezithile
Abantu abake baphathwa isifo sohlangothi, abaphathwa isifo somfutho wegazi ophezulu ngokweqile, isifo sikashukela, i-HIV/AIDS kanye neSifo sofuba bayafundiswa, banikwe ulwazi futhi balulekwe ngokondleka ngaso sonke isikhathi uma belashwa.
Ukufundiswa ngokudla okunomsoco, ulwazi nokwelulekwa okunikezwa kuwo wonke amazinga okunakekela kubantu abake bafa uhlangothi, abanomfutho wegazi ophezulu kakhulu, umfutho wegazi ophezulu, isifo sikashukela, i-HIV/AIDS nesifo sofuba.
Imfundo ephathelene nokudla, ulwazi nokwelulekwa inikezwa kuwo wonke amazinga onakekelo kulabo bantu abake bafa uhlangothi, abanomfutho wegazi ophezulu, abanesifo sikashukela, abane-HIV/AIDS nabanesifo sofuba.
Abantu ababe nesifo sikanhlangothi, somfutho wegazi ophakeme, ushukela, i-HIV/AIDS nofuba bafundiswa ngokudla kahle, banikwe ulwazi nezeluleko kuwona onke amazinga onakekelo.
Ukufundiswa ngokudla okunomsoco, ulwazi nokwelulekwa okunikezwa kuwo wonke amazinga okunakekela kubantu abake bafa uhlangothi, abanomfutho wegazi ophezulu kakhulu, umfutho wegazi ophezulu, isifo sikashukela, i-HIV/AIDS nesifo sofuba.
Imfundo ephathelene nokudla, ulwazi nokwelulekwa inikezwa kuwo wonke amazinga onakekelo kulabo bantu abake bafa uhlangothi, abanomfutho wegazi ophezulu, abanesifo sikashukela, abane-HIV/AIDS nabanesifo sofuba.

Uhlelo lokudla okunomsoco lwasezikoleni zebanga eliphansi
Uhlelo lokudla lezikole zamabanga aphansi
Uhlelo lokuhlinzeka ukudla ezikoleni eziseMabangeni Aphansi
Uhlelo lokudla okunomsoco lwasezikoleni zebanga eliphansi
Uhlelo lokudla lezikole zamabanga aphansi
Uhlelo lokuhlinzeka ukudla ezikoleni eziseMabangeni Aphansi
Uhlelo lokondla lwasezikoleni ezisemabangeni aphansi
Uhlelo lokudla lezikole zamabanga aphansi
Uhlelo lokuhlinzeka ukudla ezikoleni eziseMabangeni Aphansi
Uhlelo lokondla lwasezikoleni ezisemabangeni aphansi
Uhlelo lokudla okunomsoco lwasezikoleni zebanga eliphansi
Uhlelo lokuhlinzeka ukudla ezikoleni eziseMabangeni Aphansi
Uhlelo lokondla lwasezikoleni ezisemabangeni aphansi
Uhlelo lokudla okunomsoco lwasezikoleni zebanga eliphansi
Uhlelo lokudla lezikole zamabanga aphansi
UHlelo Lokondla Lwasezikoleni Ezisemabangeni Aphansi luyatholakala ezikoleni ezinesimo somnotho esintengantengayo ezihlonzwe ngokukhethekile.
Uhlelo Lokudla Okunomsoco Lwasezikoleni Zebanga Eliphansi lutholakala ezikoleni ezithile ezihlonziwe ezisezindaweni ezinomnotho ophansi.
UHlelo Lokudla Lwezikole Zamabanga Aphansi luyatholakala kulezo zikole ezihlonziwe ezinezingane eziphuma emakhaya ahluphekayo.
Uhlelo lokuhlinzeka ukudla ezikoleni ziseMabangeni Aphansi lubhekiswa ezikoleni ezithile ezihlonzwe njengezintulayo. 
Uhlelo Lokudla Okunomsoco Lwasezikoleni Zebanga Eliphansi lutholakala ezikoleni ezithile ezihlonziwe ezisezindaweni ezinomnotho ophansi.
UHlelo Lokudla Lwezikole Zamabanga Aphansi luyatholakala kulezo zikole ezihlonziwe ezinezingane eziphuma emakhaya ahluphekayo.
Uhlelo lokuhlinzeka ukudla ezikoleni ziseMabangeni Aphansi lubhekiswa ezikoleni ezithile ezihlonzwe njengezintulayo.

UHlelo Lokudla Lwezikole Zamabanga Aphansi luyatholakala kulezo zikole ezihlonziwe ezinezingane eziphuma emakhaya ahluphekayo.
Uhlelo lokuhlinzeka ukudla ezikoleni ziseMabangeni Aphansi lubhekiswa ezikoleni ezithile ezihlonzwe njengezintulayo.

Lezi zinhlelo ziqhutshwa ngokuhlanganyela noMnyango Wezemfundo.
Lezi zikimu njengamanje ziqhutshwa ngokubambisana noMnyango Wezemfundo.
Lezi zinhlelo njengamanje ziqhutshwa ngokubambisana noMnyango Wezemfundo. 
Lezi zinhlelo zethulwa ngokubambisana noMnyango Wezemfundo. 
Lezi zikimu njengamanje ziqhutshwa ngokubambisana noMnyango Wezemfundo.
Lezi zinhlelo njengamanje ziqhutshwa ngokubambisana noMnyango Wezemfundo. 
Lezi zinhlelo zethulwa ngokubambisana noMnyango Wezemfundo. 
Lezi zinhlelo ziqhutshwa ngokuhlanganyela noMnyango Wezemfundo.
Lezi zinhlelo njengamanje ziqhutshwa ngokubambisana noMnyango Wezemfundo. 
Lezi zinhlelo zethulwa ngokubambisana noMnyango Wezemfundo. 
Lezi zinhlelo ziqhutshwa ngokuhlanganyela noMnyango Wezemfundo.
Lezi zikimu njengamanje ziqhutshwa ngokubambisana noMnyango Wezemfundo.
Lezi zinhlelo zethulwa ngokubambisana noMnyango Wezemfundo. 
Lezi zinhlelo ziqhutshwa ngokuhlanganyela noMnyango Wezemfundo.
Lezi zikimu njengamanje ziqhutshwa ngokubambisana noMnyango Wezemfundo.
Lezi zinhlelo njengamanje ziqhutshwa ngokubambisana noMnyango Wezemfundo. 
Uhulumeni wesifundazwe uhlose ukufinyelela ezingeneni eziyizi-125 000 ezikoleni zasemabangeni aphansi ezingama-847 esifundazweni ngowezi-2004 ngohlelo lwawo lokuphakela izingane ezikoleni.
Uhulumeni wesifundazwe uhlose ukufinyelela izingane eziyizi-125, 000 ezikoleni zebanga eliphansi ezingama-847 esifundazweni ngo-2004 ngohlelo lwawo lokondla izingane ezikoleni.
Uhulumeni wesifundazwe uhlose ukufinyelela izingane eziyi-125 000 ezikoleni zamabanga aphansi ezingama-847 kulesi sifundazwe ngonyaka we-2004 ngalolu hlelo lwakhe lokudla kwezingane ezikoleni.
Uhulumeni wesifundazwe unehloso yokuthi kuthi kufika owezi-2004 ube usufinyelele ezinganeni eziyizi-125 000 ezisezikoleni zaMabanga Aphansi ayizi-847 esifundazweni.
Uhulumeni wesifundazwe uhlose ukufinyelela izingane eziyizi-125, 000 ezikoleni zebanga eliphansi ezingama-847 esifundazweni ngo-2004 ngohlelo lwawo lokondla izingane ezikoleni.
Uhulumeni wesifundazwe uhlose ukufinyelela izingane eziyi-125 000 ezikoleni zamabanga aphansi ezingama-847 kulesi sifundazwe ngonyaka we-2004 ngalolu hlelo lwakhe lokudla kwezingane ezikoleni.

Ukudla ezikhungwini
Ukudla okusezikhungweni
Ukudla ezikhungweni
Ukudla ezikhungwini
Ukudla okusezikhungweni
Ukudla ezikhungweni
Ukudla ezinhlanganweni
Ukudla okusezikhungweni
Ukudla ezikhungweni
Ukudla ezinhlanganweni
Ukudla ezikhungwini
I-INP Oludidiyele luphinde lube negalelo ekunakekelweni kwamaklayenti ezikhungweni ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lokuhlinzeka ngokudla ukuze kuhlinzekwe ngokudla okunempilo okulingene.
I-INP ibuye ibe nomthelela ekunakekeleni amakhasimende asezibhedlela ngokulungiselela amasevisi okuhlinzeka ukudla okunomsoco okunezakhi ezidingekayo.
I-INP ibambe iqhaza nasekunakekelweni kwamakhasimende ezikhungwini ngezinhlelo zesevisi yokudla mayelana nokuhlinzekwa kokudla okunomsoco. 
i-INP ibuye ifake igalelo ekunakekelweni kwamakhasimende ayo ezikhungweni ngezinhlelo zokuhlinzeka ukudla okunomsoco olinganisiwe.
I-INP ibuye ibe nomthelela ekunakekeleni amakhasimende asezibhedlela ngokulungiselela amasevisi okuhlinzeka ukudla okunomsoco okunezakhi ezidingekayo.
I-INP ibambe iqhaza nasekunakekelweni kwamakhasimende ezikhungwini ngezinhlelo zesevisi yokudla mayelana nokuhlinzekwa kokudla okunomsoco. 
i-INP ibuye ifake igalelo ekunakekelweni kwamakhasimende ayo ezikhungweni ngezinhlelo zokuhlinzeka ukudla okunomsoco olinganisiwe.
I-INP Oludidiyele luphinde lube negalelo ekunakekelweni kwamaklayenti ezikhungweni ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lokuhlinzeka ngokudla ukuze kuhlinzekwe ngokudla okunempilo okulingene.
I-INP ibambe iqhaza nasekunakekelweni kwamakhasimende ezikhungwini ngezinhlelo zesevisi yokudla mayelana nokuhlinzekwa kokudla okunomsoco. 
i-INP ibuye ifake igalelo ekunakekelweni kwamakhasimende ayo ezikhungweni ngezinhlelo zokuhlinzeka ukudla okunomsoco olinganisiwe.
I-INP Oludidiyele luphinde lube negalelo ekunakekelweni kwamaklayenti ezikhungweni ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lokuhlinzeka ngokudla ukuze kuhlinzekwe ngokudla okunempilo okulingene.
I-INP ibuye ibe nomthelela ekunakekeleni amakhasimende asezibhedlela ngokulungiselela amasevisi okuhlinzeka ukudla okunomsoco okunezakhi ezidingekayo.
i-INP ibuye ifake igalelo ekunakekelweni kwamakhasimende ayo ezikhungweni ngezinhlelo zokuhlinzeka ukudla okunomsoco olinganisiwe.
I-INP Oludidiyele luphinde lube negalelo ekunakekelweni kwamaklayenti ezikhungweni ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lokuhlinzeka ngokudla ukuze kuhlinzekwe ngokudla okunempilo okulingene.
I-INP ibuye ibe nomthelela ekunakekeleni amakhasimende asezibhedlela ngokulungiselela amasevisi okuhlinzeka ukudla okunomsoco okunezakhi ezidingekayo.
I-INP ibambe iqhaza nasekunakekelweni kwamakhasimende ezikhungwini ngezinhlelo zesevisi yokudla mayelana nokuhlinzekwa kokudla okunomsoco.

Imiyalelo: 
Abantu abaqalayo ukufika emtholampilo/esibhedlela sesibili noma sesithathu bazocelwa ukuthi bagcwalise ifomu bese isiguli sizovulelwa ifayela.
Abafika ngokokuqala ngqa emtholampilo/esibhedlela esikhudlwana noma esezinga eliphezulu bazocelwa ukuba bagcwalise ifomu futhi kuzovulwa ifolda yesiguli.
Abavakashela emtholampilo/esibhedlela samazinga aphezulu noma samazinga aphakeme okokuqala bazocelwa ukuba bagcwalise ifomu kuzobe sekuvulwa ifayili yaleso siguli.
Abafika okokuqala ekliniki/esibhedlela esisezingeni lesibili kumbe sokufunda bazocelwa ukuba bagcwalise ifomu, bese bevulelwa ifolda.
Abafika ngokokuqala ngqa emtholampilo/esibhedlela esikhudlwana noma esezinga eliphezulu bazocelwa ukuba bagcwalise ifomu futhi kuzovulwa ifolda yesiguli.
Abavakashela emtholampilo/esibhedlela samazinga aphezulu noma samazinga aphakeme okokuqala bazocelwa ukuba bagcwalise ifomu kuzobe sekuvulwa ifayili yaleso siguli.

Abafika ngokokuqala ngqa emtholampilo/esibhedlela esikhudlwana noma esezinga eliphezulu bazocelwa ukuba bagcwalise ifomu futhi kuzovulwa ifolda yesiguli.
Abafika okokuqala ekliniki/esibhedlela esisezingeni lesibili kumbe sokufunda bazocelwa ukuba bagcwalise ifomu, bese bevulelwa ifolda.
Abantu abaqalayo ukufika emtholampilo/esibhedlela sesibili noma sesithathu bazocelwa ukuthi bagcwalise ifomu bese isiguli sizovulelwa ifayela.
Abafika ngokokuqala ngqa emtholampilo/esibhedlela esikhudlwana noma esezinga eliphezulu bazocelwa ukuba bagcwalise ifomu futhi kuzovulwa ifolda yesiguli.

Kuzodingeka incwadi yokudluliselwa ephuma emtholampilo uma uya esibhedlela.
Kuzodingeka incwadi kadokotela evela emtholampilo lapho uya esibhedlela.
Kuzodingeka ukuthi uphathe incwadi yakho yokudluliselwa uma uvakashela isibhedlela.
Kuzodingeka ufike nencwadi yasekliniki ekudlulisela esibhedlela.

Izibhedlela zizocela incwadi yomholo yakamuva/incwadi yokuhlolelwa ezentela (IRP5)
Izibhedlela zizocela ipheyisiliphu yakho yamuva kakhulu/iphepha lokuhlaziywa kweholo (IRP5). 
Izibhedlela zizocela isiliphi somholo/ukuhlolwa kwemali engenayo (i-IRP5)
Izibhedlela zizocela uzinike isifakazisi somholo/sokuhlolwa komholo (IRP5) sakho sakamuva.

Phatha ikhadi lasesibhedlela lakho uma wake wabhalisa esibhedlela ngaphambilini.
Woza nekhadi lakho lasesibhedlela uma wawubhalisiwe esibhedlela phambilini.
Phatha ikhadi lakho lasesibhedlela uma wawubhaliswe esibhedlela.
Uze nekhadi lakho lasesibhedlela uma wake wabhalisa khona phambilini.
Woza nekhadi lakho lasesibhedlela uma wawubhalisiwe esibhedlela phambilini.
Phatha ikhadi lakho lasesibhedlela uma wawubhaliswe esibhedlela.
Uze nekhadi lakho lasesibhedlela uma wake wabhalisa khona phambilini.

Phatha ikhadi lakho lasesibhedlela uma wawubhaliswe esibhedlela.
Uze nekhadi lakho lasesibhedlela uma wake wabhalisa khona phambilini.
Phatha ikhadi lasesibhedlela lakho uma wake wabhalisa esibhedlela ngaphambilini.
Woza nekhadi lakho lasesibhedlela uma wawubhalisiwe esibhedlela phambilini.
Uze nekhadi lakho lasesibhedlela uma wake wabhalisa khona phambilini.
Phatha ikhadi lasesibhedlela lakho uma wake wabhalisa esibhedlela ngaphambilini.
Woza nekhadi lakho lasesibhedlela uma wawubhalisiwe esibhedlela phambilini.
Phatha ikhadi lakho lasesibhedlela uma wawubhaliswe esibhedlela.

Inkulumo yePhini likaNgqongqoshe Wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni, uMnu. Ntopile Kganyago, iLungu Lephalamende, emcimbini wokwethulwa emphakathini okokuqala koHlelo Lwengaphakathi Nedolobhakazi LaseTshwane, Esakhiweni Sebhange-ngodla LaseNingizimu Afrika, eTshwane 
Inkulumo yePhini likaNgqongqoshe Wemisebenzi Yomphakathi, uMnu Ntopile Kganyago, MP, ngesenzakalo sokuthulwa kokuqala emphakathini koHlelo Lwenkaba Yedolobha LaseTshwane, South African Reserve Bank Building, eTshwane
Inkulumo kaSekela Ngqongqoshe Wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni, uMnu. Ntopile Kganyago, Ilungu Lephalamende, emcimbini wokwethulwa okokuqala kohlelo lukahulumeni okuwuHlelo Lwenkaba Yedolobhakazi i-Tshwane, eSouth African Reserve Bank Building, eTshwane
Inkulumo kasekela Ngqongqoshe wakwa-Public Works, uMnu Ntopile Kganyago, iLungu Lephalemende, mhla kwethulwa emphakathini ngokokuqala uHlelo Lwedolobhakazi Elingaphakathi laseTshwane, eBhilidini leBhangengodla LaseNingizimu Afrika, eTshwane
Inkulumo yePhini likaNgqongqoshe Wemisebenzi Yomphakathi, uMnu Ntopile Kganyago, MP, ngesenzakalo sokuthulwa kokuqala emphakathini koHlelo Lwenkaba Yedolobha LaseTshwane, South African Reserve Bank Building, eTshwane
Inkulumo kaSekela Ngqongqoshe Wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni, uMnu. Ntopile Kganyago, Ilungu Lephalamende, emcimbini wokwethulwa okokuqala kohlelo lukahulumeni okuwuHlelo Lwenkaba Yedolobhakazi i-Tshwane, eSouth African Reserve Bank Building, eTshwane
Inkulumo kasekela Ngqongqoshe wakwa-Public Works, uMnu Ntopile Kganyago, iLungu Lephalemende, mhla kwethulwa emphakathini ngokokuqala uHlelo Lwedolobhakazi Elingaphakathi laseTshwane, eBhilidini leBhangengodla LaseNingizimu Afrika, eTshwane

Nezinye izikhulu zikahulumeni ezisezikhundleni eziphezulu
Ziphathimandla ezinye eziphakeme  zikahulumeni
Ezinye izikhulu eziphezulu zikahulumeni
Nezinye izikhulu zikahulumeni ezisezikhundleni eziphezulu
Ziphathimandla ezinye eziphakeme  zikahulumeni

Zihambeli ezihloniphekile
Zivakashi ezikhethekile

Izihambeli ezahlukahlukene

Zethameli ezikhethekile
