Ngiziqhenya kakhulu nangokuthi le nkulumo yesabelomali ngiyethula ngobusuku obandulela Ukugujwa Kweminyaka eyi 10 sinentandoyeningi.
Ngiyaziqhenya futhi nangokuthi ngethula le nkulumo yesabelomali ngobusuku bangaphambi kokuKhunjulwa kweminyaka eyi-10 yentando yethu yeningi.
Ngiyaziqhenya ngokuthi ngethula le nkulumo yesabelomali ngosuku olwandulela ukuphela kweminyaka eyi-10 kwaba khona umbuso wentando yeningi.  
Ngiyaziqhenya futhi ngokuthi nginethulela le nkulumo yesabelo zimali ngosuku olwandulela usuku lomgubho weminyaka elishumi sathola inkululeko.
Ngiyaziqhenya futhi nangokuthi ngethula le nkulumo yesabelomali ngobusuku bangaphambi kokuKhunjulwa kweminyaka eyi-10 yentando yethu yeningi.
Ngiyaziqhenya ngokuthi ngethula le nkulumo yesabelomali ngosuku olwandulela ukuphela kweminyaka eyi-10 kwaba khona umbuso wentando yeningi.  
Ngiyaziqhenya futhi ngokuthi nginethulela le nkulumo yesabelo zimali ngosuku olwandulela usuku lomgubho weminyaka elishumi sathola inkululeko.

Ngiyaziqhenya futhi nangokuthi ngethula le nkulumo yesabelomali ngobusuku bangaphambi kokuKhunjulwa kweminyaka eyi-10 yentando yethu yeningi.
Ngiyaziqhenya ngokuthi ngethula le nkulumo yesabelomali ngosuku olwandulela ukuphela kweminyaka eyi-10 kwaba khona umbuso wentando yeningi.  
Lokhu kuwubufakazi obuqinile bokuthi uhulumeni oholwa i-ANC sewuphumelele kokuningi  esikhathini esingaphansi kweminyaka eyishumi kubusa intandoyeningi uma kuqhathaniswa nanoma eliphi izwe emhlabeni uwonkana.
Kunobufakazi obuqinile bokuthi uhulumeni oholwa yi-ANC uye wafeza okuningi eminyakeni engaphansi nje kweyishumi yokubusa kwentando yeningi kunanoma yiliphi elinye izwe elike lakwenza emhlabeni wonke.
Kunobufakazi obubonakalayo bokuthi uhulumeni oholwa yi-ANC usuphumelele ezintweni eziningi esikhathini esingaphansi kweminyaka eyishumi kuphela sombuso wentando yeningi, lokhu okungakaze kwenzeke nakunoma yiliphi ilizwe emhlabeni wonke.
Kunobufakazi obuqinile bokuthi uhulumeni oholwa i-ANC usuphumelele kokuningi esikhathini esingaphansi kweminyaka elishumi ungenile embusweni wentando yeningi, okudlula osekuke kwenziwa nanoma iliphi elinye izwe umhlaba ungaka. 
Kunobufakazi obuqinile bokuthi uhulumeni oholwa yi-ANC uye wafeza okuningi eminyakeni engaphansi nje kweyishumi yokubusa kwentando yeningi kunanoma yiliphi elinye izwe elike lakwenza emhlabeni wonke.

Sisebenzile. 
Ngamagama agcwele, emathubeni okuba nezindlu ezingu-1.4 wesigidi asehlinzekwe uhulumeni, ngiyaziqhenya ngokumemezela ukuthi isifundazwe sethu eminyakeni eyisishiyagalolunye edlule, uhlinzeke ngezindlu eziyizi-167 000, okungama-11% wokudingekayo ezweni lilonke.
Ngamazwi aqinile, ezindlini eziyizigidi ezingu-1.4 ezakhiwe nguhulumeni, ngiyaziqhenya ukumemezela ukuthi eminyakeni eyisishiyagalolunye edlule, isifundazwe sethu sakha izindlu ezingu-167 000, okuyingxenye engu-11% ezindlini zikazwelonke. 
Mayelana nalokho okubonakalayo, emathubeni ezezindlu angu-1.4 wamabhiliyoni uhulumeni owafezile, ngineqholo lokumemezela ukuthi isifundazwe sethu eminyakeni eyisishiyagalolunye edlule sakhe amayunithi ayi-167 000, okuyingxenye yama-11% ekhekhe kuzwelonke.
Ngamagama aliqiniso, kemathubeni ayisigidi esiso-1.4 ezindlu asethulwe uhulumeni, ngiyaziqhenya ukusho ukuthi isifundazwe sethu sesikhiphe izindlu eziyizi-167 000 eminyakeni eyisishiyagalolunye edlule, okungama-11% ezweni lonke.
Ngamazwi aqinile, ezindlini eziyizigidi ezingu-1.4 ezakhiwe nguhulumeni, ngiyaziqhenya ukumemezela ukuthi eminyakeni eyisishiyagalolunye edlule, isifundazwe sethu sakha izindlu ezingu-167 000, okuyingxenye engu-11% ezindlini zikazwelonke. 
Mayelana nalokho okubonakalayo, emathubeni ezezindlu angu-1.4 wamabhiliyoni uhulumeni owafezile, ngineqholo lokumemezela ukuthi isifundazwe sethu eminyakeni eyisishiyagalolunye edlule sakhe amayunithi ayi-167 000, okuyingxenye yama-11% ekhekhe kuzwelonke.
Ngamagama aliqiniso, kemathubeni ayisigidi esiso-1.4 ezindlu asethulwe uhulumeni, ngiyaziqhenya ukusho ukuthi isifundazwe sethu sesikhiphe izindlu eziyizi-167 000 eminyakeni eyisishiyagalolunye edlule, okungama-11% ezweni lonke.
Ngamagama agcwele, emathubeni okuba nezindlu ezingu-1.4 wesigidi asehlinzekwe uhulumeni, ngiyaziqhenya ngokumemezela ukuthi isifundazwe sethu eminyakeni eyisishiyagalolunye edlule, uhlinzeke ngezindlu eziyizi-167 000, okungama-11% wokudingekayo ezweni lilonke.
Mayelana nalokho okubonakalayo, emathubeni ezezindlu angu-1.4 wamabhiliyoni uhulumeni owafezile, ngineqholo lokumemezela ukuthi isifundazwe sethu eminyakeni eyisishiyagalolunye edlule sakhe amayunithi ayi-167 000, okuyingxenye yama-11% ekhekhe kuzwelonke.
Ngamagama aliqiniso, kemathubeni ayisigidi esiso-1.4 ezindlu asethulwe uhulumeni, ngiyaziqhenya ukusho ukuthi isifundazwe sethu sesikhiphe izindlu eziyizi-167 000 eminyakeni eyisishiyagalolunye edlule, okungama-11% ezweni lonke.
Ngamagama agcwele, emathubeni okuba nezindlu ezingu-1.4 wesigidi asehlinzekwe uhulumeni, ngiyaziqhenya ngokumemezela ukuthi isifundazwe sethu eminyakeni eyisishiyagalolunye edlule, uhlinzeke ngezindlu eziyizi-167 000, okungama-11% wokudingekayo ezweni lilonke.
Ngamazwi aqinile, ezindlini eziyizigidi ezingu-1.4 ezakhiwe nguhulumeni, ngiyaziqhenya ukumemezela ukuthi eminyakeni eyisishiyagalolunye edlule, isifundazwe sethu sakha izindlu ezingu-167 000, okuyingxenye engu-11% ezindlini zikazwelonke. 
Ngamagama aliqiniso, kemathubeni ayisigidi esiso-1.4 ezindlu asethulwe uhulumeni, ngiyaziqhenya ukusho ukuthi isifundazwe sethu sesikhiphe izindlu eziyizi-167 000 eminyakeni eyisishiyagalolunye edlule, okungama-11% ezweni lonke.
Ngamagama agcwele, emathubeni okuba nezindlu ezingu-1.4 wesigidi asehlinzekwe uhulumeni, ngiyaziqhenya ngokumemezela ukuthi isifundazwe sethu eminyakeni eyisishiyagalolunye edlule, uhlinzeke ngezindlu eziyizi-167 000, okungama-11% wokudingekayo ezweni lilonke.
Ngamazwi aqinile, ezindlini eziyizigidi ezingu-1.4 ezakhiwe nguhulumeni, ngiyaziqhenya ukumemezela ukuthi eminyakeni eyisishiyagalolunye edlule, isifundazwe sethu sakha izindlu ezingu-167 000, okuyingxenye engu-11% ezindlini zikazwelonke. 
Mayelana nalokho okubonakalayo, emathubeni ezezindlu angu-1.4 wamabhiliyoni uhulumeni owafezile, ngineqholo lokumemezela ukuthi isifundazwe sethu eminyakeni eyisishiyagalolunye edlule sakhe amayunithi ayi-167 000, okuyingxenye yama-11% ekhekhe kuzwelonke.
Lokhu, ngokubona kwami wumsebenzi omkhulu impela osewenziwe kunoma eliphi izinga.
Ngokombono wami, lokhu kungumsebenzi omuhle kakhulu nganoma yiliphi izinga.
Ngokubona kwami lokhu kungumsebenzi oncomekayo kunoma yiliphi izinga.
Lokhu, ngokubona kwami kuwumsebenzi omuhle kakhulu noma ukubuka ngayiphi indlela.
Ngokombono wami, lokhu kungumsebenzi omuhle kakhulu nganoma yiliphi izinga.
Ngokubona kwami lokhu kungumsebenzi oncomekayo kunoma yiliphi izinga.
Lokhu, ngokubona kwami kuwumsebenzi omuhle kakhulu noma ukubuka ngayiphi indlela.
Lokhu, ngokubona kwami wumsebenzi omkhulu impela osewenziwe kunoma eliphi izinga.
Ngokubona kwami lokhu kungumsebenzi oncomekayo kunoma yiliphi izinga.
Lokhu, ngokubona kwami kuwumsebenzi omuhle kakhulu noma ukubuka ngayiphi indlela.
Lokhu, ngokubona kwami wumsebenzi omkhulu impela osewenziwe kunoma eliphi izinga.
Ngokombono wami, lokhu kungumsebenzi omuhle kakhulu nganoma yiliphi izinga.
Lokhu, ngokubona kwami kuwumsebenzi omuhle kakhulu noma ukubuka ngayiphi indlela.
Lokhu, ngokubona kwami wumsebenzi omkhulu impela osewenziwe kunoma eliphi izinga.
Ngokombono wami, lokhu kungumsebenzi omuhle kakhulu nganoma yiliphi izinga.
Ngokubona kwami lokhu kungumsebenzi oncomekayo kunoma yiliphi izinga.
Ngithanda nokuveza ukuthi unyaka odlule ubukhungethwe inqwaba yezinselele, ezibe nomthelela ekuhlinzekeni ngezindlu ezweni lilonke, kodwa ikakhulukazi kulesi sifundazwe.
Ngithanda nokuveza ukuthi iminyaka eyishumi edlule yayigcwele izinselele, okwakuphazamisa kabi kakhulu ukuhlinzekwa kwezindlu ezweni lonke, ngaphandle kwakulesi sifundazwe ngokukhethekile.
Ngizothanda nokuthi ngikusho ukuthi unyaka odlule ubugcwele izinselelo ezibe nomthelela ongemuhle ekwethulweni kwezindlu ezweni jikelele, kodwa ikakhulukazi la kulesi sifundazwe.
Ngiyathanda ukusho futhi ukuthi unyaka owedlule ubungeve unezingqinamba, okube nomthelela omubi ekwethulweni kwezindlu ezweni lonkana, kodwa kuzwele kakhulu esifundazweni.
Ngithanda nokuveza ukuthi iminyaka eyishumi edlule yayigcwele izinselele, okwakuphazamisa kabi kakhulu ukuhlinzekwa kwezindlu ezweni lonke, ngaphandle kwakulesi sifundazwe ngokukhethekile.

Lezi zinselele zabangelwa ukwethulwa kwezimiselo zenqubomgomo entsha kanye nemigomo enjengokuthi umhlomuli kwakudingeka  aphose esivivaneni izingu R2 479 kanye nokwethulwa koHlelo Lwesiqinisekiso Somkhandlu Wokubhaliswa Kwabakhi Bezindlu Kuzwelonke lwezindlu ezixhaswe uhulumeni.
Lezi zinselele zazibangelwa ukwethulwa kwemiyalelo yenqubomgomo entsha nezindlela njengokunikela kwabazohlomula imali engu-R2 479 kanye nokwethulwa kwesiKimu Sesiqinisekiso Somkhandlu Wokubhaliswa Kwabakhi Bezindlu Kuzwelonke ezindlini ezixhaswa nguhulumeni.
Lezi zinselelo zaba khona ngenxa yokusungulwa kwemithetho emisha yenqubomgomo lapho kwase kudingeka khona ukuthi lowo owakhelwa indlu akhiphe imali engama-R2 479 kanye nokusebenza Kwesikimi Samawaranti  Omkhandlu Kuzwelonke Sokubhaliswa Kwabakhizindlu mayelana nezindlmxhaso zikahulumeni.
Lezi zinselelo zibe umphumela wokusungulwa kwezimiso nezinkambiso zenqubomgomo entsha ezifana nokuthi lowo ozothola indlu kumele akhokhe R2 479 nokulethwa Isikimu Sokuqinisekiswa Wumkhandlu Kazwelonke Wokubhalisa Abakhi Bezindlu eNingizimu Afrika ezindlini zomxhaso kahulumeni.

Inhloso ngalezi zindlela akusikho ukubambezela ukuhlinzeka ngezindlu kodwa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bakithi bathola izindlu eziseqophelweni elifanele nelisemandleni abo.
Lezi zinyathelo akuhloswanga ngazo ukwenza kuhambe ngolonwabu ukuhlinzekwa kwezindlu kodwa ngezokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bethu bathola izindlu ezingabizi zezinga elihle.
Lezi zindlela akuhlosiwe ngazo ukuhambisa kancane ukulethwa kwezindlu kodwa kungukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bethu bathola izindlu ezingabizi nezisezingeni elihle.
Le mizamo akuhlosiwe ngayo ukuba kuhambe kancane ukwethulwa komsebenzi, kepha eyokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bakithi bathola izindlu ezisezingeni futhi ezingambi eqolo. 
Lezi zinyathelo akuhloswanga ngazo ukwenza kuhambe ngolonwabu ukuhlinzekwa kwezindlu kodwa ngezokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bethu bathola izindlu ezingabizi zezinga elihle.

Nokho isifundo esibhekene naso ngokuqaliswa kwalezi zinqubomgomo senze ukuhlinzekwa kwezindlu kwashaya ngolonyawo.
Nokho ukufunda esikutholayo lapho sisebenzisa lezi zinqubomgomo kwenze ukuhlinzekwa kwezindlu kwahamba ngolonwabu.
Inqubo yokufunda kwethu ukufaka ekusebenzeni lezi zinqubomgomo yiko okwenza ukulethwa kwezindlu kuhambe kancane.
Njengoba sidlula kulesi sifundo nje ekuphumeleliseni lezi zinqubomigomo, kuwubambezelile umsebenzi wokuletha izindlu kubantu.

Inqubo yokufunda kwethu ukufaka ekusebenzeni lezi zinqubomgomo yiko okwenza ukulethwa kwezindlu kuhambe kancane.
Okwenza isimo sibe sibi kakhulu wukuthi umnyango wami usebenze ungenaye uMqondisi Omkhulu izinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye.
Okwenza izinto zaba zimbi nakakhulu ukuthi umnyango wami wasebenza izinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye ungenawo uMqondisi Owengamele.
Okwenza izinto zaba zimbi kakhulu wukuthi umnyango wami ubusebenza ngaphandle kukaMqondisi Omkhulu izinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye. 
Okwenze isimo sashuba nakakhulu kube ukuthi umnyango wami uqhubeke ngaphandle kobuholi boMqondisi Omkhulu kwaze kwaphela izinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye. 
Okwenza izinto zaba zimbi nakakhulu ukuthi umnyango wami wasebenza izinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye ungenawo uMqondisi Owengamele.

Okwenza izinto zaba zimbi nakakhulu ukuthi umnyango wami wasebenza izinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye ungenawo uMqondisi Owengamele.

Lokhu kuyibambezele kakhulu inqubekela-phambili.
Lokhu kwayidodobalisa inqubekela phambili ngezinga elikhulu kakhulu.
Lokhu kwayiphazamisa kakhulu inqubekela phambili.
Lokhu kwayibambezela ngempela inqubekela phambili kakhulu. 
Lokhu kwayidodobalisa inqubekela phambili ngezinga elikhulu kakhulu.
Lokhu kwayiphazamisa kakhulu inqubekela phambili.
Lokhu kwayibambezela ngempela inqubekela phambili kakhulu. 
Lokhu kuyibambezele kakhulu inqubekela-phambili.
Lokhu kwayiphazamisa kakhulu inqubekela phambili.
Lokhu kwayibambezela ngempela inqubekela phambili kakhulu. 
Lokhu kuyibambezele kakhulu inqubekela-phambili.
Lokhu kwayidodobalisa inqubekela phambili ngezinga elikhulu kakhulu.
Lokhu kwayibambezela ngempela inqubekela phambili kakhulu. 
Lokhu kuyibambezele kakhulu inqubekela-phambili.
Lokhu kwayidodobalisa inqubekela phambili ngezinga elikhulu kakhulu.
Lokhu kwayiphazamisa kakhulu inqubekela phambili.
Sengize ngaqoka uMnu. Seth Maqethuka, ozalelwe futhi wakhulela eKapa onesipiliyoni emsebenzini kahulumeni kuzwelonke nasekhaya, engithanda ukumhalalisela futhi ngimamukele yize sengikwenze kaninginingi lokho.
Manje usekhona engimmisile, uMnu. Seth Maqethuka, owazalelwa futhi wakhulela eCape Town onolwazi lwezikahulumeni kazwelonke nowasekhaya, engithanda ukumbongela nokumamukela nakuba ngiye ngakwenza lokho izikhathi eziningi.
Sengimqokile uMnuz Seth Maqethula, owazalelwa wakhulela lapha eKapa, oseke wasebenza kuhulumeni kazwelonke nakuhulumeni wasekhaya, engithanda ukumhalalisela futhi ngimemukele nakuba sengikwenzile lokhu izikhathi eziningi.
Sengiye ngamthola ongene kulo msebenzi, uMnu Seth Maqethuka, osebenze kakhulu kuhulumeni kazwelonke nowesifundazwe, engithanda ukumhalalisela kakhulu futhi ngimamukele yize sengikwenze izikhathi eziningana impela.
Manje usekhona engimmisile, uMnu. Seth Maqethuka, owazalelwa futhi wakhulela eCape Town onolwazi lwezikahulumeni kazwelonke nowasekhaya, engithanda ukumbongela nokumamukela nakuba ngiye ngakwenza lokho izikhathi eziningi.

Yize zibe khona lezi zinselele nezingqinamba, ngiyaziqhenya ngokumemezela ukuthi ebantwini bakithi ukuthi umnyango wami ukwaze ukusebenzisa isigidi ezingu R348, okungu 92% ngokwabiwa kwezindlu eNtshonalanga Kapa.
Naphezu kwazo zonke lezi zinselele nezithiyo, ngiyaziqhenya  ukumemezela kubantu bethu ukuthi umnyango wami ukwazile ukuchitha imali eyizigidi ezingu-R348, okungu-92% wemali eyayabelwe ezezindlu eWestern Cape.
Ngaphandle kwazo zonke lezi zinselelo nezithiyo, ngiyaziqhenya ngokumemezela kubantu bethu ukuthi umnyango wami ukwazile ukusebenzisa ama-R348 wamabhiliyoni okungama-92% esabelo sezezindlu eNtshonalanga Kapa.
Yize siye sahlangabezana nalezi zinselelo nemikhawulo, ngiyaziqhenya ukumemezela kubantu bakithi ukuthi umnyango wami ukwazile ukusebenzisa izigidi ezingama-R348, okungama-92% esabelo sezezindlu eNtshonalanga Kapa.

Lokhu bafowethu nodadewethu, kubonakalisa ukwenyuka okubabazekayo ngezindlu ezingu 3000 uma kuqhathaniswa nonyaka odlule.

Mayelana nalokhu, ngingathanda ukubonga iqhaza elibalulekile elibanjwa omasipala esifundazweni.
Kulokhu, ngithanda ukubonga iqhaza ebalulekile elibanjwe ngomasipala esifundazweni sethu.
Mayelana nalokhu, ngithanda ukubonga indima ebalulekile edlalwe ngomasipala kulesi sifundazwe.

Ngaphandle kokuzinikela kwabo kanye nokusebenza okumangalisayo, besingeke size sikwazi ukuqhuba umsebenzi.
Ngaphandle kokuzibophezela kwabo nomsebenzi omuhle kakhulu, sasingeke sikwazi ukuchitha le mali.
Ngaphandle kokuzibophezela kwabo nomsebenzi wabo oncomekayo, besingeke sikwazi ukusebenzisa le mali.
Ngaphandle kokuzinikela kwabo nokusebenza okubabazekayo, besingeke sakwazi ukuyisebenzisa le mali.
Ngaphandle kokuzibophezela kwabo nomsebenzi omuhle kakhulu, sasingeke sikwazi ukuchitha le mali.
Ngaphandle kokuzibophezela kwabo nomsebenzi wabo oncomekayo, besingeke sikwazi ukusebenzisa le mali.
Ngaphandle kokuzinikela kwabo nokusebenza okubabazekayo, besingeke sakwazi ukuyisebenzisa le mali.

Ngaphandle kokuzinikela kwabo kanye nokusebenza okumangalisayo, besingeke size sikwazi ukuqhuba umsebenzi.

Khona manjalo, ngingathanda ukuhalalisela Idolobha LaseKapa ngokusebenzisa ama 70% esabelomali sethu.
Ngezwi elifanayo, ngithanda ukubongela iDolobha laseCape Town ngokuchitha okungaba ngu-70% wesabelomali sethu.
Ngithanda nokuhalalisela uMkhandludolobha Kamasipala WaseKapa ngokusebenzisa cishe ama-70% esabelwenizimali sethu.
Ngisasho njalo, ngithanda ukuhalalisela iDolobhakazi lase-Cape Town ngokusebenzisa cisho ama-70% ebhajethi yethu.

Angizukukhohlwa abasebenzi bami ngokusebenza kanzima kanye neqhaza ababe nalo embonweni wethu wokuhlinzeka izwe ngezindlu.
Angizikhohlwa nezikhulu zami ngomsebenzi wazo wokuzikhandla nomthelela embonweni wethu wokwakhela isizwe izindlu.
Nezikhulu zami angizishiyi ngokusebenza kwazo ngokuzikhandla nokubamba iqhaza kwinhlosombono yethu yesizwe esinezindlu. 
Ngingazikhohlwa neziphathimandla zami ngokusebenza nzima kwazo negalelo lazo kumbono wethu wokuhlinzeka isizwe ngezindlu.
Angizikhohlwa nezikhulu zami ngomsebenzi wazo wokuzikhandla nomthelela embonweni wethu wokwakhela isizwe izindlu.
Nezikhulu zami angizishiyi ngokusebenza kwazo ngokuzikhandla nokubamba iqhaza kwinhlosombono yethu yesizwe esinezindlu. 
Ngingazikhohlwa neziphathimandla zami ngokusebenza nzima kwazo negalelo lazo kumbono wethu wokuhlinzeka isizwe ngezindlu.
Angizukukhohlwa abasebenzi bami ngokusebenza kanzima kanye neqhaza ababe nalo embonweni wethu wokuhlinzeka izwe ngezindlu.
Nezikhulu zami angizishiyi ngokusebenza kwazo ngokuzikhandla nokubamba iqhaza kwinhlosombono yethu yesizwe esinezindlu. 
Ngingazikhohlwa neziphathimandla zami ngokusebenza nzima kwazo negalelo lazo kumbono wethu wokuhlinzeka isizwe ngezindlu.
Angizukukhohlwa abasebenzi bami ngokusebenza kanzima kanye neqhaza ababe nalo embonweni wethu wokuhlinzeka izwe ngezindlu.
Angizikhohlwa nezikhulu zami ngomsebenzi wazo wokuzikhandla nomthelela embonweni wethu wokwakhela isizwe izindlu.
Ngingazikhohlwa neziphathimandla zami ngokusebenza nzima kwazo negalelo lazo kumbono wethu wokuhlinzeka isizwe ngezindlu.
Angizukukhohlwa abasebenzi bami ngokusebenza kanzima kanye neqhaza ababe nalo embonweni wethu wokuhlinzeka izwe ngezindlu.
Angizikhohlwa nezikhulu zami ngomsebenzi wazo wokuzikhandla nomthelela embonweni wethu wokwakhela isizwe izindlu.
Nezikhulu zami angizishiyi ngokusebenza kwazo ngokuzikhandla nokubamba iqhaza kwinhlosombono yethu yesizwe esinezindlu. 
Bafowethu nodadewethu, unembeza wami ngeke unginike ukuthula uma ngingase ngithi konke kuyacwebezela enqubweni yokuhlinzeka ngezindlu.
Manene namanenekazi, ngiyobe angithembekile kulokho unembeza wami ongitshela khona uma ngininika umbono okhazimulayo kuphela wenqubo yokuhlinzekwa kwezindlu.
Manene namanenekazi, angeke ngizikhohlise ngokuthi ngibeke isithombe esihle kuphela mayelana nenqubo yokulethwa kwezindlu.
Manene namanenekazi, ngabe anginalo iqiniso kunembeza wami uma ngincoma nje kuphela ngohlelo lokwethulwa kwezindlu. 
Manene namanenekazi, ngiyobe angithembekile kulokho unembeza wami ongitshela khona uma ngininika umbono okhazimulayo kuphela wenqubo yokuhlinzekwa kwezindlu.
Manene namanenekazi, angeke ngizikhohlise ngokuthi ngibeke isithombe esihle kuphela mayelana nenqubo yokulethwa kwezindlu.
Manene namanenekazi, ngabe anginalo iqiniso kunembeza wami uma ngincoma nje kuphela ngohlelo lokwethulwa kwezindlu. 
Bafowethu nodadewethu, unembeza wami ngeke unginike ukuthula uma ngingase ngithi konke kuyacwebezela enqubweni yokuhlinzeka ngezindlu.
Manene namanenekazi, angeke ngizikhohlise ngokuthi ngibeke isithombe esihle kuphela mayelana nenqubo yokulethwa kwezindlu.
Manene namanenekazi, ngabe anginalo iqiniso kunembeza wami uma ngincoma nje kuphela ngohlelo lokwethulwa kwezindlu. 
Bafowethu nodadewethu, unembeza wami ngeke unginike ukuthula uma ngingase ngithi konke kuyacwebezela enqubweni yokuhlinzeka ngezindlu.
Manene namanenekazi, ngiyobe angithembekile kulokho unembeza wami ongitshela khona uma ngininika umbono okhazimulayo kuphela wenqubo yokuhlinzekwa kwezindlu.
Manene namanenekazi, ngabe anginalo iqiniso kunembeza wami uma ngincoma nje kuphela ngohlelo lokwethulwa kwezindlu. 
Bafowethu nodadewethu, unembeza wami ngeke unginike ukuthula uma ngingase ngithi konke kuyacwebezela enqubweni yokuhlinzeka ngezindlu.
Manene namanenekazi, ngiyobe angithembekile kulokho unembeza wami ongitshela khona uma ngininika umbono okhazimulayo kuphela wenqubo yokuhlinzekwa kwezindlu.
Manene namanenekazi, angeke ngizikhohlise ngokuthi ngibeke isithombe esihle kuphela mayelana nenqubo yokulethwa kwezindlu.
Kusanesikhala esikhona enqubweni yokuhlinzeka ngezindlu.
Kusenamagebe asasele enqubweni yethu yokuhlinzeka izindlu.
Zisekhona izikhala kwinqubo yethu yokulethwa kwezindlu.
Zisekhona izikhala ezisasele ohlelweni lokwethulwa kwezindlu. 
Kusenamagebe asasele enqubweni yethu yokuhlinzeka izindlu.
Zisekhona izikhala kwinqubo yethu yokulethwa kwezindlu.
Zisekhona izikhala ezisasele ohlelweni lokwethulwa kwezindlu. 
Kusanesikhala esikhona enqubweni yokuhlinzeka ngezindlu.
Zisekhona izikhala kwinqubo yethu yokulethwa kwezindlu.
Zisekhona izikhala ezisasele ohlelweni lokwethulwa kwezindlu. 
Kusanesikhala esikhona enqubweni yokuhlinzeka ngezindlu.
Kusenamagebe asasele enqubweni yethu yokuhlinzeka izindlu.
Zisekhona izikhala ezisasele ohlelweni lokwethulwa kwezindlu. 
Kusanesikhala esikhona enqubweni yokuhlinzeka ngezindlu.
Kusenamagebe asasele enqubweni yethu yokuhlinzeka izindlu.
Zisekhona izikhala kwinqubo yethu yokulethwa kwezindlu.
Ngenxa yalokhu, kusamele silungise ezindaweni ezilandelayo:
Ukuze sifeze lokhu, kusadingeka sithuthukise kulezi zindawo ezicindezelayo ezilandelayo:
Ukufikela manje, kusadingeka ukuthi senze ngcono kulokhu okulandelayo okusasicindezele: 
Kuze kube manje, kusadinga silungise kule zindawo ezilandelayo ezinengcindezi:
Ukuze sifeze lokhu, kusadingeka sithuthukise kulezi zindawo ezicindezelayo ezilandelayo:
Ukufikela manje, kusadingeka ukuthi senze ngcono kulokhu okulandelayo okusasicindezele: 
Kuze kube manje, kusadinga silungise kule zindawo ezilandelayo ezinengcindezi:

Ukuze sifeze lokhu, kusadingeka sithuthukise kulezi zindawo ezicindezelayo ezilandelayo:
Ukufikela manje, kusadingeka ukuthi senze ngcono kulokhu okulandelayo okusasicindezele: 
Izindlu zethu eziningi azikahambisani nenqubomgomo ngokugudluka ekuhlinzekeni ngezindlu eziningi kudlulelwe ekuhlinzekeni ngezindlu eziseqophelweni eliphezulu.
Iningi lezindlu zethu alikavumelani nokushintsha kwenqubomgomo kusuka enanini kuya ezingeni elihle lezindlu.
Iningi lezindlu zethu alikahambisani nenqubomgomo egudluke ukusuka emananini ezindlu kwaya kwizinganhle lezindlu. 
Iningi lezindlu zethu azikawenelisi umgomo wokugudluka emananini kuyiwe ekhwalithini.
Iningi lezindlu zethu alikavumelani nokushintsha kwenqubomgomo kusuka enanini kuya ezingeni elihle lezindlu.
Iningi lezindlu zethu alikahambisani nenqubomgomo egudluke ukusuka emananini ezindlu kwaya kwizinganhle lezindlu. 
Iningi lezindlu zethu azikawenelisi umgomo wokugudluka emananini kuyiwe ekhwalithini.
Izindlu zethu eziningi azikahambisani nenqubomgomo ngokugudluka ekuhlinzekeni ngezindlu eziningi kudlulelwe ekuhlinzekeni ngezindlu eziseqophelweni eliphezulu.
Iningi lezindlu zethu alikahambisani nenqubomgomo egudluke ukusuka emananini ezindlu kwaya kwizinganhle lezindlu. 
Iningi lezindlu zethu azikawenelisi umgomo wokugudluka emananini kuyiwe ekhwalithini.
Izindlu zethu eziningi azikahambisani nenqubomgomo ngokugudluka ekuhlinzekeni ngezindlu eziningi kudlulelwe ekuhlinzekeni ngezindlu eziseqophelweni eliphezulu.
Iningi lezindlu zethu alikavumelani nokushintsha kwenqubomgomo kusuka enanini kuya ezingeni elihle lezindlu.
Iningi lezindlu zethu azikawenelisi umgomo wokugudluka emananini kuyiwe ekhwalithini.
Izindlu zethu eziningi azikahambisani nenqubomgomo ngokugudluka ekuhlinzekeni ngezindlu eziningi kudlulelwe ekuhlinzekeni ngezindlu eziseqophelweni eliphezulu.
Iningi lezindlu zethu alikavumelani nokushintsha kwenqubomgomo kusuka enanini kuya ezingeni elihle lezindlu.
Iningi lezindlu zethu alikahambisani nenqubomgomo egudluke ukusuka emananini ezindlu kwaya kwizinganhle lezindlu. 
Kusadingeka ukuthi sishintshe inqubo yokuhlinzeka ngezindlu isuke kuleyo yokuhlinzeka ngophahla lokufihla ikhanda kudlulelwe ekudaleni izindawo zokuhlala abantu ngokuqhubekisekayo.
Kusadingeka sishintshe inqubo yokuhlinzeka izindlu isuke kweyokuhlinzeka indawo yokukhosela kuye ekwakheni izindawo ezisimeme zokuhlala abantu.
Kusadingeka ukuthi sishintshe inqubo yokulethwa kwezindlu kusukela ekuhlinzekweni kwamakhaya kuye kwinqubo yokusungula yezokuhlaliswa kwabantu okusimeme. 
Sisadinga ukuluguqula uhlelo lokwethula izindlu, kungabi nje izindawo zokufihla ikhanda, kepha sakhe izindawo ezisimeme abantu abazohlala kuzo kade.
Kusadingeka sishintshe inqubo yokuhlinzeka izindlu isuke kweyokuhlinzeka indawo yokukhosela kuye ekwakheni izindawo ezisimeme zokuhlala abantu.
Kusadingeka ukuthi sishintshe inqubo yokulethwa kwezindlu kusukela ekuhlinzekweni kwamakhaya kuye kwinqubo yokusungula yezokuhlaliswa kwabantu okusimeme. 
Sisadinga ukuluguqula uhlelo lokwethula izindlu, kungabi nje izindawo zokufihla ikhanda, kepha sakhe izindawo ezisimeme abantu abazohlala kuzo kade.
Kusadingeka ukuthi sishintshe inqubo yokuhlinzeka ngezindlu isuke kuleyo yokuhlinzeka ngophahla lokufihla ikhanda kudlulelwe ekudaleni izindawo zokuhlala abantu ngokuqhubekisekayo.

Kusadingeka ukuthi sishintshe inqubo yokuhlinzeka ngezindlu isuke kuleyo yokuhlinzeka ngophahla lokufihla ikhanda kudlulelwe ekudaleni izindawo zokuhlala abantu ngokuqhubekisekayo.
Kusadingeka sishintshe inqubo yokuhlinzeka izindlu isuke kweyokuhlinzeka indawo yokukhosela kuye ekwakheni izindawo ezisimeme zokuhlala abantu.

Kusadingeka sishintshe inqubo yokuhlinzeka izindlu isuke kweyokuhlinzeka indawo yokukhosela kuye ekwakheni izindawo ezisimeme zokuhlala abantu.
Kusadingeka ukuthi sishintshe inqubo yokulethwa kwezindlu kusukela ekuhlinzekweni kwamakhaya kuye kwinqubo yokusungula yezokuhlaliswa kwabantu okusimeme. 
Kudingeka siguqule ukuzibandakanya kwabahlomulayo, bangahlali phansi, kepha basukume bazibambele mathupha.
Kudingeka siguqule ukubamba iqhaza kwabahlomulayo bayeke ukungenzi lutho kodwa babambe iqhaza ngentshiseko.
Kudingeka ukuba sishintshe ukubamba iqhaza kwalabo abalethelwa izindlu ukuba kube khona abakwenzayo esikhundleni sokungenzi lutho kule nqubo.
Sidinga ukuliguqula iqhaza labahlomulayo bangabe besaba ababukayo nje bamukele loko abakunikwayo, kepha nabo bahlanganyele ohlelweni.
Kudingeka siguqule ukubamba iqhaza kwabahlomulayo bayeke ukungenzi lutho kodwa babambe iqhaza ngentshiseko.
Kudingeka ukuba sishintshe ukubamba iqhaza kwalabo abalethelwa izindlu ukuba kube khona abakwenzayo esikhundleni sokungenzi lutho kule nqubo.
Sidinga ukuliguqula iqhaza labahlomulayo bangabe besaba ababukayo nje bamukele loko abakunikwayo, kepha nabo bahlanganyele ohlelweni.

Kudingeka sishintshe indlela esicabanga ngayo ukuze sikwazi bakwazi ukubheka imixhaso kahulumeni njengempahla ebalulekile hhayi imikhiqizo engatheni.
Kudingeka sishintshe indlela abantu bethu abacabanga ngayo ukuze baqale ukubheka izindlu ezixhaswe nguhulumeni hhayi nje njengeziyimikhiqizo engasho lutho kodwa njengezinto eziyinzuzo.
Kudingeka ukuba sishintshe indlela abantu bethu abacabanga ngayo ukuze bakwazi ukubona izindlu zomxhaso kahulumeni njengempahla enenani kunokuba babone lezi zindlu njengemikhiqizo nje kuphela.
Sidinga ukuyiguqula indlela yokucabanga yabantu bakithi ukuze baqale babuke izindlu zemixhaso kahulumeni njengezabo hhayi imikhiqizo nje.
Kudingeka sishintshe indlela abantu bethu abacabanga ngayo ukuze baqale ukubheka izindlu ezixhaswe nguhulumeni hhayi nje njengeziyimikhiqizo engasho lutho kodwa njengezinto eziyinzuzo.
Kudingeka ukuba sishintshe indlela abantu bethu abacabanga ngayo ukuze bakwazi ukubona izindlu zomxhaso kahulumeni njengempahla enenani kunokuba babone lezi zindlu njengemikhiqizo nje kuphela.
Sidinga ukuyiguqula indlela yokucabanga yabantu bakithi ukuze baqale babuke izindlu zemixhaso kahulumeni njengezabo hhayi imikhiqizo nje.
Kudingeka sishintshe indlela esicabanga ngayo ukuze sikwazi bakwazi ukubheka imixhaso kahulumeni njengempahla ebalulekile hhayi imikhiqizo engatheni.
Kudingeka ukuba sishintshe indlela abantu bethu abacabanga ngayo ukuze bakwazi ukubona izindlu zomxhaso kahulumeni njengempahla enenani kunokuba babone lezi zindlu njengemikhiqizo nje kuphela.
Sidinga ukuyiguqula indlela yokucabanga yabantu bakithi ukuze baqale babuke izindlu zemixhaso kahulumeni njengezabo hhayi imikhiqizo nje.
Kudingeka sishintshe indlela esicabanga ngayo ukuze sikwazi bakwazi ukubheka imixhaso kahulumeni njengempahla ebalulekile hhayi imikhiqizo engatheni.
Kudingeka sishintshe indlela abantu bethu abacabanga ngayo ukuze baqale ukubheka izindlu ezixhaswe nguhulumeni hhayi nje njengeziyimikhiqizo engasho lutho kodwa njengezinto eziyinzuzo.
Sidinga ukuyiguqula indlela yokucabanga yabantu bakithi ukuze baqale babuke izindlu zemixhaso kahulumeni njengezabo hhayi imikhiqizo nje.
Kudingeka sishintshe indlela esicabanga ngayo ukuze sikwazi bakwazi ukubheka imixhaso kahulumeni njengempahla ebalulekile hhayi imikhiqizo engatheni.
Kudingeka sishintshe indlela abantu bethu abacabanga ngayo ukuze baqale ukubheka izindlu ezixhaswe nguhulumeni hhayi nje njengeziyimikhiqizo engasho lutho kodwa njengezinto eziyinzuzo.
Kudingeka ukuba sishintshe indlela abantu bethu abacabanga ngayo ukuze bakwazi ukubona izindlu zomxhaso kahulumeni njengempahla enenani kunokuba babone lezi zindlu njengemikhiqizo nje kuphela.

UKWAHLUKANISWA KOMSEBENZI WAMAPHOYISA NGOKWEZIGCEME
IMISEBENZI YOKUQAPHA ENDAWENI
UHLELO LOKUGADWA KOMPHAKATHI NGAMAPHOYISA NGEZIGABA ZAWO
UKUPHOYISA NGEZINDAWO KUYASEBENZA
IMISEBENZI YOKUQAPHA ENDAWENI
UHLELO LOKUGADWA KOMPHAKATHI NGAMAPHOYISA NGEZIGABA ZAWO
UKUPHOYISA NGEZINDAWO KUYASEBENZA
UKWAHLUKANISWA KOMSEBENZI WAMAPHOYISA NGOKWEZIGCEME
UHLELO LOKUGADWA KOMPHAKATHI NGAMAPHOYISA NGEZIGABA ZAWO
UKUPHOYISA NGEZINDAWO KUYASEBENZA
UKWAHLUKANISWA KOMSEBENZI WAMAPHOYISA NGOKWEZIGCEME
IMISEBENZI YOKUQAPHA ENDAWENI
UKUPHOYISA NGEZINDAWO KUYASEBENZA
UKWAHLUKANISWA KOMSEBENZI WAMAPHOYISA NGOKWEZIGCEME
IMISEBENZI YOKUQAPHA ENDAWENI
UHLELO LOKUGADWA KOMPHAKATHI NGAMAPHOYISA NGEZIGABA ZAWO
Kwaba nokukhulu ukukhululeka kumama nomntwana lapho uJames Busakwe owayenezinsuku eziyi-16 ezelwe ehlanganiswa kabusha nonina omzalayo mhla ziyisi-7 kuMbasa 2006.
Kwaba nempumuzo enkulu ngomama nengane lapho uJames Busakwe onezinsuku ezingu-16 ubudala ephinda ehlanganiswa nomama wakhe ongokwemvelo ngomhla ka-7 kuMbasa 2006.
Wasizakala kakhulu umama nengane ngesikhathi uJames Busakwe onezinsuku eziyi-16 ubudala ebuye ehlangana nomama wakhe omzalayo ngomhla wesi-7 Mbaso 2006.  
Kwaba nokukhululeka okukhulu kumame nendodana mhla uJames Busakwe owayenezinsuku ezili-16 nje kuphela ezelwe ephinde exhumana nonina omzalayo mhla ziyi-7 Ephreli 2006. 
Kwaba nempumuzo enkulu ngomama nengane lapho uJames Busakwe onezinsuku ezingu-16 ubudala ephinda ehlanganiswa nomama wakhe ongokwemvelo ngomhla ka-7 kuMbasa 2006.
Wasizakala kakhulu umama nengane ngesikhathi uJames Busakwe onezinsuku eziyi-16 ubudala ebuye ehlangana nomama wakhe omzalayo ngomhla wesi-7 Mbaso 2006.  
Kwaba nokukhululeka okukhulu kumame nendodana mhla uJames Busakwe owayenezinsuku ezili-16 nje kuphela ezelwe ephinde exhumana nonina omzalayo mhla ziyi-7 Ephreli 2006. 
Kwaba nokukhulu ukukhululeka kumama nomntwana lapho uJames Busakwe owayenezinsuku eziyi-16 ezelwe ehlanganiswa kabusha nonina omzalayo mhla ziyisi-7 kuMbasa 2006.
Wasizakala kakhulu umama nengane ngesikhathi uJames Busakwe onezinsuku eziyi-16 ubudala ebuye ehlangana nomama wakhe omzalayo ngomhla wesi-7 Mbaso 2006.  
Kwaba nokukhululeka okukhulu kumame nendodana mhla uJames Busakwe owayenezinsuku ezili-16 nje kuphela ezelwe ephinde exhumana nonina omzalayo mhla ziyi-7 Ephreli 2006. 
Kwaba nokukhulu ukukhululeka kumama nomntwana lapho uJames Busakwe owayenezinsuku eziyi-16 ezelwe ehlanganiswa kabusha nonina omzalayo mhla ziyisi-7 kuMbasa 2006.
Kwaba nempumuzo enkulu ngomama nengane lapho uJames Busakwe onezinsuku ezingu-16 ubudala ephinda ehlanganiswa nomama wakhe ongokwemvelo ngomhla ka-7 kuMbasa 2006.
Kwaba nokukhululeka okukhulu kumame nendodana mhla uJames Busakwe owayenezinsuku ezili-16 nje kuphela ezelwe ephinde exhumana nonina omzalayo mhla ziyi-7 Ephreli 2006. 
Kwaba nokukhulu ukukhululeka kumama nomntwana lapho uJames Busakwe owayenezinsuku eziyi-16 ezelwe ehlanganiswa kabusha nonina omzalayo mhla ziyisi-7 kuMbasa 2006.
Kwaba nempumuzo enkulu ngomama nengane lapho uJames Busakwe onezinsuku ezingu-16 ubudala ephinda ehlanganiswa nomama wakhe ongokwemvelo ngomhla ka-7 kuMbasa 2006.
Wasizakala kakhulu umama nengane ngesikhathi uJames Busakwe onezinsuku eziyi-16 ubudala ebuye ehlangana nomama wakhe omzalayo ngomhla wesi-7 Mbaso 2006.  
Udaba lwaqala ngenkathi unina wosana ogama lalo kunguJames efika esibhedlela saseKlerksdorp mhlaka 6 kuMbasa eyovakashela indodana yakhe, lapho umhlengikazi abona khona ukuthi usane lwalunikwe omunye umuntu wesimame, owayethe ngayizolo ungunina ozala umntwana.
Usizi lwaqala lapho umama womntwana uJames efika eSibhedlela saseKlerksdorp ngomhla ziyisi-6 kuMbasa ezovakashela indodana yakhe, futhi abahlengikazi beqaphela ukuthi ingane bayinike omunye owesifazane, owathi ungumama wengane oyizalayo ngayizolo.
Lesi sehlo saqala ngesikhathi unina womntwana uJames efika eKlerksdorp Hospital ngomhla ziyisi-6 kuMbasa ukuzovakashela indodana yakhe, okwaba yingaleso sikhathi amanesi abona khona ukuthi ingane inikezwe omunye umama owayethe nguye umama ozala  ingane ngayizolo.
Lesi sigemegeme saqala mhla we-6 Ephreli unina ka-James efika esibhedlela sase-Klerksdorp ethi uzovakashela indodana yakhe, kwayila amanesi ebona ukuthi ingane yakhe inikezwe omunye wesimame ngayizolo, owayethe nguyena umama wengane.
Usizi lwaqala lapho umama womntwana uJames efika eSibhedlela saseKlerksdorp ngomhla ziyisi-6 kuMbasa ezovakashela indodana yakhe, futhi abahlengikazi beqaphela ukuthi ingane bayinike omunye owesifazane, owathi ungumama wengane oyizalayo ngayizolo.
Lesi sehlo saqala ngesikhathi unina womntwana uJames efika eKlerksdorp Hospital ngomhla ziyisi-6 kuMbasa ukuzovakashela indodana yakhe, okwaba yingaleso sikhathi amanesi abona khona ukuthi ingane inikezwe omunye umama owayethe nguye umama ozala  ingane ngayizolo.
Lesi sigemegeme saqala mhla we-6 Ephreli unina ka-James efika esibhedlela sase-Klerksdorp ethi uzovakashela indodana yakhe, kwayila amanesi ebona ukuthi ingane yakhe inikezwe omunye wesimame ngayizolo, owayethe nguyena umama wengane.

Usizi lwaqala lapho umama womntwana uJames efika eSibhedlela saseKlerksdorp ngomhla ziyisi-6 kuMbasa ezovakashela indodana yakhe, futhi abahlengikazi beqaphela ukuthi ingane bayinike omunye owesifazane, owathi ungumama wengane oyizalayo ngayizolo.
Lesi sehlo saqala ngesikhathi unina womntwana uJames efika eKlerksdorp Hospital ngomhla ziyisi-6 kuMbasa ukuzovakashela indodana yakhe, okwaba yingaleso sikhathi amanesi abona khona ukuthi ingane inikezwe omunye umama owayethe nguye umama ozala  ingane ngayizolo.
Kwathi lapho kutholakala iqiniso, abahlengikazi babika eSiteshini Samaphoyisa eKanana, kwazise owesimame owayelande uJames wayebanike ikheli laseKanana.
Ngokushesha ngemva kokutholakala kwalokho, abahlengikazi batshela iSiteshi SamaPhoyisa SaseKanana, ngoba owesifazane owayethathe uJames wayebanike ikheli eliseKanana.
Masinyane emva kokuthola lokhu, amanesi azisa Isiteshi Samaphoyisa SaseKanana, njengoba lo owesifazane owalanda uJames wanikezela ngekheli laseKanana. 
Kwathi kungavela nje loko, amanesi azisa amaphoyisa aseSiteshini Samaphoyisa sase-Kanana, njengalo umuntu wesifazane owathatha ingane wayenikeze ikheli laseKanana. 
Ngokushesha ngemva kokutholakala kwalokho, abahlengikazi batshela iSiteshi SamaPhoyisa SaseKanana, ngoba owesifazane owayethathe uJames wayebanike ikheli eliseKanana.

Indawo eyayivela ekhelini yafunwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya.
Baya kulelo kheli kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya.
Lahlolwa lelo kheli kodwa akutholwanga lutho kulo.
Lafunwa-ke ikheli, lutho ukuba litholakale.

Akekho umuntu owayazi igama kanye nencazelo ngalo muntu wesimame kuleliya kheli.
Kulelo kheli kwakungekho muntu onalelo gama noma incazelo yalowo wesifazane eyaziwayo lapho.
Akekho umuntu owayenalelo gama noma incazelo yalo owesifazane owayaziwa kuleli kheli.
Wayengaziwa umuntu owayenencazelo yalo wesifazane kulelo kheli.
Kulelo kheli kwakungekho muntu onalelo gama noma incazelo yalowo wesifazane eyaziwayo lapho.
Akekho umuntu owayenalelo gama noma incazelo yalo owesifazane owayaziwa kuleli kheli.
Wayengaziwa umuntu owayenencazelo yalo wesifazane kulelo kheli.
Akekho umuntu owayazi igama kanye nencazelo ngalo muntu wesimame kuleliya kheli.

Ngomhla ziyisi-6 kuMbasa kusihlwa iKanana CPF yabamba umhlangano.
Ngobusuku bangomhla ka-6 kuMbasa iKanana CPF yabamba umhlangano.
Kwathi ebusuku ngomhla ziyisi-6 kuMbaso i-CPF yaseKanana yabamba umhlangano.
Kusihlwa mhla we-6 Ephreli iKanana CPF yabamba umhlangano. 
Ngobusuku bangomhla ka-6 kuMbasa iKanana CPF yabamba umhlangano.
Kwathi ebusuku ngomhla ziyisi-6 kuMbaso i-CPF yaseKanana yabamba umhlangano.

Ukhomishana wesiteshi oyibamba watshela umhlangano ngengane eyayithunjiwe futhi wacela ukuthi bonke abantu bahlale bevule amehlo nezindlebe.
Ukhomishana obambele esiteshini wazisa umhlangano ngengane eduniwe futhi wacela bonke abantu ukuba bavule amehlo nezindlebe.
Ukhomishane owayeyibamba kuleso siteshi wazisa umhlangano mayelana nengane eyayithunjiwe, wacela wonke umuntu ukuba avule izindlebe namehlo ngaso sonke isikhathi.
Owayebambe okwesikhashana isikhundla sikakhomishani esiteshini wazisa umhlangano ngokuthunjwa kwengane wabe esecela wonke umuntu ukuthi avule amehlo nezindlebe. 
Ukhomishana obambele esiteshini wazisa umhlangano ngengane eduniwe futhi wacela bonke abantu ukuba bavule amehlo nezindlebe.
Ukhomishane owayeyibamba kuleso siteshi wazisa umhlangano mayelana nengane eyayithunjiwe, wacela wonke umuntu ukuba avule izindlebe namehlo ngaso sonke isikhathi.
Owayebambe okwesikhashana isikhundla sikakhomishani esiteshini wazisa umhlangano ngokuthunjwa kwengane wabe esecela wonke umuntu ukuthi avule amehlo nezindlebe. 
Ukhomishana wesiteshi oyibamba watshela umhlangano ngengane eyayithunjiwe futhi wacela ukuthi bonke abantu bahlale bevule amehlo nezindlebe.
Ukhomishane owayeyibamba kuleso siteshi wazisa umhlangano mayelana nengane eyayithunjiwe, wacela wonke umuntu ukuba avule izindlebe namehlo ngaso sonke isikhathi.

Ukhomishana obambele esiteshini wazisa umhlangano ngengane eduniwe futhi wacela bonke abantu ukuba bavule amehlo nezindlebe.
Owayebambe okwesikhashana isikhundla sikakhomishani esiteshini wazisa umhlangano ngokuthunjwa kwengane wabe esecela wonke umuntu ukuthi avule amehlo nezindlebe. 
Ukhomishana wesiteshi oyibamba watshela umhlangano ngengane eyayithunjiwe futhi wacela ukuthi bonke abantu bahlale bevule amehlo nezindlebe.
Ukhomishana obambele esiteshini wazisa umhlangano ngengane eduniwe futhi wacela bonke abantu ukuba bavule amehlo nezindlebe.
Ukhomishane owayeyibamba kuleso siteshi wazisa umhlangano mayelana nengane eyayithunjiwe, wacela wonke umuntu ukuba avule izindlebe namehlo ngaso sonke isikhathi.
Ngalobo busuku ngezikhathi zabo 23:00, elinye lamalungu omphakathi lashayela amaphoyisa ucingo libika ukuthi kunomuntu wesifazane ohlala esigcemeni salo, obekungaziwa ukuthi uzithwele, osekuthukeke enengane yomfana.
Kwathi cishe ngo-23:00 ngabo lobo busuku, elinye lamalungu omphakathi lashayela amaphoyisa ucingo ngezindaba zokuthi owesifazane othile ohlala endaweni yabo, futhi obaziwa ukuthi akakhulelwe, khonamanjalo usenomntwana womfana. 
Kuthe ngehora le-23:00 ngalobo busuku, oyedwa welungu lomphakathi washayela amaphoyisa wawanika ulwazi olwaluthi kukhona owesifazane ohlala kuleso sigaba, futhi owayengakaze abonakale ukuthi ukhululelwe kodwa usenomntwana womfana. 
Ngezikhathi zama-23:00 kubo lobo busuku, elinye ilungu lomphakathi lashayela amaphoyisa ucingo liwazisa ukuthi kukhona owesifazene endaweni  yangakubo, ongazange wabonakala ekhulelwe, kepha osenengane encane yomfana.
Kwathi cishe ngo-23:00 ngabo lobo busuku, elinye lamalungu omphakathi lashayela amaphoyisa ucingo ngezindaba zokuthi owesifazane othile ohlala endaweni yabo, futhi obaziwa ukuthi akakhulelwe, khonamanjalo usenomntwana womfana. 
Kuthe ngehora le-23:00 ngalobo busuku, oyedwa welungu lomphakathi washayela amaphoyisa wawanika ulwazi olwaluthi kukhona owesifazane ohlala kuleso sigaba, futhi owayengakaze abonakale ukuthi ukhululelwe kodwa usenomntwana womfana. 
Ngezikhathi zama-23:00 kubo lobo busuku, elinye ilungu lomphakathi lashayela amaphoyisa ucingo liwazisa ukuthi kukhona owesifazene endaweni  yangakubo, ongazange wabonakala ekhulelwe, kepha osenengane encane yomfana.

Amaphoyisa alandelela umbiko, amthola umuntu wesifazane nengane.
Amaphoyisa ayilandelela le ndaba futhi ngempela amthola lo wesifazane nengane.
Amaphoyisa alandela lolo lwazi ase emthola lo owesifazane nengane.
Amaphoyisa abe eselunandelela ke udaba, nangempela bambhadama lo wesimame nengane. 
Amaphoyisa ayilandelela le ndaba futhi ngempela amthola lo wesifazane nengane.
Amaphoyisa alandela lolo lwazi ase emthola lo owesifazane nengane.
Amaphoyisa abe eselunandelela ke udaba, nangempela bambhadama lo wesimame nengane.

Amaphoyisa abe eselunandelela ke udaba, nangempela bambhadama lo wesimame nengane.

Abasebenzi basesibhedlela babizwa futhi bayihlonza ngaleso sikhathi ingane, kanjalo nowesifazane owayeyithumbe esibhedlela.
Abasebenzi basesibhedlela babizwa futhi ngokushesha bayibona ingane, kanye nowesifazane owayeyidunile esibhedlela.
Abasebenzi basesibhedlela babizwa kwathi ngaphandle kokuchitha isikhathi bayibona le ngane ukuthi kwakuyiyo, kanye nalo owesifazane owayithumba esibhedlela.
Kwabizwa abasebenza esibhedlela, kwahlonzwa ngokushesha ingane, kanjalo nalo wesifazane owayeyithumbe esibhedlela.
Abasebenzi basesibhedlela babizwa futhi ngokushesha bayibona ingane, kanye nowesifazane owayeyidunile esibhedlela.

Abasebenzi basesibhedlela babizwa kwathi ngaphandle kokuchitha isikhathi bayibona le ngane ukuthi kwakuyiyo, kanye nalo owesifazane owayithumba esibhedlela.
Kwabizwa abasebenza esibhedlela, kwahlonzwa ngokushesha ingane, kanjalo nalo wesifazane owayeyithumbe esibhedlela.
Abasebenzi basesibhedlela babizwa futhi bayihlonza ngaleso sikhathi ingane, kanjalo nowesifazane owayeyithumbe esibhedlela.
Abasebenzi basesibhedlela babizwa futhi ngokushesha bayibona ingane, kanye nowesifazane owayeyidunile esibhedlela.
Kwabizwa abasebenza esibhedlela, kwahlonzwa ngokushesha ingane, kanjalo nalo wesifazane owayeyithumbe esibhedlela.
Abasebenzi basesibhedlela babizwa futhi bayihlonza ngaleso sikhathi ingane, kanjalo nowesifazane owayeyithumbe esibhedlela.
Abasebenzi basesibhedlela babizwa futhi ngokushesha bayibona ingane, kanye nowesifazane owayeyidunile esibhedlela.
Abasebenzi basesibhedlela babizwa kwathi ngaphandle kokuchitha isikhathi bayibona le ngane ukuthi kwakuyiyo, kanye nalo owesifazane owayithumba esibhedlela.
Kwatholakala ubufakazi obunhlobonhlobo, obubandakanya nezigqizo zeplastiki zasesibhedlela endlini kamsolwa.
Endlini yomsolwa kwatholakala ubufakazi obuhlukahlukene, kuhlanganisa nesongo lepulasitiki lasesibhedlela.
Kwatholakala ubufakazi obuhlukahlukene endlini yalo msolwa kubandakanya ibhengela leplastiki lasesibhedlela.
Kwatholaka ubufakazi obehlukehlukene  endlini kamsolwa lo, okubalwa kubo nebhengela lepulasitiki eliye lifakwe engalweni yengane.
Endlini yomsolwa kwatholakala ubufakazi obuhlukahlukene, kuhlanganisa nesongo lepulasitiki lasesibhedlela.

Lo muntu wesifazane waboshwa kwathi ingane ebeyingalinyazwanga yaphindiselwa esibhedlela,ngakusasa ekuseni  yahlanganiswa kabusha nomama wayo oyizalayo.
Lo wesifazane waboshwa futhi ingane eyayingalimele yabuyiselwa esibhedlela, lapho yaphinde yahlanganiswa khona nonina wangempela ekuseni ngakusasa.
Waboshwa lo owesifazane kwathi ingane eyayingalinyazwanga yabuyiselwa esibhedlela, lapho eyahlanganiswa khona nonina wangempela ekuseni ngosuku olulandelayo. 
Waboshwa ke lona wesimame, kanti ingane yabuyiselwa kunina oyizalayo ingenamyocu ngakusasa ekuseni.
Lo wesifazane waboshwa futhi ingane eyayingalimele yabuyiselwa esibhedlela, lapho yaphinde yahlanganiswa khona nonina wangempela ekuseni ngakusasa.
Waboshwa lo owesifazane kwathi ingane eyayingalinyazwanga yabuyiselwa esibhedlela, lapho eyahlanganiswa khona nonina wangempela ekuseni ngosuku olulandelayo.

Umsebenzi owenziwa amalungu omphakathi abandakanyekayo ekutholakaleni kwengane, kumele ushayelwe ihlombe, njengoba kwagqama ukubaluleka kokusebenzisana komphakathi namaphoyisa.
Izenzo zamalungu omphakathi owawubandakanyekile ekutholweni kwengane, kumelwe zinconywe, ngoba zabonisa ukubaluleka koMsebenzi Wokuqapha Womphakathi.
Izenzo zamalungu omphakathi ezaholela ekutholakaleni kwengane kumele zishayelwe izandla njengoba zaqhakambisa ukubaluleka kohlelo Lokubambisana Komphakathi Namaphoyisa. 
Ukwenza kwamalungu omphakathi afaka isandla ekutholakaleni kwengane, kufanele kushayelwe ihlombe, njengalo kwabonisa ukubaluleka kwesiPhoyisa Sasemphakathini. 
Izenzo zamalungu omphakathi owawubandakanyekile ekutholweni kwengane, kumelwe zinconywe, ngoba zabonisa ukubaluleka koMsebenzi Wokuqapha Womphakathi.

Ukubaluleka kokuqaliswa Kokwahlukaniswa Komsebenzi Wamaphoyisa Ngokwezigceme nokugcinwa kwawo kanjalo nokuqhutshwa kwawo ngokufanele, akumele kudelelwe.
Ukubaluleka koMsebenzi Wokuqapha Endaweni owenziwa futhi ulondolozwe kahle, akumelwe kuthathwe kancane.
Ukubaluleka kohlelo Lokubambisana  Komphakathi Namaphoyisa akumele lubhekelwe phansi, uma lusetshenziswa futhi lugcinwa ngendlela efanele.
Inani lokuphoyisa ngezigaba okwenziwa futhi kugcinwe ngendlela, akufanele kubukelwe phansi.

Sawubona Nkosazane
Ngicabanga ukuthi kwaba yinhlanhla noma mhlawumbe iwela ukuthi ngidlule esiteshini senu samaphoyisa eMondoer, ngase ngihlangana neJenali ye-SAPS yenu.
Ngithatha ngokuthi bekuyinhlanhla noma mhlawumbe ibika lokuhle ukuthi kudingeke ngidlule esiteshini senu samaphoyisa eMondeor, ngibone iNcwajana yenu yamaPhoyisa.
Ngicabanga ukuthi kube yinhlanhla kimi ukuthi ngidlule esiteshini senu samaphoyisa esise-Mondeor, ngakho ngibe senginqwamana neJenali yenu Yezamaphoyisa.
Ngingasho ukuthi kwaba yinhlanhla noma ithamsanqa ukuthi ngidlule ngasesiteshini senu samaphoyisa e-Mondeor, ngabe sengizithela ephephabhukwini lenu i-SAPS Jenali. 
Ngithatha ngokuthi bekuyinhlanhla noma mhlawumbe ibika lokuhle ukuthi kudingeke ngidlule esiteshini senu samaphoyisa eMondeor, ngibone iNcwajana yenu yamaPhoyisa.
Ngicabanga ukuthi kube yinhlanhla kimi ukuthi ngidlule esiteshini senu samaphoyisa esise-Mondeor, ngakho ngibe senginqwamana neJenali yenu Yezamaphoyisa.

Ngicabanga ukuthi ishicilelwa kube kanye ngenyanga, futhi ngithole udaba olubaluleke kakhulu kuyo.
Ngithatha ngokuthi ishicilelwa kanye ngenyanga, futhi ngikuthole kujabulisa kakhulu ukuyifunda.
Ngicabanga ukuthi ishicilelwa kanye ngenyanga, kanti kube mnandi kakhulu ukuyifunda.
Ngiyacabanga likhishwa kanye ngenyanga, kanti ngalithola lingihlaba umxhwele ngempela ngilifunda.
Ngithatha ngokuthi ishicilelwa kanye ngenyanga, futhi ngikuthole kujabulisa kakhulu ukuyifunda.
Ngicabanga ukuthi ishicilelwa kanye ngenyanga, kanti kube mnandi kakhulu ukuyifunda.

Mina nomkami sisanda kuqala ibhizinisi elisha futhi singathanda ukunimema nonke, noma kube wumsebenzi oyedwa walapho uma lisendaweni yethu, nizophuza inkomishi yekhofi noma yetiye yamahhala futhi sethemba ukuthi sinalo ibhisikidi elilodwa noma amaningana esinganipha wona.
Mina nomkami sisanda kuqala ibhizinisi Elisha futhi singathanda ukumema zonke izisebenzi zakho, noma nanoma ubani kuzo lapho zisendaweni yakithi, ukuba zingene zizophuza inkomishi yekhofi noma itiye lamahhala futhi mhlawumbe singazinika namakhekhe ambalwa
Mina nonkosikazi wami sisanda kuqala ibhizinisi yethu entsha futhi besingathanda ukunimema nonke, noma abanye babasebenzi benu uma besendaweni yethu, ukuba bangene bazophuza inkomishi yekhofi noma yetiye mahhala kanti futhi ngethemba ukuthi sizokwazi ukubapha ibhesikidi elilodwa noma amabili.
Mina nonkosikazi siqale ibhizinisi Elisha, kanti sifisa ukumema bonke, noma ibaphi abasebenzi bakho uma besendaweni yangakithi, ukuba balunguze bazothola inkomishi yetiye noma ikhofi mahhala, mhlasimbe singabapha nokwekhekhana nje uma kwenzeka.
Mina nomkami sisanda kuqala ibhizinisi Elisha futhi singathanda ukumema zonke izisebenzi zakho, noma nanoma ubani kuzo lapho zisendaweni yakithi, ukuba zingene zizophuza inkomishi yekhofi noma itiye lamahhala futhi mhlawumbe singazinika namakhekhe ambalwa
Mina nonkosikazi wami sisanda kuqala ibhizinisi yethu entsha futhi besingathanda ukunimema nonke, noma abanye babasebenzi benu uma besendaweni yethu, ukuba bangene bazophuza inkomishi yekhofi noma yetiye mahhala kanti futhi ngethemba ukuthi sizokwazi ukubapha ibhesikidi elilodwa noma amabili.

Mina nomkami sisanda kuqala ibhizinisi elisha futhi singathanda ukunimema nonke, noma kube wumsebenzi oyedwa walapho uma lisendaweni yethu, nizophuza inkomishi yekhofi noma yetiye yamahhala futhi sethemba ukuthi sinalo ibhisikidi elilodwa noma amaningana esinganipha wona.

Mina nomkami sisanda kuqala ibhizinisi Elisha futhi singathanda ukumema zonke izisebenzi zakho, noma nanoma ubani kuzo lapho zisendaweni yakithi, ukuba zingene zizophuza inkomishi yekhofi noma itiye lamahhala futhi mhlawumbe singazinika namakhekhe ambalwa

Mina nomkami sisanda kuqala ibhizinisi elisha futhi singathanda ukunimema nonke, noma kube wumsebenzi oyedwa walapho uma lisendaweni yethu, nizophuza inkomishi yekhofi noma yetiye yamahhala futhi sethemba ukuthi sinalo ibhisikidi elilodwa noma amaningana esinganipha wona.
Mina nomkami sisanda kuqala ibhizinisi Elisha futhi singathanda ukumema zonke izisebenzi zakho, noma nanoma ubani kuzo lapho zisendaweni yakithi, ukuba zingene zizophuza inkomishi yekhofi noma itiye lamahhala futhi mhlawumbe singazinika namakhekhe ambalwa
Mina nonkosikazi wami sisanda kuqala ibhizinisi yethu entsha futhi besingathanda ukunimema nonke, noma abanye babasebenzi benu uma besendaweni yethu, ukuba bangene bazophuza inkomishi yekhofi noma yetiye mahhala kanti futhi ngethemba ukuthi sizokwazi ukubapha ibhesikidi elilodwa noma amabili.
Njengoba nginesiqiniseko sokuthi uzoqonda ukuthi ukuqala ibhizinisi elisha akulula futhi kubiza umsebenzi omningi kanye nemali eyingqalamsebenzi.
Ngiyaqiniseka ukuthi uzokuqonda lokhu, ukuqala ibhizinisi elisha akulula futhi kudinga umsebenzi omningi nemali yokuqalisa.
Njengoba ngiqinisekisile ukuthi uzoqonda ukuthi ukuqala ibhizinisi elisha akulula futhi kungumsebenzi omningi futhi kuthatha nemali eningi. 
Ngineqiniso uzokuqonda ukuthi, ukuqala ibhizinisi akulula futhi kudinga kusetshenzwe kakhulu, kudinga nemali.
Ngiyaqiniseka ukuthi uzokuqonda lokhu, ukuqala ibhizinisi elisha akulula futhi kudinga umsebenzi omningi nemali yokuqalisa.
Njengoba ngiqinisekisile ukuthi uzoqonda ukuthi ukuqala ibhizinisi elisha akulula futhi kungumsebenzi omningi futhi kuthatha nemali eningi. 
Ngineqiniso uzokuqonda ukuthi, ukuqala ibhizinisi akulula futhi kudinga kusetshenzwe kakhulu, kudinga nemali.
Njengoba nginesiqiniseko sokuthi uzoqonda ukuthi ukuqala ibhizinisi elisha akulula futhi kubiza umsebenzi omningi kanye nemali eyingqalamsebenzi.
Njengoba ngiqinisekisile ukuthi uzoqonda ukuthi ukuqala ibhizinisi elisha akulula futhi kungumsebenzi omningi futhi kuthatha nemali eningi. 
Ngineqiniso uzokuqonda ukuthi, ukuqala ibhizinisi akulula futhi kudinga kusetshenzwe kakhulu, kudinga nemali.

Ngineqiniso uzokuqonda ukuthi, ukuqala ibhizinisi akulula futhi kudinga kusetshenzwe kakhulu, kudinga nemali.

Ngiyaqiniseka ukuthi uzokuqonda lokhu, ukuqala ibhizinisi elisha akulula futhi kudinga umsebenzi omningi nemali yokuqalisa.

Nokho, sisakholwa ukuthi amaphoyisa kanye nayo yonke iminyango yabaqinisi  bomthetho ibaluleke kakhulu kuzo zonke izakhamizi zaseNingizimu Afrika.
Nokho, sisakholelwa ukuthi amaphoyisa kanye nayo yonke eminye iminyango yokuphoqelelwa komthetho kubaluleke kakhulu kuzo zonke izakhamuzi zaseNingizimu Afrika.
Noma kunjalo, sisakholelwa ekutheni amaphoyisa kanye nayo yonke eminye iminyango yezokugcinwa komthetho ibalulekile kuzo zonke izakhamizi zaseNingizimu Afrika.
Noma kunjalo, sisakholwa ukuthi amaphoyisa neminye iminyango yokugcinwa komthetho ibalulekile kubona bonke abahlali baseNingizimu Afrika.
Nokho, sisakholelwa ukuthi amaphoyisa kanye nayo yonke eminye iminyango yokuphoqelelwa komthetho kubaluleke kakhulu kuzo zonke izakhamuzi zaseNingizimu Afrika.

Noma kunjalo, sisakholelwa ekutheni amaphoyisa kanye nayo yonke eminye iminyango yezokugcinwa komthetho ibalulekile kuzo zonke izakhamizi zaseNingizimu Afrika.
Lokhu kuyinto encane esithanda ukunipha yona sibonge ngokuzinikela kwenu ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi thina, izakhamizi, singaqhubeka nempilo yethu.
Lokhu kumane nje kuyinto encane esingathanda ukunenzela yona ukunibonga ngenxa yalokho eniye nakudela ukuze niqinisekise ukuthi thina, zakhamuzi, singaqhubekela phambili nokuphila kwethu kwansuku zonke.
Lokhu kuyinto encane esithanda ukunenzela yona ukukhombisa ukubonga ngokuzinikela kwenu ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi thina, izakhamuzi, sikwazi ukuqhubeka ngempilo yethu yansuku zonke.
Sininika lokhu okuncane esikhombisa ukubonga kwethu ngako kunina ngokuzinikela kwenu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi thina, zakhamizi, siqhubeka nezimpilo zethu zansuku zonke.
Lokhu kumane nje kuyinto encane esingathanda ukunenzela yona ukunibonga ngenxa yalokho eniye nakudela ukuze niqinisekise ukuthi thina, zakhamuzi, singaqhubekela phambili nokuphila kwethu kwansuku zonke.
Lokhu kuyinto encane esithanda ukunenzela yona ukukhombisa ukubonga ngokuzinikela kwenu ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi thina, izakhamuzi, sikwazi ukuqhubeka ngempilo yethu yansuku zonke.

Sikulangazelele kakhulu ukuthola impendulo, noma okungasijabulisa kakhulu, ukubona umsebenzi wenu siqu egqoke umfaniswano womsebenzi, efika esitodlwaneni sethu ukuze simazi kangcono.
Silangazelela ukuzwa kini, noma okungcono nakakhulu, ukubona abanye bezisebenzi zenu befake umfaniswano, bengena esitolo sethu esincane futhi sibazi kangcono.
Simagange ekutholeni impendulo yenu, noma okuzoba ngcono, ukubona abanye babasebenzi benu abazobe begqoke iyunifomu, bengena esitolo sethu esincane nokuthi sazane.
Siyathemba sizobabona abanye benu maduze nje bombutho wenyufomu bezosivakashela esitolo sethu esincinyane ukuze sibazi kangcono.
Silangazelela ukuzwa kini, noma okungcono nakakhulu, ukubona abanye bezisebenzi zenu befake umfaniswano, bengena esitolo sethu esincane futhi sibazi kangcono.
Simagange ekutholeni impendulo yenu, noma okuzoba ngcono, ukubona abanye babasebenzi benu abazobe begqoke iyunifomu, bengena esitolo sethu esincane nokuthi sazane.

Silangazelela ukuzwa kini, noma okungcono nakakhulu, ukubona abanye bezisebenzi zenu befake umfaniswano, bengena esitolo sethu esincane futhi sibazi kangcono.
Simagange ekutholeni impendulo yenu, noma okuzoba ngcono, ukubona abanye babasebenzi benu abazobe begqoke iyunifomu, bengena esitolo sethu esincane nokuthi sazane.
Siyaphinda sibonga kakhulu, kumaphoyisa aseNingizimu Afrika, ngokusebenza kanzima kwenu kanye nokuzinikela ekugcineni iNingizimu Afrika iphephile.
Siyaphinda siyanibonga, nina basebenzi bezokuqiniswa komthetho baseNingizimu Afrika, ngawo wonke umsebenzi wenu onzima nokuzinikela ekugcineni iNingizimu Afrika iphephile.
Sidlulisa okunye ukubonga kini nina basebenzi bezokugcinwa komthetho eNingizimu Afrika ngokusebenza ngokuzinikela nangokuzidela ngenhloso yokugcina iNingizimu Afrika iphephile. 
Siphinde sibonge kini, basebenzi bokugcinwa komthetho eNingizimu Afrika, ngokusebenza kwenu ngokuzikhandla ekugcineni iNingizimu Afrika iphephile.
Siyaphinda siyanibonga, nina basebenzi bezokuqiniswa komthetho baseNingizimu Afrika, ngawo wonke umsebenzi wenu onzima nokuzinikela ekugcineni iNingizimu Afrika iphephile.
Sidlulisa okunye ukubonga kini nina basebenzi bezokugcinwa komthetho eNingizimu Afrika ngokusebenza ngokuzinikela nangokuzidela ngenhloso yokugcina iNingizimu Afrika iphephile. 
Siphinde sibonge kini, basebenzi bokugcinwa komthetho eNingizimu Afrika, ngokusebenza kwenu ngokuzikhandla ekugcineni iNingizimu Afrika iphephile.
Siyaphinda sibonga kakhulu, kumaphoyisa aseNingizimu Afrika, ngokusebenza kanzima kwenu kanye nokuzinikela ekugcineni iNingizimu Afrika iphephile.

Izincwadi ezimfishane, ezibhalwe okuyiqiniso zingathunyelwa ngefeksi noma nge-imeyli kuMhleli.
Izincwadi ezimfushane, eziveza amaphuzu zingathunyelwa ngefeksi noma nge-imeyili kuMhleli.
Izincwadi ezimfushane ezibeka ngamaphuzu zingathunyelwa kuMhleli ngefeksi noma nge-imeyili. 
Izincwadi ezimfisha, eziyiqiniso zingafekselwa kumbe zithunyelwe nge-imeyili kuMhleli.
Izincwadi ezimfushane, eziveza amaphuzu zingathunyelwa ngefeksi noma nge-imeyili kuMhleli.
Izincwadi ezimfushane ezibeka ngamaphuzu zingathunyelwa kuMhleli ngefeksi noma nge-imeyili.

Izincwadi ezimfushane ezibeka ngamaphuzu zingathunyelwa kuMhleli ngefeksi noma nge-imeyili.

Izincwadi ezimfushane, eziveza amaphuzu zingathunyelwa ngefeksi noma nge-imeyili kuMhleli.
Izincwadi ezimfisha, eziyiqiniso zingafekselwa kumbe zithunyelwe nge-imeyili kuMhleli.
Izincwadi ezimfishane, ezibhalwe okuyiqiniso zingathunyelwa ngefeksi noma nge-imeyli kuMhleli.
Izincwadi ezimfushane, eziveza amaphuzu zingathunyelwa ngefeksi noma nge-imeyili kuMhleli.
Izincwadi ezimfushane ezibeka ngamaphuzu zingathunyelwa kuMhleli ngefeksi noma nge-imeyili. 
Sinelungelo lokuzihlela noma ukuzinciphisa izincwadi.
Sigodla ilungelo lokuhlela noma ukufushanisa izincwadi.
Amalungelo okuhlelemba noma okufinyeza izincwadi agodliwe.
Kuzohlala kuyilungelo lethu ukuba izincwadi size-edithe kumbe sizifushanise.

AYIHLOME IHLASELE
ISIMEMO SOKUTHATHA ISINYATHELO
UBIZO LOKUTHATHA ISINYATHELO
UMYALELO WOKUTHATHWA KWESINYATHELO
Mhla ziyi-14 kuNhlangulana 2007, enye yezindaba ezikuJenali ye-SAPS eku-inthanethi (www.sapsjournal-online.gov.za) yachaza ukuthi amaphoyisa amabili aseGatsheni Lokuhlonzwa Kwezithuthi eWelkom aboshelwa kanjani ukukhohlakala nokukhwabanisa.
Ngomhla ziyi-14 kuNhlangulana 2007, esinye sezihloko kuyo i-SAPS Journal Online (www.sapsjournalon-line.gov.za) sachaza indlela amaphoyisa amabili oPhiko Lokuhlonzwa Kwezimoto eWelkom aboshelwa ngayo inkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa.
Ngomhla we-14 Nhlangulana 2007, enye yama-athikhili kwiJenali Yamaphoyisa kwi-inthanethi (www.sapsjournalon-line.gov.za) ichaza indlela amaphoyisa amabili ase-Welkom Esigabeni Sokuhlonzwa Kwezimoto aboshwa ngayo mayelana nenkohlakalo nokukhwabaniswa.
Mhla zili-14 Juni 2007, enye yezindaba ezaphuma ephephabhukwini i-SAPS Jenali Onlayini (www.sapsjournalon-line.gov.za) yachaza ukuthi amaphoyisa amabili ayiziphathimandla aseSikhungweni Sokuhlonzwa Kwezimoto sase-Welkom aboshwa kanjani maqondna nenkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa.
Ngomhla ziyi-14 kuNhlangulana 2007, esinye sezihloko kuyo i-SAPS Journal Online (www.sapsjournalon-line.gov.za) sachaza indlela amaphoyisa amabili oPhiko Lokuhlonzwa Kwezimoto eWelkom aboshelwa ngayo inkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa.
Ngomhla we-14 Nhlangulana 2007, enye yama-athikhili kwiJenali Yamaphoyisa kwi-inthanethi (www.sapsjournalon-line.gov.za) ichaza indlela amaphoyisa amabili ase-Welkom Esigabeni Sokuhlonzwa Kwezimoto aboshwa ngayo mayelana nenkohlakalo nokukhwabaniswa.

Mhla ziyi-14 kuNhlangulana 2007, enye yezindaba ezikuJenali ye-SAPS eku-inthanethi (www.sapsjournal-online.gov.za) yachaza ukuthi amaphoyisa amabili aseGatsheni Lokuhlonzwa Kwezithuthi eWelkom aboshelwa kanjani ukukhohlakala nokukhwabanisa.
Ngomhla we-14 Nhlangulana 2007, enye yama-athikhili kwiJenali Yamaphoyisa kwi-inthanethi (www.sapsjournalon-line.gov.za) ichaza indlela amaphoyisa amabili ase-Welkom Esigabeni Sokuhlonzwa Kwezimoto aboshwa ngayo mayelana nenkohlakalo nokukhwabaniswa.
Mhla zili-14 Juni 2007, enye yezindaba ezaphuma ephephabhukwini i-SAPS Jenali Onlayini (www.sapsjournalon-line.gov.za) yachaza ukuthi amaphoyisa amabili ayiziphathimandla aseSikhungweni Sokuhlonzwa Kwezimoto sase-Welkom aboshwa kanjani maqondna nenkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa.
Mhla ziyi-14 kuNhlangulana 2007, enye yezindaba ezikuJenali ye-SAPS eku-inthanethi (www.sapsjournal-online.gov.za) yachaza ukuthi amaphoyisa amabili aseGatsheni Lokuhlonzwa Kwezithuthi eWelkom aboshelwa kanjani ukukhohlakala nokukhwabanisa.
Ngomhla ziyi-14 kuNhlangulana 2007, esinye sezihloko kuyo i-SAPS Journal Online (www.sapsjournalon-line.gov.za) sachaza indlela amaphoyisa amabili oPhiko Lokuhlonzwa Kwezimoto eWelkom aboshelwa ngayo inkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa.

Ngomhla we-14 Nhlangulana 2007, enye yama-athikhili kwiJenali Yamaphoyisa kwi-inthanethi (www.sapsjournalon-line.gov.za) ichaza indlela amaphoyisa amabili ase-Welkom Esigabeni Sokuhlonzwa Kwezimoto aboshwa ngayo mayelana nenkohlakalo nokukhwabaniswa.
Ngokwemibiko laba ababili, unsumpa no-inspektha, babedayisa izimoto ezazitholwe amaphoyisa, ukuze bahlomule.
Kubikwa ukuthi laba ababili, umphathi nomhloli, babethengisa izimoto eziye zatholwa ngamaphoyisa, ukuze bazenzele inzuzo.
Kubikwa ukuthi laba bobabili, okungunsumpa ne-inspektha bathengisa izimoto ezatholwa ngamaphoyisa ukuze kusizakale bona.
Kubikwa ngokuthi laba ababili, okuwunsumpa nomhloli, badayisa izimoto ezazitholwe amaphoyisa, bazakhela inzuzo ngalokho.

Bobabili abasolwa bavela enkantolo mhlaka 12 kuNhlangulana bese icala lahlehliselwa umhlaka 21 kuNcwaba 2007.
Bobabili abasolwa bavela enkantolo ngomhla ka-12 kuNhlangulana futhi icala lahlehliselwa umhla ka-21 kuNcwaba 2007.
Bobabili laba basolwa bavela enkantolo ngomhla ziyi-12 ku-Nhlangulana kodwa icala labo lahleliselwa umhla wama-21 Ncwaba 2007.

Kusadlule usuku, mhla ziyi-15 kuNhlangulana 2007, kwaba nesihloko ku-News24 esasithi: “Amaphoyisa amabili kwelokuphanga kuhlonyiwe”.
Osukwini kamuva, ngomhla ka-15 kuNhlangulana 2007, isihloko esasikuNews24 sathi: “Kubanjwe amaphoyisa amabili ngokwenza ubugebengu kuhlonyiwe”.
Kuthe ngosuku olulandelayo ngomhla ziyi-15 kuNhlangulana 2007, isihloko se-News24 savela kanje: "Amaphoyisa amabili aboshelwe ukuhlasela kuhlonyiwe".  
Kwadlula usuku nje, ngomhla we-15 Juni 2007, kwavela isihloko sezindaba ku-News24 sithi: "Amaphoyisa amabili aboshelwe ukuphanga ehlomile". 
Osukwini kamuva, ngomhla ka-15 kuNhlangulana 2007, isihloko esasikuNews24 sathi: “Kubanjwe amaphoyisa amabili ngokwenza ubugebengu kuhlonyiwe”.
Kuthe ngosuku olulandelayo ngomhla ziyi-15 kuNhlangulana 2007, isihloko se-News24 savela kanje: "Amaphoyisa amabili aboshelwe ukuhlasela kuhlonyiwe".

Kulokhu kwakuyiphoyisa eliwumfundi no-inspektha okwakubikwe ukuthi baphange isitolo sezingubo zokugqoka eMarble Hall, beba imali, ibhulukwe kanye nehembe.
Kulokhu kwakuyiphoyisa elisaqeqeshwa kanye nomseshi okubikwa ukuthi ubakhombe ngesibhamu esitolo sezimpahla, eMarble Hall, wantshontsha imali, amabhulukwe neyembe.
Kulokhu kwakuqondiswe ephoyiseni elalisafunda kanye no-inspector okubikwa ukuthi babamba inkunzi isitolo sezingubo zokugqoka eMarble Hall, bantshontsha imali, amabhulukwe neyembe.
Kulokhu kwabe kuwu-khonstabuli ongumfundi nomhloli okuthiwa babamba inkunzi isitolo sezimpahla esise-Marble Hall, beba imali, amabhulukwe neyembe.

Inkohlakalo emaphoyiseni kumele iphele nya.
Kumelwe iphele inkohlakalo emaphoyiseni.
Inkohlakalo emaphoyiseni kumele iphele nya.
Kufanele iphele nya inkohlakalo esiphoyiseni. 
Kumelwe iphele inkohlakalo emaphoyiseni.
Inkohlakalo emaphoyiseni kumele iphele nya.
Kufanele iphele nya inkohlakalo esiphoyiseni. 
Inkohlakalo emaphoyiseni kumele iphele nya.
Inkohlakalo emaphoyiseni kumele iphele nya.
Kufanele iphele nya inkohlakalo esiphoyiseni. 
Inkohlakalo emaphoyiseni kumele iphele nya.
Kumelwe iphele inkohlakalo emaphoyiseni.
Kufanele iphele nya inkohlakalo esiphoyiseni. 
Inkohlakalo emaphoyiseni kumele iphele nya.
Kumelwe iphele inkohlakalo emaphoyiseni.
Inkohlakalo emaphoyiseni kumele iphele nya.
Njengoba iningi lethu liyizakhamizi ezethembekile, ezisebenza ngokuzikhandla, kunamaphoyisa ambalwa abonakalisa ukungahloniphi ububona, umfaniswano wabo noma Umgomo Wokuziphatha Wamaphoyisa.
Nakuba iningi lethu liyizakhamuzi ezithembekile, ezisebenza kanzima, abambalwa ezikhulwini zamaphoyisa abazihloniphi bona, nomfaniswano wabo noma uMthetho Wokuziphatha Wamaphoyisa.
Ngesikhathi iningi lethu siyizakhamuzi ezethembekile, ezisebenza ngokuzikhandla, idlanzana lamaphoyisa likhombisa ukungazihloniphi, ukungahloniphi iyunifomu yabo noma Umgomo Wokuziphatha Kwamaphoyisa.
Yize iningi lethu lithembekile, lisebenza ngokuzikhandla, kukhona leyo mithonseyana yeziphathimandla ezingakhombisi kuzihlonipha nje, ezingahloniphi kwanyufomu yazo, ngisho uMgomo Wamaphoyisa Wokuziphatha qobo. 
Nakuba iningi lethu liyizakhamuzi ezithembekile, ezisebenza kanzima, abambalwa ezikhulwini zamaphoyisa abazihloniphi bona, nomfaniswano wabo noma uMthetho Wokuziphatha Wamaphoyisa.
Ngesikhathi iningi lethu siyizakhamuzi ezethembekile, ezisebenza ngokuzikhandla, idlanzana lamaphoyisa likhombisa ukungazihloniphi, ukungahloniphi iyunifomu yabo noma Umgomo Wokuziphatha Kwamaphoyisa.
Yize iningi lethu lithembekile, lisebenza ngokuzikhandla, kukhona leyo mithonseyana yeziphathimandla ezingakhombisi kuzihlonipha nje, ezingahloniphi kwanyufomu yazo, ngisho uMgomo Wamaphoyisa Wokuziphatha qobo. 
Njengoba iningi lethu liyizakhamizi ezethembekile, ezisebenza ngokuzikhandla, kunamaphoyisa ambalwa abonakalisa ukungahloniphi ububona, umfaniswano wabo noma Umgomo Wokuziphatha Wamaphoyisa.
Ngesikhathi iningi lethu siyizakhamuzi ezethembekile, ezisebenza ngokuzikhandla, idlanzana lamaphoyisa likhombisa ukungazihloniphi, ukungahloniphi iyunifomu yabo noma Umgomo Wokuziphatha Kwamaphoyisa.

Njengoba iningi lethu liyizakhamizi ezethembekile, ezisebenza ngokuzikhandla, kunamaphoyisa ambalwa abonakalisa ukungahloniphi ububona, umfaniswano wabo noma Umgomo Wokuziphatha Wamaphoyisa.

Njengoba iningi lethu liyizakhamizi ezethembekile, ezisebenza ngokuzikhandla, kunamaphoyisa ambalwa abonakalisa ukungahloniphi ububona, umfaniswano wabo noma Umgomo Wokuziphatha Wamaphoyisa.
Nakuba iningi lethu liyizakhamuzi ezithembekile, ezisebenza kanzima, abambalwa ezikhulwini zamaphoyisa abazihloniphi bona, nomfaniswano wabo noma uMthetho Wokuziphatha Wamaphoyisa.
Ngesikhathi iningi lethu siyizakhamuzi ezethembekile, ezisebenza ngokuzikhandla, idlanzana lamaphoyisa likhombisa ukungazihloniphi, ukungahloniphi iyunifomu yabo noma Umgomo Wokuziphatha Kwamaphoyisa.
Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sibuqede nya lobu bubi ku-SAPS.
Sekuyisikhathi sokuba sikhiphe ku-SAPS okokugcina bonke laba abenza imisebenzi emibi.
Sekufike leso sikhathi lapho kumele siqede nya  bonke laba bantu abayizihlava Kwezamaphoyisa. 
Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sisikhiphe kube kanye lesi sihlava kwa-SAPS. 
Sekuyisikhathi sokuba sikhiphe ku-SAPS okokugcina bonke laba abenza imisebenzi emibi.

Sekufike leso sikhathi lapho kumele siqede nya  bonke laba bantu abayizihlava Kwezamaphoyisa. 
Futhi manje sewungasiza ukuze kuqedwe amaphoyisa akhohlakele ngokuwadalula kunombolo yocingo entsha yokubika ubugebengu.
Futhi manje usungasiza ekubeni kulahlwe amaphoyisa anenkohlakalo ngokuwadalula ocingweni olusha lobugebengu.
Manje usuyakwazi ukusiza ekuchithweni kwamaphoyisa akhohlakele ngokuwadalula ocingweni olusha lokubika ngobugebengu.  
Manje usuyakwazi ukuwembula amaphoyisa akhohlakele ngokusishayela ocingweni olusha lokubika ngobugebengu. 
Futhi manje usungasiza ekubeni kulahlwe amaphoyisa anenkohlakalo ngokuwadalula ocingweni olusha lobugebengu.
Manje usuyakwazi ukusiza ekuchithweni kwamaphoyisa akhohlakele ngokuwadalula ocingweni olusha lokubika ngobugebengu.  
Manje usuyakwazi ukuwembula amaphoyisa akhohlakele ngokusishayela ocingweni olusha lokubika ngobugebengu. 
Futhi manje sewungasiza ukuze kuqedwe amaphoyisa akhohlakele ngokuwadalula kunombolo yocingo entsha yokubika ubugebengu.
Manje usuyakwazi ukusiza ekuchithweni kwamaphoyisa akhohlakele ngokuwadalula ocingweni olusha lokubika ngobugebengu.  
Manje usuyakwazi ukuwembula amaphoyisa akhohlakele ngokusishayela ocingweni olusha lokubika ngobugebengu. 
Futhi manje sewungasiza ukuze kuqedwe amaphoyisa akhohlakele ngokuwadalula kunombolo yocingo entsha yokubika ubugebengu.
Futhi manje usungasiza ekubeni kulahlwe amaphoyisa anenkohlakalo ngokuwadalula ocingweni olusha lobugebengu.
Manje usuyakwazi ukuwembula amaphoyisa akhohlakele ngokusishayela ocingweni olusha lokubika ngobugebengu. 
Futhi manje sewungasiza ukuze kuqedwe amaphoyisa akhohlakele ngokuwadalula kunombolo yocingo entsha yokubika ubugebengu.
Futhi manje usungasiza ekubeni kulahlwe amaphoyisa anenkohlakalo ngokuwadalula ocingweni olusha lobugebengu.
Manje usuyakwazi ukusiza ekuchithweni kwamaphoyisa akhohlakele ngokuwadalula ocingweni olusha lokubika ngobugebengu.

Igama lakho lingadalulwa!
Ukungaziwa!
Ungalidalulana igama lakho!
Igama lakho lingadalulwa!
Ukungaziwa!
Ungalidalulana igama lakho!
Ngaphandle kokuzidalula!
Ukungaziwa!
Ungalidalulana igama lakho!
Ngaphandle kokuzidalula!
Igama lakho lingadalulwa!
Ungalidalulana igama lakho!
Ngaphandle kokuzidalula!
Igama lakho lingadalulwa!
Ukungaziwa!
Uma usola ukuthi omunye wozakwenu wenza okungasile, noma uma kukhona omunye omaziyo, noma ngabe amaphoyisa, amalungu omndeni, ozakwenu, omakhelwane noma abantu abangaziwa, ababandakanyeka noma abahlela ukuzibandakanya ezenzweni zobugebengu, okumele ukwenze nje, ukuthumela i-SMS ku 32211.
Uma usola ukuthi omunye wozakwenu kukhona ubugebengu abenzayo, noma uma wazi omunye othile, kungaba yizikhulu zamaphoyisa, amalungu omndeni, ozakwenu, omakhelwane noma abantu abangaziwa, ababandakanyekayo noma abahlela ukubandakanyeka ezenzweni zobugebengu, okudingeka ukwenze nje, ukuthumela i-SMS ku-32211.
Uma usola ukuthi omunye wozakwenu kukhona okusolisayo ngaye, noma uma kukhona omaziyo, okungaba ngamaphoyisa, amalungu omndeni, ozakwenu, omakhelwane noma abantu ongabazi, ababandakanyeka noma abahlela ukubandakanyeka ezenzweni zobugebengu, konke okumele ukwenze, ukuthumela i-SMS ku: 32211.
Uma usola ukuthi omunye wabozakwenu uphezu komqondo ongalungile, noma uma kukhona omunye omaziyo, noma eyisiphathimandla sasemaphoyiseni, owomndeni, enisebenza naye, omakhelwane noma ongabazi, abambandakanyekayo ezenzweni zobunswelaboya, okudinga ukwenze nje ukuthumela i-SMS ku- 32211. 
Uma usola ukuthi omunye wozakwenu kukhona ubugebengu abenzayo, noma uma wazi omunye othile, kungaba yizikhulu zamaphoyisa, amalungu omndeni, ozakwenu, omakhelwane noma abantu abangaziwa, ababandakanyekayo noma abahlela ukubandakanyeka ezenzweni zobugebengu, okudingeka ukwenze nje, ukuthumela i-SMS ku-32211.
Uma usola ukuthi omunye wozakwenu kukhona okusolisayo ngaye, noma uma kukhona omaziyo, okungaba ngamaphoyisa, amalungu omndeni, ozakwenu, omakhelwane noma abantu ongabazi, ababandakanyeka noma abahlela ukubandakanyeka ezenzweni zobugebengu, konke okumele ukwenze, ukuthumela i-SMS ku: 32211.
Uma usola ukuthi omunye wabozakwenu uphezu komqondo ongalungile, noma uma kukhona omunye omaziyo, noma eyisiphathimandla sasemaphoyiseni, owomndeni, enisebenza naye, omakhelwane noma ongabazi, abambandakanyekayo ezenzweni zobunswelaboya, okudinga ukwenze nje ukuthumela i-SMS ku- 32211.

Uma usola ukuthi omunye wozakwenu kukhona ubugebengu abenzayo, noma uma wazi omunye othile, kungaba yizikhulu zamaphoyisa, amalungu omndeni, ozakwenu, omakhelwane noma abantu abangaziwa, ababandakanyekayo noma abahlela ukubandakanyeka ezenzweni zobugebengu, okudingeka ukwenze nje, ukuthumela i-SMS ku-32211.

Uma usola ukuthi omunye wozakwenu kukhona okusolisayo ngaye, noma uma kukhona omaziyo, okungaba ngamaphoyisa, amalungu omndeni, ozakwenu, omakhelwane noma abantu ongabazi, ababandakanyeka noma abahlela ukubandakanyeka ezenzweni zobugebengu, konke okumele ukwenze, ukuthumela i-SMS ku: 32211.
Leyo yinombolo entsha yokubika ngobugebengu kuzwelonke esanda kwethulwa i-Primedia eSandton.
Lena yinombolo entsha kazwelonke yobugebengu eyethulwe muva nje yiPrimedia eSandton. 
Leyo yinombolo entsha yokubika ubugebengu kuzwelonke esanda kwethulwa ngabePrimedia eSandton.
Lena inombolo entsha kazwelonke yezimo zobugebengu esanda kwethulwa abakwa-Primedia e-Sandton. 
Lena yinombolo entsha kazwelonke yobugebengu eyethulwe muva nje yiPrimedia eSandton. 
Leyo yinombolo entsha yokubika ubugebengu kuzwelonke esanda kwethulwa ngabePrimedia eSandton.
Lena inombolo entsha kazwelonke yezimo zobugebengu esanda kwethulwa abakwa-Primedia e-Sandton. 
Leyo yinombolo entsha yokubika ngobugebengu kuzwelonke esanda kwethulwa i-Primedia eSandton.
Leyo yinombolo entsha yokubika ubugebengu kuzwelonke esanda kwethulwa ngabePrimedia eSandton.
Lena inombolo entsha kazwelonke yezimo zobugebengu esanda kwethulwa abakwa-Primedia e-Sandton. 
Leyo yinombolo entsha yokubika ngobugebengu kuzwelonke esanda kwethulwa i-Primedia eSandton.
Lena yinombolo entsha kazwelonke yobugebengu eyethulwe muva nje yiPrimedia eSandton. 
Lena inombolo entsha kazwelonke yezimo zobugebengu esanda kwethulwa abakwa-Primedia e-Sandton. 
Leyo yinombolo entsha yokubika ngobugebengu kuzwelonke esanda kwethulwa i-Primedia eSandton.
Lena yinombolo entsha kazwelonke yobugebengu eyethulwe muva nje yiPrimedia eSandton. 
Leyo yinombolo entsha yokubika ubugebengu kuzwelonke esanda kwethulwa ngabePrimedia eSandton.
Ungathumela i-SMS ku 32211 (ukhokhiswe u-R1 nge-sms ngayinye) noma uye ku www.crime-line.co.za. 
Ungathumela i-SMS ku-32211 (izindleko ngu-R1 ngayinye) noma ungene ku-www.crime-line.co.za. 
Ungathumela i-SMS ku-32211 (ngenani le-R1 ngayinye) noma uye kwi-www.crime-line.co.za.
Ungathumela i-SMS ku-32211 (ebiza R1 iyodwa) noma uye ku-www.crime-line.co.za. 
Ungathumela i-SMS ku-32211 (izindleko ngu-R1 ngayinye) noma ungene ku-www.crime-line.co.za. 
Ungathumela i-SMS ku-32211 (ngenani le-R1 ngayinye) noma uye kwi-www.crime-line.co.za.
Ungathumela i-SMS ku-32211 (ebiza R1 iyodwa) noma uye ku-www.crime-line.co.za. 
Ungathumela i-SMS ku 32211 (ukhokhiswe u-R1 nge-sms ngayinye) noma uye ku www.crime-line.co.za. 
Ungathumela i-SMS ku-32211 (ngenani le-R1 ngayinye) noma uye kwi-www.crime-line.co.za.
Ungathumela i-SMS ku-32211 (ebiza R1 iyodwa) noma uye ku-www.crime-line.co.za.

Ungathumela i-SMS ku-32211 (ebiza R1 iyodwa) noma uye ku-www.crime-line.co.za.

Ungathumela i-SMS ku-32211 (izindleko ngu-R1 ngayinye) noma ungene ku-www.crime-line.co.za. 
Ungathumela i-SMS ku-32211 (ngenani le-R1 ngayinye) noma uye kwi-www.crime-line.co.za.
Ababhali bemininingwane engahluziwe abaqeqeshiwe balindele ukudlulisela imininingwane emaphoyiseni, azothatha isinyathelo ngaleso sikhathi!
Abasebenzi abafaka lolo lwazi kukhompyutha balindele ukuludlulisela emaphoyiseni, wona azothatha isinyathelo ngokushesha!
Labo bantu abaqeqeshelwe ukuqoqa idatha balinde ukudlulisa ulwazi emaphoyiseni okuyiwo azothatha isinyathelo ngokushesha!
Kukhona abashayi mshini abaqeqeshiwe abalinde wena ukuze ulwazi obanikeza lona baludlulisele ngokuphuthumayo emaphoyiseni bese ehlala izithonto kulona! 
Abasebenzi abafaka lolo lwazi kukhompyutha balindele ukuludlulisela emaphoyiseni, wona azothatha isinyathelo ngokushesha!
Labo bantu abaqeqeshelwe ukuqoqa idatha balinde ukudlulisa ulwazi emaphoyiseni okuyiwo azothatha isinyathelo ngokushesha!

Labo bantu abaqeqeshelwe ukuqoqa idatha balinde ukudlulisa ulwazi emaphoyiseni okuyiwo azothatha isinyathelo ngokushesha!
