Ababhali bemininingwane engahluziwe abaqeqeshiwe balindele ukudlulisela imininingwane emaphoyiseni, azothatha isinyathelo ngaleso sikhathi!
Abasebenzi abafaka lolo lwazi kukhompyutha balindele ukuludlulisela emaphoyiseni, wona azothatha isinyathelo ngokushesha!
Labo bantu abaqeqeshelwe ukuqoqa idatha balinde ukudlulisa ulwazi emaphoyiseni okuyiwo azothatha isinyathelo ngokushesha!
Okuhle kakhulu wukuthi awuzukudalulwa.
Okuhle kakhulu ukuthi igama lakho ngeke lidalulwe.
Okuhle ukuthi uzohlala ungaziwa.
Okuhle kakhulu la ukuthi akekho ozokwazi igama lakho. 
Okuhle kakhulu ukuthi igama lakho ngeke lidalulwe.
Okuhle ukuthi uzohlala ungaziwa.
Okuhle kakhulu la ukuthi akekho ozokwazi igama lakho. 
Okuhle kakhulu wukuthi awuzukudalulwa.
Okuhle ukuthi uzohlala ungaziwa.
Okuhle kakhulu la ukuthi akekho ozokwazi igama lakho. 
Okuhle kakhulu wukuthi awuzukudalulwa.
Okuhle kakhulu ukuthi igama lakho ngeke lidalulwe.
Okuhle kakhulu la ukuthi akekho ozokwazi igama lakho. 
Okuhle kakhulu wukuthi awuzukudalulwa.
Okuhle kakhulu ukuthi igama lakho ngeke lidalulwe.
Okuhle ukuthi uzohlala ungaziwa.
Manje sewunamandla okulwisana nobugebengu ngaphandle kokubeka impilo yakho engcupheni.
Manje usunamandla okusiza ekulweni nobugebengu ngaphandle kokuzifaka engozini ngokwakho.
Manje usunamandla okulwa nobugebengu ngaphandle kokuzibeka engozini.
Manjena usunamandla okusiza kuliwe nobugebengu ngaphandle kokuzifaka engozini. 
Manje usunamandla okusiza ekulweni nobugebengu ngaphandle kokuzifaka engozini ngokwakho.
Manje usunamandla okulwa nobugebengu ngaphandle kokuzibeka engozini.
Manjena usunamandla okusiza kuliwe nobugebengu ngaphandle kokuzifaka engozini. 
Manje sewunamandla okulwisana nobugebengu ngaphandle kokubeka impilo yakho engcupheni.
Manje usunamandla okulwa nobugebengu ngaphandle kokuzibeka engozini.
Manjena usunamandla okusiza kuliwe nobugebengu ngaphandle kokuzifaka engozini. 
Manje sewunamandla okulwisana nobugebengu ngaphandle kokubeka impilo yakho engcupheni.
Manje usunamandla okusiza ekulweni nobugebengu ngaphandle kokuzifaka engozini ngokwakho.
Manjena usunamandla okusiza kuliwe nobugebengu ngaphandle kokuzifaka engozini. 
Manje sewunamandla okulwisana nobugebengu ngaphandle kokubeka impilo yakho engcupheni.
Manje usunamandla okusiza ekulweni nobugebengu ngaphandle kokuzifaka engozini ngokwakho.
Manje usunamandla okulwa nobugebengu ngaphandle kokuzibeka engozini.
Uhlelo lwe-Primedia lwethembisa ukuthi akuzukubuyelwa kuwe ngalokho okubikile.
Umkhankaso wePrimedia uthembisa ukuzenza zilandise izigebengu.
Abakwa-Primedia bethembisa ukuthi ngeke baphindele kuwe.
Umshikashika wakwa-Primedia uthembisa ukungabuyeli kuwe. 
Umkhankaso wePrimedia uthembisa ukuzenza zilandise izigebengu.
Abakwa-Primedia bethembisa ukuthi ngeke baphindele kuwe.
Umshikashika wakwa-Primedia uthembisa ukungabuyeli kuwe. 
Uhlelo lwe-Primedia lwethembisa ukuthi akuzukubuyelwa kuwe ngalokho okubikile.
Abakwa-Primedia bethembisa ukuthi ngeke baphindele kuwe.
Umshikashika wakwa-Primedia uthembisa ukungabuyeli kuwe. 
Uhlelo lwe-Primedia lwethembisa ukuthi akuzukubuyelwa kuwe ngalokho okubikile.
Umkhankaso wePrimedia uthembisa ukuzenza zilandise izigebengu.
Umshikashika wakwa-Primedia uthembisa ukungabuyeli kuwe. 
Uhlelo lwe-Primedia lwethembisa ukuthi akuzukubuyelwa kuwe ngalokho okubikile.
Umkhankaso wePrimedia uthembisa ukuzenza zilandise izigebengu.
Abakwa-Primedia bethembisa ukuthi ngeke baphindele kuwe.
UYusuf Abramjee, uMdidiyeli Wephrojekthi Yokulwisana Nobugengu ye-Primedia, uthe: “Asilidingi igama noma ikheli lakho ngaphandle kwalapho usinika ngokuthanda futhi asikho isidingo sokuthi wenze isitatimende noma sokuvela enkantolo.
UYusuf Abramjee, onguMxhumanisi Weprojekthi Yokulwisana Nobugebengu ePrimedia, wathi: "Asifuni igama lakho noma ikheli lakho ngaphandle uma usinikeza lona ngokuzithandela futhi akudingeki kwenziwe izitatimende ezithile noma kuvelwe enkantolo. 
U-Yusuf Abramjee, Ongumgqugquzeli Wephrojekthi Elwa Nobugebengu yabakwa-Primedia, uthe: "Asilidingi igama noma ikheli lakho ngaphandle uma kunguwena ofuna ukusinikeza lona futhi asikho isidingo sokuthi wenze izitatimende noma uvele ezinkantolo. 
UYusuf Abramjee, Ongumdidiyeli woMkhankaso wakwaPrimedia olwa nobugebengu, wathi: “Asilidingi igama lakho ngaphandle uma ufuna ukusinikeza, kanti asikho nesidingo sezitatimende nokuthi uyovela enkantolo.
UYusuf Abramjee, onguMxhumanisi Weprojekthi Yokulwisana Nobugebengu ePrimedia, wathi: "Asifuni igama lakho noma ikheli lakho ngaphandle uma usinikeza lona ngokuzithandela futhi akudingeki kwenziwe izitatimende ezithile noma kuvelwe enkantolo. 
U-Yusuf Abramjee, Ongumgqugquzeli Wephrojekthi Elwa Nobugebengu yabakwa-Primedia, uthe: "Asilidingi igama noma ikheli lakho ngaphandle uma kunguwena ofuna ukusinikeza lona futhi asikho isidingo sokuthi wenze izitatimende noma uvele ezinkantolo. 
UYusuf Abramjee, Ongumdidiyeli woMkhankaso wakwaPrimedia olwa nobugebengu, wathi: “Asilidingi igama lakho ngaphandle uma ufuna ukusinikeza, kanti asikho nesidingo sezitatimende nokuthi uyovela enkantolo.
UYusuf Abramjee, uMdidiyeli Wephrojekthi Yokulwisana Nobugengu ye-Primedia, uthe: “Asilidingi igama noma ikheli lakho ngaphandle kwalapho usinika ngokuthanda futhi asikho isidingo sokuthi wenze isitatimende noma sokuvela enkantolo.
U-Yusuf Abramjee, Ongumgqugquzeli Wephrojekthi Elwa Nobugebengu yabakwa-Primedia, uthe: "Asilidingi igama noma ikheli lakho ngaphandle uma kunguwena ofuna ukusinikeza lona futhi asikho isidingo sokuthi wenze izitatimende noma uvele ezinkantolo. 
UYusuf Abramjee, Ongumdidiyeli woMkhankaso wakwaPrimedia olwa nobugebengu, wathi: “Asilidingi igama lakho ngaphandle uma ufuna ukusinikeza, kanti asikho nesidingo sezitatimende nokuthi uyovela enkantolo.
UYusuf Abramjee, uMdidiyeli Wephrojekthi Yokulwisana Nobugengu ye-Primedia, uthe: “Asilidingi igama noma ikheli lakho ngaphandle kwalapho usinika ngokuthanda futhi asikho isidingo sokuthi wenze isitatimende noma sokuvela enkantolo.
UYusuf Abramjee, onguMxhumanisi Weprojekthi Yokulwisana Nobugebengu ePrimedia, wathi: "Asifuni igama lakho noma ikheli lakho ngaphandle uma usinikeza lona ngokuzithandela futhi akudingeki kwenziwe izitatimende ezithile noma kuvelwe enkantolo.

UYusuf Abramjee, onguMxhumanisi Weprojekthi Yokulwisana Nobugebengu ePrimedia, wathi: "Asifuni igama lakho noma ikheli lakho ngaphandle uma usinikeza lona ngokuzithandela futhi akudingeki kwenziwe izitatimende ezithile noma kuvelwe enkantolo. 
U-Yusuf Abramjee, Ongumgqugquzeli Wephrojekthi Elwa Nobugebengu yabakwa-Primedia, uthe: "Asilidingi igama noma ikheli lakho ngaphandle uma kunguwena ofuna ukusinikeza lona futhi asikho isidingo sokuthi wenze izitatimende noma uvele ezinkantolo. 
Esikufunayo nje ulwazi ngezigebengu ukuze amaphoyisa akwazi ukuthatha isinyathelo ngalokho.”
Esikufunayo nje thina wulwazi ngezigebengu ukuze amaphoyisa athathe izinyathelo.”
Esikufunayo thina ulwazi mayelana nezigebengu nje kuphela ukuze amaphoyisa akwazi ukuluthathela izinyathelo."
Esikudingayo nje ulwazi ngezigebengu ukuze amaphoyisa abhekane nazo."
Esikufunayo nje thina wulwazi ngezigebengu ukuze amaphoyisa athathe izinyathelo.”
Esikufunayo thina ulwazi mayelana nezigebengu nje kuphela ukuze amaphoyisa akwazi ukuluthathela izinyathelo."
Esikudingayo nje ulwazi ngezigebengu ukuze amaphoyisa abhekane nazo."
Esikufunayo nje ulwazi ngezigebengu ukuze amaphoyisa akwazi ukuthatha isinyathelo ngalokho.”
Esikufunayo thina ulwazi mayelana nezigebengu nje kuphela ukuze amaphoyisa akwazi ukuluthathela izinyathelo."
Esikudingayo nje ulwazi ngezigebengu ukuze amaphoyisa abhekane nazo."
Esikufunayo nje ulwazi ngezigebengu ukuze amaphoyisa akwazi ukuthatha isinyathelo ngalokho.”
Esikufunayo nje thina wulwazi ngezigebengu ukuze amaphoyisa athathe izinyathelo.”
Esikudingayo nje ulwazi ngezigebengu ukuze amaphoyisa abhekane nazo."
Esikufunayo nje ulwazi ngezigebengu ukuze amaphoyisa akwazi ukuthatha isinyathelo ngalokho.”
Esikufunayo nje thina wulwazi ngezigebengu ukuze amaphoyisa athathe izinyathelo.”
Esikufunayo thina ulwazi mayelana nezigebengu nje kuphela ukuze amaphoyisa akwazi ukuluthathela izinyathelo."
Lo mkhankaso omusha, odle izigidi zamarandi, wokulwisana nobugebengu kuzwelonke omusha wethulwa i-Primedia eSandton mhlaka 7 kuNhlangulana 2007.
Lo mkhankaso omusha, wezigidigidi zamarandi, kazwelonke wokulwa nobugebengu wethulwa yiPrimedia eSandton ngomhla ka-7 kuNhlangulana 2007.
Lo mkhankaso omusha wokulwisa ubugebengu kuzwelonke obize izinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane zamarandi wethulwa abakwa-Primedia eSandton ngomhla wesi-7 Nhlangulana 2007. 
Lo mkhankaso kazwelonke omusha omelene nobugebengu, obiza izigidigidi zamarandi, wethulwa abakwa-Primedia e-Sandton mhla ziyi-7 Juni 2007. 
Lo mkhankaso omusha, wezigidigidi zamarandi, kazwelonke wokulwa nobugebengu wethulwa yiPrimedia eSandton ngomhla ka-7 kuNhlangulana 2007.
Lo mkhankaso omusha wokulwisa ubugebengu kuzwelonke obize izinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane zamarandi wethulwa abakwa-Primedia eSandton ngomhla wesi-7 Nhlangulana 2007. 
Lo mkhankaso kazwelonke omusha omelene nobugebengu, obiza izigidigidi zamarandi, wethulwa abakwa-Primedia e-Sandton mhla ziyi-7 Juni 2007. 
Lo mkhankaso omusha, odle izigidi zamarandi, wokulwisana nobugebengu kuzwelonke omusha wethulwa i-Primedia eSandton mhlaka 7 kuNhlangulana 2007.
Lo mkhankaso omusha wokulwisa ubugebengu kuzwelonke obize izinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane zamarandi wethulwa abakwa-Primedia eSandton ngomhla wesi-7 Nhlangulana 2007. 
Lo mkhankaso kazwelonke omusha omelene nobugebengu, obiza izigidigidi zamarandi, wethulwa abakwa-Primedia e-Sandton mhla ziyi-7 Juni 2007. 
Lo mkhankaso omusha, odle izigidi zamarandi, wokulwisana nobugebengu kuzwelonke omusha wethulwa i-Primedia eSandton mhlaka 7 kuNhlangulana 2007.
Lo mkhankaso omusha, wezigidigidi zamarandi, kazwelonke wokulwa nobugebengu wethulwa yiPrimedia eSandton ngomhla ka-7 kuNhlangulana 2007.
Lo mkhankaso kazwelonke omusha omelene nobugebengu, obiza izigidigidi zamarandi, wethulwa abakwa-Primedia e-Sandton mhla ziyi-7 Juni 2007. 
Lo mkhankaso omusha, odle izigidi zamarandi, wokulwisana nobugebengu kuzwelonke omusha wethulwa i-Primedia eSandton mhlaka 7 kuNhlangulana 2007.
Lo mkhankaso omusha, wezigidigidi zamarandi, kazwelonke wokulwa nobugebengu wethulwa yiPrimedia eSandton ngomhla ka-7 kuNhlangulana 2007.
Lo mkhankaso omusha wokulwisa ubugebengu kuzwelonke obize izinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane zamarandi wethulwa abakwa-Primedia eSandton ngomhla wesi-7 Nhlangulana 2007.

Uhlelo Lokunqanda Ubugebengu lwaqala e-Albuquerque, e-New Mexico, kuMandulo 1976.
AbaNqanda Ubugebengu baqala e-Albuquerque, eNew Mexico, kuMandulo 1976. 
Uhlelo Lokuqeda Ubugebengu lwaqala e-Albuquerque, eNew Mexico, ngoMandulo 1976.
Abanqandi Bugebengu baqala e-Albuquerque, New Mexico, ngo-September 1976. 
AbaNqanda Ubugebengu baqala e-Albuquerque, eNew Mexico, kuMandulo 1976. 
Uhlelo Lokuqeda Ubugebengu lwaqala e-Albuquerque, eNew Mexico, ngoMandulo 1976.

Kuwukubambisana phakathi komphakathi, imithombo yabezindaba kanye nama-ejensi okuphoqelela umthetho futhi lwakhelwa ukuthi lulwisane nobugebengu futhi lugcine izakhamizi ziphephile.
Kuwukusebenzisana phakathi komphakathi, abezindaba kanye nezinhlangano zokuphoqelelwa komthetho futhi kwakuhlanyelwe ukulwa nobugebengu nokugcina abahlali bephephile.
Luwubambiswano phakathi komphakathi, abomthombo bezindaba nezinhlangano zezokugcinwa komthetho kanti yasungulwa ngenhloso yokulwa nobugebengu nokugcina izakhamuzi ziphephile.
Iwubambiswano lomphakathi, abezindaba, nezinhlaka ezibhekele ukugcinwa komthetho, kanti yakhelwa ukumelana nobugebengu nokugcina izakhamuzi ziphephile.
Kuwukusebenzisana phakathi komphakathi, abezindaba kanye nezinhlangano zokuphoqelelwa komthetho futhi kwakuhlanyelwe ukulwa nobugebengu nokugcina abahlali bephephile.
Luwubambiswano phakathi komphakathi, abomthombo bezindaba nezinhlangano zezokugcinwa komthetho kanti yasungulwa ngenhloso yokulwa nobugebengu nokugcina izakhamuzi ziphephile.
Iwubambiswano lomphakathi, abezindaba, nezinhlaka ezibhekele ukugcinwa komthetho, kanti yakhelwa ukumelana nobugebengu nokugcina izakhamuzi ziphephile.

Namuhla, kunezinhlelo Zokunqanda Ubugebengu ezingu 1 200 emhlabeni jikelele ezisebenza emazweni angu 20 asebenzisa ulwazi oluvele emphakathini  olusiza ekusombululweni izinkinga zobugebengu.
Namuhla kunezinhlelo ezingaba ngu-1 200 zabaNqanda Ubugebengu emhlabeni wonke ezisebenza emazweni angu-20 ezisebenzisa ulwazi olunikezwa ngumphakathi ukuze kuxazululwe ubugebengu.
Namhlanje sekunezinhlelo Zokuqeda Ubugebengu eziyi-1 200 emhlabeni wonke ezisebenza emazweni angama-20 asebenzisa ulwazi oluhlinzekwa ngumphakathi ngenhloso yokusiza ekuxazululweni kobugebengu. 
Namuhla, sekukhona izinhlelo eziyi-1 200 Zabanqandi Bugebengu emhlabeni wonke, zisebenza emazweni angama-20 asebenzisa ulwazi alunikezwa umphakathi ukusiza ukuxazulula ubugebengu. 
Namuhla kunezinhlelo ezingaba ngu-1 200 zabaNqanda Ubugebengu emhlabeni wonke ezisebenza emazweni angu-20 ezisebenzisa ulwazi olunikezwa ngumphakathi ukuze kuxazululwe ubugebengu.

Namuhla, sekukhona izinhlelo eziyi-1 200 Zabanqandi Bugebengu emhlabeni wonke, zisebenza emazweni angama-20 asebenzisa ulwazi alunikezwa umphakathi ukusiza ukuxazulula ubugebengu.

Okumele kwaziwe iphoyisa ngalinye ngomkhankaso omusha wokulwisana nobugebengu, wukuthi  lo mkhankaso usekelwe uNgqongqoshe Wezokuphepha Nezokuvikela, uMnu. Charles Nqakula kanye noKhomishina we-SAPS kuzwelonke, uKhomishina Jackie Selebi.
Okumelwe kwaziwe yisikhulu ngasinye samaphoyisa ngalo mkhankaso omusha wokulwa nobugebengu, ukuthi usekelwa ngokugcwele nguNgqongqoshe Wezokuphepha Nokulondeka, uMnu Charles Nqakula kanye noKhomishana Kazwelonke we-SAPS, uKhomishana Jackie Selebi. 
Okumele kwaziwe yilelo nalelo phoyisa mayelana nalo mkhankaso omusha wokulwa nobugebengu wukuthi wesekwe ngokuphelele uNgqongqoshe Wezokuphepha Nokuvikela uMnu. Charles Nqakula kanye noKhomishane Wamaphoyisa Kuzwelonke, uKhomishane uJackie Selebi. 
Okufanele kwaziwe yilo lonke iphoyisa ngalo mkhankaso omusha omelene nobugebengu, ukuthi uNgqongqoshe Wezokuphepha Nokuvikeleka, UMnu Charles Nqakula noKhomishane Wamaphoyisa Kuzwelonke, uKhomishane Jackie Selebi bawuseka ngokuphelele. 
Okumelwe kwaziwe yisikhulu ngasinye samaphoyisa ngalo mkhankaso omusha wokulwa nobugebengu, ukuthi usekelwa ngokugcwele nguNgqongqoshe Wezokuphepha Nokulondeka, uMnu Charles Nqakula kanye noKhomishana Kazwelonke we-SAPS, uKhomishana Jackie Selebi.

Okumele kwaziwe iphoyisa ngalinye ngomkhankaso omusha wokulwisana nobugebengu, wukuthi  lo mkhankaso usekelwe uNgqongqoshe Wezokuphepha Nezokuvikela, uMnu. Charles Nqakula kanye noKhomishina we-SAPS kuzwelonke, uKhomishina Jackie Selebi.
Okumelwe kwaziwe yisikhulu ngasinye samaphoyisa ngalo mkhankaso omusha wokulwa nobugebengu, ukuthi usekelwa ngokugcwele nguNgqongqoshe Wezokuphepha Nokulondeka, uMnu Charles Nqakula kanye noKhomishana Kazwelonke we-SAPS, uKhomishana Jackie Selebi. 
Okumele kwaziwe yilelo nalelo phoyisa mayelana nalo mkhankaso omusha wokulwa nobugebengu wukuthi wesekwe ngokuphelele uNgqongqoshe Wezokuphepha Nokuvikela uMnu. Charles Nqakula kanye noKhomishane Wamaphoyisa Kuzwelonke, uKhomishane uJackie Selebi. 
UKhomishina Selebi wethembise ukuthi “njengenhlangano, sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukwenza le phrojekthi isebenze.”
Ukhomishana Selebi wathembisa ukuthi "njengenhlangano, sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukuze senze lo msebenzi uphumelele." 
UKhomishane Selebi uthembise ukuthi "njengoba siyinhlangano, sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukwenza le phrojekthi ukuthi isebenze."
UKhomishane Selebi wathembisa ukuthi "njengenhlangano, sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukuthi lo mkhankaso usebenze." 
Ukhomishana Selebi wathembisa ukuthi "njengenhlangano, sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukuze senze lo msebenzi uphumelele." 
UKhomishane Selebi uthembise ukuthi "njengoba siyinhlangano, sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukwenza le phrojekthi ukuthi isebenze."
UKhomishane Selebi wathembisa ukuthi "njengenhlangano, sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukuthi lo mkhankaso usebenze." 
UKhomishina Selebi wethembise ukuthi “njengenhlangano, sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukwenza le phrojekthi isebenze.”
UKhomishane Selebi uthembise ukuthi "njengoba siyinhlangano, sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukwenza le phrojekthi ukuthi isebenze."
UKhomishane Selebi wathembisa ukuthi "njengenhlangano, sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukuthi lo mkhankaso usebenze." 
UKhomishina Selebi wethembise ukuthi “njengenhlangano, sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukwenza le phrojekthi isebenze.”
Ukhomishana Selebi wathembisa ukuthi "njengenhlangano, sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukuze senze lo msebenzi uphumelele." 
UKhomishane Selebi wathembisa ukuthi "njengenhlangano, sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukuthi lo mkhankaso usebenze." 
UKhomishina Selebi wethembise ukuthi “njengenhlangano, sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukwenza le phrojekthi isebenze.”
Ukhomishana Selebi wathembisa ukuthi "njengenhlangano, sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukuze senze lo msebenzi uphumelele." 
UKhomishane Selebi uthembise ukuthi "njengoba siyinhlangano, sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukwenza le phrojekthi ukuthi isebenze."
Umbuzo uthi uzokwenzani ngakho?
Umbuzo uwukuthi yini wena ozoyenza ngakho?
Umbuzo uthi yini ezokwenziwa nguwe mayelana nayo?
Umbuzo lapha uthi, wena-ke uzokwenzani ngaloku? 
Umbuzo uwukuthi yini wena ozoyenza ngakho?
Umbuzo uthi yini ezokwenziwa nguwe mayelana nayo?
Umbuzo lapha uthi, wena-ke uzokwenzani ngaloku? 
Umbuzo uthi uzokwenzani ngakho?
Umbuzo uthi yini ezokwenziwa nguwe mayelana nayo?
Umbuzo lapha uthi, wena-ke uzokwenzani ngaloku? 
Umbuzo uthi uzokwenzani ngakho?
Umbuzo uwukuthi yini wena ozoyenza ngakho?

Umbuzo uthi uzokwenzani ngakho?
Umbuzo uwukuthi yini wena ozoyenza ngakho?

Kudingeka ukuthi wesekwe yibo bonke abantu ngokugcwele, kungabi nje ukuthatha izinyathelo ngokushesha uma uthola ulwazi oluphuma esikhungweni sozingcingo ezibika ngobugebengu kuphela, kodwa baphinde bazise abantu ngalolu hlelo lapho bethola ithuba.
Kudingeka ukusekela okugcwele kwawo wonke umuntu, hhayi nje kuphela ukusabela ngokushesha lapho uthola ulwazi oluvela esikhungweni socingo lobugebengu, kodwa futhi nokwazisa abanye ngalo mkhankaso nomaphi lapho kungenzeka khona.
Kudingeka ukweseka okuphelele kwawo wonke umuntu, hhayi kuphela ukuthatha isinyathelo ngokushesha uma kwenzeka nithola ulwazi oluvela esizindeni sezingcingo zobugebengu, kodwa kumele nilumakethe lolu hlelo noma kuphi lapho nikwazi ukulumaketha khona.
Wonke umuntu kudinga aweseke lo mkhankaso, hhayi ngokuphendula isimo osibonayo nje kuphela, kepha ngokwazisa abanye ngawo kabanzi.

Qinisekisa ukuthi bayaqonda ukuthi umkhankaso wethembisa ukuthi akuzukubuyelwa kubo ngalokho abakubikile.
Qiniseka ukuthi bayaqonda ukuthi lo mkhankaso uthembisa ukuzenza zilandise izigebengu, ukuthi amagama ngeke adalulwe noma sekunjani. 
Qinisekani ukuthi bayaqonda ukuthi kulo mkhankaso umuntu akubuyelwa kuwe, bazohlala bengaziwa noma kwenzekani. 
Yenza isiqiseko sokuthi bayaqonda ukuthi umkhankaso uyathembisa ukuthi ngeke ubuyele kubo, nanokuthi akekho umuntu ozobazi noma sekunjani.

Ngesikhathi kwethulwa uhlelo lwenombolo yocingo yokubika ngobugebengu, uJohn Robbie, umethuli wohlelo lwasekuseni emsakazweni i-Talk Radio 702, unikezela ngemishini Engamathuluzi Okuhlonza angu 65 ku-SAPS.
Lapho kwethulwa umkhankaso wocingo lobugebengu, uJohn Robbie, umphathi wohlelo lwasekuseni lwe-Talk Radio 702, wanikeza amaphoyisa e-SAPS imishini yamaThuluzi Okuhlonza engu-65.
Ngesikhathi kwethulwa lolu hlelo locingo lobugebengu, uJohn Robbie, oqhuba uhlelo lomsakazo lwasekuseni i-Talk Radio 702, unikezele ngemishini ye-65 ID Tool emaphoyiseni.
Ngesikhathi sokwethulwa kwalo mkhankaso, u-John Robbie, osakaza uhlelo lwasekuseni kwa- Talk Radio 702, wanikeza amaphoyisa akwaSAPS imishini engama-65 yeThuluis le-ID.

Muva nje uMnu Robbie wanxusa emoyeni abalaleli ukuba banikele ngemali yokuthenga le mishini yamaThuluzi Okuhlonza.

Muva nje uMnu Robbie wanxusa emoyeni abalaleli ukuba banikele ngemali yokuthenga le mishini yamaThuluzi Okuhlonza.
Umnu. Robbie usandakunxusa esemoyeni abalaleli ukuba banikele ngemali mayelana nale mishini yama-ID Tool. 
Isitolo esithengisa le mishini, i-Face Technology, naso sifake isandla, sehlisa intengo yale mishini, okwenze izinkampani ezazethembise imali yokuthenga umshini owodwa ekuqaleni  zakwazi ukuthenga emibili.
Abathengisi bale mishini, i-Face Technology, nabo basabela kahle, behlisa intengo yale mishini, okwenza izinkampani ezazinikele ngemali eyanele nje ukuthenga umshini owodwa ukuba zithenge emibili.
Abathengisi bale mishini, abakwaFace Technology, nabo bajoyina ngokwehlisa amanani ale mishini okwenza ukuthi lezo zinkampani ezanikela ngemali elingene ukuthenga umshini owodwa zithenge imishini emibili.
Odaysia le mishini, u-Face Technology, naye wafaka isandla, wehlisa intengo yemishini, lokho okwenza izinkampani ezazinikele ukuthenga umshini owodwa zikwazi ukuyithenga ibe mibili.
Abathengisi bale mishini, i-Face Technology, nabo basabela kahle, behlisa intengo yale mishini, okwenza izinkampani ezazinikele ngemali eyanele nje ukuthenga umshini owodwa ukuba zithenge emibili.
Abathengisi bale mishini, abakwaFace Technology, nabo bajoyina ngokwehlisa amanani ale mishini okwenza ukuthi lezo zinkampani ezanikela ngemali elingene ukuthenga umshini owodwa zithenge imishini emibili.
Odaysia le mishini, u-Face Technology, naye wafaka isandla, wehlisa intengo yemishini, lokho okwenza izinkampani ezazinikele ukuthenga umshini owodwa zikwazi ukuyithenga ibe mibili.
Isitolo esithengisa le mishini, i-Face Technology, naso sifake isandla, sehlisa intengo yale mishini, okwenze izinkampani ezazethembise imali yokuthenga umshini owodwa ekuqaleni  zakwazi ukuthenga emibili.
Abathengisi bale mishini, abakwaFace Technology, nabo bajoyina ngokwehlisa amanani ale mishini okwenza ukuthi lezo zinkampani ezanikela ngemali elingene ukuthenga umshini owodwa zithenge imishini emibili.
Odaysia le mishini, u-Face Technology, naye wafaka isandla, wehlisa intengo yemishini, lokho okwenza izinkampani ezazinikele ukuthenga umshini owodwa zikwazi ukuyithenga ibe mibili.
Isitolo esithengisa le mishini, i-Face Technology, naso sifake isandla, sehlisa intengo yale mishini, okwenze izinkampani ezazethembise imali yokuthenga umshini owodwa ekuqaleni  zakwazi ukuthenga emibili.
Abathengisi bale mishini, i-Face Technology, nabo basabela kahle, behlisa intengo yale mishini, okwenza izinkampani ezazinikele ngemali eyanele nje ukuthenga umshini owodwa ukuba zithenge emibili.
Odaysia le mishini, u-Face Technology, naye wafaka isandla, wehlisa intengo yemishini, lokho okwenza izinkampani ezazinikele ukuthenga umshini owodwa zikwazi ukuyithenga ibe mibili.
Isitolo esithengisa le mishini, i-Face Technology, naso sifake isandla, sehlisa intengo yale mishini, okwenze izinkampani ezazethembise imali yokuthenga umshini owodwa ekuqaleni  zakwazi ukuthenga emibili.
Abathengisi bale mishini, i-Face Technology, nabo basabela kahle, behlisa intengo yale mishini, okwenza izinkampani ezazinikele ngemali eyanele nje ukuthenga umshini owodwa ukuba zithenge emibili.
Abathengisi bale mishini, abakwaFace Technology, nabo bajoyina ngokwehlisa amanani ale mishini okwenza ukuthi lezo zinkampani ezanikela ngemali elingene ukuthenga umshini owodwa zithenge imishini emibili.
I-Primedia noJohn Robbie akusibo kuphela abasiza amaphoyisa ukulwisaneni nobugebengu.
IPrimedia noJohn Robbie akubona bodwa empeleni abasiza amaphoyisa ekulweni nobugebengu.
Abakwa-Primedia no-John Robbie akubona bodwa abasiza amaphoyisa ekulwiseni ubugebengu. 
uPrimedia no-John Robbie akusibona bodwa nje kuphela abasiza amaphoyisa ukulwa nobugebengu. 
IPrimedia noJohn Robbie akubona bodwa empeleni abasiza amaphoyisa ekulweni nobugebengu.
Abakwa-Primedia no-John Robbie akubona bodwa abasiza amaphoyisa ekulwiseni ubugebengu. 
uPrimedia no-John Robbie akusibona bodwa nje kuphela abasiza amaphoyisa ukulwa nobugebengu. 
I-Primedia noJohn Robbie akusibo kuphela abasiza amaphoyisa ukulwisaneni nobugebengu.
Abakwa-Primedia no-John Robbie akubona bodwa abasiza amaphoyisa ekulwiseni ubugebengu. 
uPrimedia no-John Robbie akusibona bodwa nje kuphela abasiza amaphoyisa ukulwa nobugebengu. 
I-Primedia noJohn Robbie akusibo kuphela abasiza amaphoyisa ukulwisaneni nobugebengu.
IPrimedia noJohn Robbie akubona bodwa empeleni abasiza amaphoyisa ekulweni nobugebengu.

Abakwa-Primedia no-John Robbie akubona bodwa abasiza amaphoyisa ekulwiseni ubugebengu. 
Funda noma eziphi izindaba zempumelelo ku-SAPS Journal noma kuJenali ye-SAPS Eku-inthanethi ukuze ubone ukuthi amacala axazululwe kanjani ngosizo lwamalungu omphakathi.
Funda noma iyiphi ezindaweni zabantu ababe nempumelelo eNcwajaneni yamaphoyisa e-SAPS noma eNcwadini ye-SAPS Ku-inthanethi futhi uzobona ukuthi amacala axazululwa kanjani ngosizo lwamalungu omphakathi.
Funda noma yiziphi izindaba Kwijenali Yamaphoyisa noma Kwijenali Yamaphoyisa Ku-Inthanethi uzobona ukuthi amacala axazululwa kanjani ngosizo lwamalungu omphakathi.
Funda noma iluphi udaba lwempumelelo ku-SAPS Jenali noma ku-SAPS Jenali Onlayini uzobe usuyathola ukuthi ubugebengu buxazululeka kanjani ngosizo lwamalungu omphakathi.

Njengoba kunalo mkhankaso wokulwisana nobugebengu, izigebengu, okubandakanya nalabo abambalwa abasembuthweni, singasho singananazi ukuthi ... izinsuku zabo zibaliwe.
Njengoba sekunalo mkhankaso omusha wokulwa nobugebengu, izigebengu, kuhlanganisa nalezo ezimbalwa ezonakele kumaphoyisa, mazazi into eyodwa ngokuqiniseka … izinsuku zazo zibaliwe.
Ngokusebenza kwalo mkhankaso wokulwisa ubugebengu, izigebengu, kubandakanya nalabo abambalwa abakhohlakele kwisevisi sebezokwazi kahle hle into eyodwa … izinsuku zabo sezibaliwe. 
Njengoba sekuthulwe lo mkhankaso omelene nobugebengu nje, izinswelaboya, nalezo zikhohlakali zamaphoyisa ezimbalwa, kufanele bazi ngokungangabazeki ukuthi ... kukhona okusina kubajeqeza.
Njengoba sekunalo mkhankaso omusha wokulwa nobugebengu, izigebengu, kuhlanganisa nalezo ezimbalwa ezonakele kumaphoyisa, mazazi into eyodwa ngokuqiniseka … izinsuku zazo zibaliwe.
Ngokusebenza kwalo mkhankaso wokulwisa ubugebengu, izigebengu, kubandakanya nalabo abambalwa abakhohlakele kwisevisi sebezokwazi kahle hle into eyodwa … izinsuku zabo sezibaliwe.

Imithethonqubo esebenza ezinhlakeni Zokuqinisekisa Izingaqophelo Lezemfundo Nokuqeqesha (ETQA) kususelwa Kumaziphathe Weziqu WaseNingizimu Afrika (SAQA)  kudinga ukuthi abahlinzeki bezidingo zemfundo nokuqeqesha bafake izicelo zesitifiketi sokugunyazwa i-ETQA.
Imithetho esebenza ezinhlanganweni zesiQinisekiso Sezinga Elihle Lezemfundo Noqeqesho (ETQA) ngaphansi kweGunya Lamaphepha Emfundo LaseNingizimu Afrika (SAQA) ifuna ukuba abazohlinzeka imfundo noqeqesho bafake isicelo sokugunyazwa ku-ETQA.
Imithetho esebenza kuzinhlangano Zokuqinisekiswa Kwezinganhle Lezemfundo Noqeqesho (i-ETQA) ezingaphansi kweGunya Lamakhwalifikheshini eNingizimu Afrika (i-SAQA) idinga ukuthi abahlinzeki bezemfundo bafake izicelo zokuqinisekiswa yi-ETQA.   
Imithethonqubo esebenza ezinhlakeni zokuqinisekisa izinga emfundweni nasekuqeqesheni (i-ETQA) ngaphansi kwenhlangano egunyaza okufundelwe eNingizimu Afrika (i-SAQA) idinga ukuthi abahlinzekimisebenzi kwezemfundo nokuqeqesha bafake izicelo ku-ETQA.

Imithethonqubo esebenza ezinhlakeni Zokuqinisekisa Izingaqophelo Lezemfundo Nokuqeqesha (ETQA) kususelwa Kumaziphathe Weziqu WaseNingizimu Afrika (SAQA)  kudinga ukuthi abahlinzeki bezidingo zemfundo nokuqeqesha bafake izicelo zesitifiketi sokugunyazwa i-ETQA.
Imithetho esebenza ezinhlanganweni zesiQinisekiso Sezinga Elihle Lezemfundo Noqeqesho (ETQA) ngaphansi kweGunya Lamaphepha Emfundo LaseNingizimu Afrika (SAQA) ifuna ukuba abazohlinzeka imfundo noqeqesho bafake isicelo sokugunyazwa ku-ETQA.
Imithetho esebenza kuzinhlangano Zokuqinisekiswa Kwezinganhle Lezemfundo Noqeqesho (i-ETQA) ezingaphansi kweGunya Lamakhwalifikheshini eNingizimu Afrika (i-SAQA) idinga ukuthi abahlinzeki bezemfundo bafake izicelo zokuqinisekiswa yi-ETQA.   
Ukuze bathole isitifiketi sokugunyazwa, abahlinzeki bezidingo bezemfundo nokuqeqesha kudingeka ukuthi babhaliswe ngokomthetho ofanele.
Ukuze bagunyazwe, abahlinzeki bemfundo noqeqesho kudingeka babhaliswe ngokwemithetho esebenzayo.
Ukuze baqinisekiswe, abahlinzeki bezemfundo badinga ukuba babhaliswe ngokuya ngalowo mthetho osebenzayo.
Ukuze bagunyazwe, abahlinzeki misebenzi kwezemfundo nokuqeqesha kudingeka barejistwe ngokwemithetho esebenzayo. 
Ukuze bagunyazwe, abahlinzeki bemfundo noqeqesho kudingeka babhaliswe ngokwemithetho esebenzayo.
Ukuze baqinisekiswe, abahlinzeki bezemfundo badinga ukuba babhaliswe ngokuya ngalowo mthetho osebenzayo.
Ukuze bagunyazwe, abahlinzeki misebenzi kwezemfundo nokuqeqesha kudingeka barejistwe ngokwemithetho esebenzayo. 
Ukuze bathole isitifiketi sokugunyazwa, abahlinzeki bezidingo bezemfundo nokuqeqesha kudingeka ukuthi babhaliswe ngokomthetho ofanele.
Ukuze baqinisekiswe, abahlinzeki bezemfundo badinga ukuba babhaliswe ngokuya ngalowo mthetho osebenzayo.
Ukuze bagunyazwe, abahlinzeki misebenzi kwezemfundo nokuqeqesha kudingeka barejistwe ngokwemithetho esebenzayo. 
Ukuze bathole isitifiketi sokugunyazwa, abahlinzeki bezidingo bezemfundo nokuqeqesha kudingeka ukuthi babhaliswe ngokomthetho ofanele.
Ukuze bagunyazwe, abahlinzeki bemfundo noqeqesho kudingeka babhaliswe ngokwemithetho esebenzayo.
Ukuze bagunyazwe, abahlinzeki misebenzi kwezemfundo nokuqeqesha kudingeka barejistwe ngokwemithetho esebenzayo. 
Ukuze bathole isitifiketi sokugunyazwa, abahlinzeki bezidingo bezemfundo nokuqeqesha kudingeka ukuthi babhaliswe ngokomthetho ofanele.
Ukuze bagunyazwe, abahlinzeki bemfundo noqeqesho kudingeka babhaliswe ngokwemithetho esebenzayo.
Ukuze baqinisekiswe, abahlinzeki bezemfundo badinga ukuba babhaliswe ngokuya ngalowo mthetho osebenzayo.
Umthetho omayelana Nemfundo Ephakeme Nokuqhubezela Imfundo udinga ukuthi bonke abahlinzeki bezidingo nokuqeqesha abahlinzeka ngeziqu ezigcwele babhalise eMnyangweni Wezemfundo.
Umthetho ophathelene neMfundo Ephakeme kanye neMfundo Eyengeziwe ufuna ukuba bonke abahlinzeki bezemfundo noqeqesho abanikeza amaphepha emfundo kumelwe babhalise eMnyangweni wezeMfundo.
Imithetho emayelana Nemfundo Yamazinga Aphakeme Nemfundo Eqhubekela Phambili idinga ukuthi bonke abahlinzeki bezemfundo nokuqeqeshwa abahlinzeka ngamakhwalifikheshini agcwele babhalise kuMnyango Wezemfundo.  
Imithetho ephathelene neMfundo Ephakeme neMfundo Eqhubekayo idinga ukuthi bonke abahlinzeki misebenzi kwezemfundo nokuqeqesha abanikeza izifundo ezigcwele babhaliswe kuMnyango Wezemfundo.
Umthetho ophathelene neMfundo Ephakeme kanye neMfundo Eyengeziwe ufuna ukuba bonke abahlinzeki bezemfundo noqeqesho abanikeza amaphepha emfundo kumelwe babhalise eMnyangweni wezeMfundo.
Imithetho emayelana Nemfundo Yamazinga Aphakeme Nemfundo Eqhubekela Phambili idinga ukuthi bonke abahlinzeki bezemfundo nokuqeqeshwa abahlinzeka ngamakhwalifikheshini agcwele babhalise kuMnyango Wezemfundo.  
Imithetho ephathelene neMfundo Ephakeme neMfundo Eqhubekayo idinga ukuthi bonke abahlinzeki misebenzi kwezemfundo nokuqeqesha abanikeza izifundo ezigcwele babhaliswe kuMnyango Wezemfundo.
Umthetho omayelana Nemfundo Ephakeme Nokuqhubezela Imfundo udinga ukuthi bonke abahlinzeki bezidingo nokuqeqesha abahlinzeka ngeziqu ezigcwele babhalise eMnyangweni Wezemfundo.
Imithetho emayelana Nemfundo Yamazinga Aphakeme Nemfundo Eqhubekela Phambili idinga ukuthi bonke abahlinzeki bezemfundo nokuqeqeshwa abahlinzeka ngamakhwalifikheshini agcwele babhalise kuMnyango Wezemfundo.  
Imithetho ephathelene neMfundo Ephakeme neMfundo Eqhubekayo idinga ukuthi bonke abahlinzeki misebenzi kwezemfundo nokuqeqesha abanikeza izifundo ezigcwele babhaliswe kuMnyango Wezemfundo.
Umthetho omayelana Nemfundo Ephakeme Nokuqhubezela Imfundo udinga ukuthi bonke abahlinzeki bezidingo nokuqeqesha abahlinzeka ngeziqu ezigcwele babhalise eMnyangweni Wezemfundo.
Umthetho ophathelene neMfundo Ephakeme kanye neMfundo Eyengeziwe ufuna ukuba bonke abahlinzeki bezemfundo noqeqesho abanikeza amaphepha emfundo kumelwe babhalise eMnyangweni wezeMfundo.
Imithetho ephathelene neMfundo Ephakeme neMfundo Eqhubekayo idinga ukuthi bonke abahlinzeki misebenzi kwezemfundo nokuqeqesha abanikeza izifundo ezigcwele babhaliswe kuMnyango Wezemfundo.
Umthetho omayelana Nemfundo Ephakeme Nokuqhubezela Imfundo udinga ukuthi bonke abahlinzeki bezidingo nokuqeqesha abahlinzeka ngeziqu ezigcwele babhalise eMnyangweni Wezemfundo.
Umthetho ophathelene neMfundo Ephakeme kanye neMfundo Eyengeziwe ufuna ukuba bonke abahlinzeki bezemfundo noqeqesho abanikeza amaphepha emfundo kumelwe babhalise eMnyangweni wezeMfundo.
Imithetho emayelana Nemfundo Yamazinga Aphakeme Nemfundo Eqhubekela Phambili idinga ukuthi bonke abahlinzeki bezemfundo nokuqeqeshwa abahlinzeka ngamakhwalifikheshini agcwele babhalise kuMnyango Wezemfundo.  
Umhlinzeki wezemfundo nokuqeqesha kumele ahlinzeke ngezifundo ezikumazinga kanye/noma ngeziqu ezihambisana nokugxilwe kukho okuyisisekelo sezinhlaka Zokuqinisekisa Izingaqophelo Lezemfundo Nokuqeqesha (ETQA) okuwuphiko Lukamaziphathe Womkhakha Wezokufundisa Nokuqeqesha (SETA) noma Uphiko Lochwepheshe. 
Umhlinzeki wezemfundo noqeqesho kumelwe anikeze izimiso zezifundo kanye/noma amaphepha emfundo awela ngaphakathi komkhakha egxila kakhulu kuwo inhlangano yesiQinisekiso Sezinga Elihle Lezemfundo Noqeqesho (ETQA) yoMkhakha Wegunya Lezemfundo Noqeqesho (SETA) noma iNhlangano Yochwepheshe.
Umhlinzeki wezemfundo noqeqesho kumele ahlinzeke ngamayunithi standadi kanye/noma ngamakhwalifikheshini angaphansi kwaleyo ndawo okugxilwe kuyo eyisisekelo senhlangano Eqinisekisa Izinganhle Lezemfundo Noqeqesho (i-ETQA) yeGunya Lesigaba Sezemfundo Noqeqesho (i-SETA) noma yeNhlangano Yongoti.
Umhlinzeki kwezemfundo nokuqeqesha kufanele ahlinzeke izigaba zezifundo kanye/noma izitifiketi ezisemkhakheni oyingqikithi yohlaka Lokuqinisekisa Izinga Emfundweni Nasekuqeqesheni (ETQA) kuMkhakha Womgwamanda Wezemfundo nokuqeqesha (SETA) noma iNhlangano Yawongoti.
Umhlinzeki wezemfundo noqeqesho kumelwe anikeze izimiso zezifundo kanye/noma amaphepha emfundo awela ngaphakathi komkhakha egxila kakhulu kuwo inhlangano yesiQinisekiso Sezinga Elihle Lezemfundo Noqeqesho (ETQA) yoMkhakha Wegunya Lezemfundo Noqeqesho (SETA) noma iNhlangano Yochwepheshe.

Okudingekayo ukuze uthole isitifiketi sokugunyazwa:
Izimfuneko zokugunyazwa:
Izidingo zokuqinisekiswa:
Okudingakalayo ukuze ugunyazwe:
Izimfuneko zokugunyazwa:
Izidingo zokuqinisekiswa:
Okudingakalayo ukuze ugunyazwe:
Okudingekayo ukuze uthole isitifiketi sokugunyazwa:
Izidingo zokuqinisekiswa:
Okudingakalayo ukuze ugunyazwe:
Okudingekayo ukuze uthole isitifiketi sokugunyazwa:
Izimfuneko zokugunyazwa:
Okudingakalayo ukuze ugunyazwe:
Okudingekayo ukuze uthole isitifiketi sokugunyazwa:
Izimfuneko zokugunyazwa:
Izidingo zokuqinisekiswa:
* Okudingekayo ukuze uthole isitifiketi sokugunyazwa kuqukethwe kumbhalo obizwa ngokuthi Imigomo Nemihlahlandlela Yabahlinzeki notholakala kuwebhusayithi ye-SAQA.
* Izimfuneko zokugunyazwa ziqukethwe encwadini enesihloko esithi Izidingo Nemihlahlandlela Yabahlinzeki futhi iyatholakala kuwebhusayithi ye-SAQA.
* Izidingo zokuqinisekiswa ziqukethwe kwidokhumenti elinesihloko esithi Imigomo Nezinkombandlela mayelana Nabahlinzeki futhi ziyatholakala kuwebhsaythi ye-SAQA.
* Okudingakalayo ukuze ugunyazwe kutholakala kusomqulu osihloko sawo sithi Izinkomba Nemihlahlandlela Yabahlinzeki kanti uyatholakala kuwebhusayithi yakwaSAQA.
* Izimfuneko zokugunyazwa ziqukethwe encwadini enesihloko esithi Izidingo Nemihlahlandlela Yabahlinzeki futhi iyatholakala kuwebhusayithi ye-SAQA.
* Izidingo zokuqinisekiswa ziqukethwe kwidokhumenti elinesihloko esithi Imigomo Nezinkombandlela mayelana Nabahlinzeki futhi ziyatholakala kuwebhsaythi ye-SAQA.
* Okudingakalayo ukuze ugunyazwe kutholakala kusomqulu osihloko sawo sithi Izinkomba Nemihlahlandlela Yabahlinzeki kanti uyatholakala kuwebhusayithi yakwaSAQA.
* Okudingekayo ukuze uthole isitifiketi sokugunyazwa kuqukethwe kumbhalo obizwa ngokuthi Imigomo Nemihlahlandlela Yabahlinzeki notholakala kuwebhusayithi ye-SAQA.
* Izidingo zokuqinisekiswa ziqukethwe kwidokhumenti elinesihloko esithi Imigomo Nezinkombandlela mayelana Nabahlinzeki futhi ziyatholakala kuwebhsaythi ye-SAQA.
* Okudingakalayo ukuze ugunyazwe kutholakala kusomqulu osihloko sawo sithi Izinkomba Nemihlahlandlela Yabahlinzeki kanti uyatholakala kuwebhusayithi yakwaSAQA.
* Okudingekayo ukuze uthole isitifiketi sokugunyazwa kuqukethwe kumbhalo obizwa ngokuthi Imigomo Nemihlahlandlela Yabahlinzeki notholakala kuwebhusayithi ye-SAQA.
* Izimfuneko zokugunyazwa ziqukethwe encwadini enesihloko esithi Izidingo Nemihlahlandlela Yabahlinzeki futhi iyatholakala kuwebhusayithi ye-SAQA.
* Okudingakalayo ukuze ugunyazwe kutholakala kusomqulu osihloko sawo sithi Izinkomba Nemihlahlandlela Yabahlinzeki kanti uyatholakala kuwebhusayithi yakwaSAQA.
* Okudingekayo ukuze uthole isitifiketi sokugunyazwa kuqukethwe kumbhalo obizwa ngokuthi Imigomo Nemihlahlandlela Yabahlinzeki notholakala kuwebhusayithi ye-SAQA.
* Izimfuneko zokugunyazwa ziqukethwe encwadini enesihloko esithi Izidingo Nemihlahlandlela Yabahlinzeki futhi iyatholakala kuwebhusayithi ye-SAQA.
* Izidingo zokuqinisekiswa ziqukethwe kwidokhumenti elinesihloko esithi Imigomo Nezinkombandlela mayelana Nabahlinzeki futhi ziyatholakala kuwebhsaythi ye-SAQA.
* Izinhlelo (kanye/noma ukuhlolwa) okuhlinzekwa ezemfundo nokuqeqesha kugcina ngokokuba izifundo ezisezingeni kanye/noma iziqu ezibhaliswe Ohlakeni Lweziqu Kuzwelonke (NQF).
* Izinhlelo (kanye/noma ukuhlolwa) ezinikezwa ngumhlinzeki wezemfundo noqeqesho zigcina sezingama-unit standards kanye/noma amaphepha emfundo abhaliswe oHlakeni Lwamaphepha Emfundo Lukazwelonke (NQF).
* Izinhlelo (kanye/noma ukuhlola) ezihlinzekwa ngumhlinzeki wezemfundo noqeqesho zigcina zingamayunithi standadi kanye/noma amakhwalifikheshini abhaliswe kuHlaka Lwamakhwalifikheshini Kuzwelonke (i-NQF).
* Izinhlelo (kanye/noma ukuhlolwa) okulethwa umhlinzeki kwezemfundo nokuqeqesha zivela njengezigaba zezifundo kanye/noma izitifikethi ezirejistwe kuHlaka Lokufundelwe Lukazwelonke (NQF).
* Izinhlelo (kanye/noma ukuhlolwa) ezinikezwa ngumhlinzeki wezemfundo noqeqesho zigcina sezingama-unit standards kanye/noma amaphepha emfundo abhaliswe oHlakeni Lwamaphepha Emfundo Lukazwelonke (NQF).
* Izinhlelo (kanye/noma ukuhlola) ezihlinzekwa ngumhlinzeki wezemfundo noqeqesho zigcina zingamayunithi standadi kanye/noma amakhwalifikheshini abhaliswe kuHlaka Lwamakhwalifikheshini Kuzwelonke (i-NQF).
* Izinhlelo (kanye/noma ukuhlolwa) okulethwa umhlinzeki kwezemfundo nokuqeqesha zivela njengezigaba zezifundo kanye/noma izitifikethi ezirejistwe kuHlaka Lokufundelwe Lukazwelonke (NQF).
* Izinhlelo (kanye/noma ukuhlolwa) okuhlinzekwa ezemfundo nokuqeqesha kugcina ngokokuba izifundo ezisezingeni kanye/noma iziqu ezibhaliswe Ohlakeni Lweziqu Kuzwelonke (NQF).
* Izinhlelo (kanye/noma ukuhlola) ezihlinzekwa ngumhlinzeki wezemfundo noqeqesho zigcina zingamayunithi standadi kanye/noma amakhwalifikheshini abhaliswe kuHlaka Lwamakhwalifikheshini Kuzwelonke (i-NQF).
* Izinhlelo (kanye/noma ukuhlolwa) okulethwa umhlinzeki kwezemfundo nokuqeqesha zivela njengezigaba zezifundo kanye/noma izitifikethi ezirejistwe kuHlaka Lokufundelwe Lukazwelonke (NQF).
* Izinhlelo (kanye/noma ukuhlolwa) okuhlinzekwa ezemfundo nokuqeqesha kugcina ngokokuba izifundo ezisezingeni kanye/noma iziqu ezibhaliswe Ohlakeni Lweziqu Kuzwelonke (NQF).
* Izinhlelo (kanye/noma ukuhlolwa) ezinikezwa ngumhlinzeki wezemfundo noqeqesho zigcina sezingama-unit standards kanye/noma amaphepha emfundo abhaliswe oHlakeni Lwamaphepha Emfundo Lukazwelonke (NQF).
* Izinhlelo (kanye/noma ukuhlolwa) okulethwa umhlinzeki kwezemfundo nokuqeqesha zivela njengezigaba zezifundo kanye/noma izitifikethi ezirejistwe kuHlaka Lokufundelwe Lukazwelonke (NQF).
* Izinhlelo (kanye/noma ukuhlolwa) okuhlinzekwa ezemfundo nokuqeqesha kugcina ngokokuba izifundo ezisezingeni kanye/noma iziqu ezibhaliswe Ohlakeni Lweziqu Kuzwelonke (NQF).
* Izinhlelo (kanye/noma ukuhlolwa) ezinikezwa ngumhlinzeki wezemfundo noqeqesho zigcina sezingama-unit standards kanye/noma amaphepha emfundo abhaliswe oHlakeni Lwamaphepha Emfundo Lukazwelonke (NQF).
* Izinhlelo (kanye/noma ukuhlola) ezihlinzekwa ngumhlinzeki wezemfundo noqeqesho zigcina zingamayunithi standadi kanye/noma amakhwalifikheshini abhaliswe kuHlaka Lwamakhwalifikheshini Kuzwelonke (i-NQF).
* Uhlelo lwezifundo (umumo, okuqukethwe kanye nezinsiza zokufunda) luhambisana namazinga emfundo kanye/noma neziqu.
* Uhlelo lwezifundo (umklamo, okuphakathi kanye nezinto zokufunda) lwenziwa luhambisane nezimiso zezifundo kanye/noma amaphepha emfundo.
* Uhlelo lwezifundo (idizayini, okuqukethwe nezinto zokufunda) luhambisana namastandadi amayunithi kanye/noma amakhwalifikheshini.
* Umthamo wokufundwayo (isakhiwo sawo, okumumethwe nokusetshenziswa makufundwa) kuhambisana  nezigaba zezifundo kanye/noma izitifikethi.
* Uhlelo lwezifundo (umklamo, okuphakathi kanye nezinto zokufunda) lwenziwa luhambisane nezimiso zezifundo kanye/noma amaphepha emfundo.
* Uhlelo lwezifundo (idizayini, okuqukethwe nezinto zokufunda) luhambisana namastandadi amayunithi kanye/noma amakhwalifikheshini.
* Umthamo wokufundwayo (isakhiwo sawo, okumumethwe nokusetshenziswa makufundwa) kuhambisana  nezigaba zezifundo kanye/noma izitifikethi.
* Uhlelo lwezifundo (umumo, okuqukethwe kanye nezinsiza zokufunda) luhambisana namazinga emfundo kanye/noma neziqu.
* Uhlelo lwezifundo (idizayini, okuqukethwe nezinto zokufunda) luhambisana namastandadi amayunithi kanye/noma amakhwalifikheshini.
* Umthamo wokufundwayo (isakhiwo sawo, okumumethwe nokusetshenziswa makufundwa) kuhambisana  nezigaba zezifundo kanye/noma izitifikethi.
* Uhlelo lwezifundo (umumo, okuqukethwe kanye nezinsiza zokufunda) luhambisana namazinga emfundo kanye/noma neziqu.
* Uhlelo lwezifundo (umklamo, okuphakathi kanye nezinto zokufunda) lwenziwa luhambisane nezimiso zezifundo kanye/noma amaphepha emfundo.
* Umthamo wokufundwayo (isakhiwo sawo, okumumethwe nokusetshenziswa makufundwa) kuhambisana  nezigaba zezifundo kanye/noma izitifikethi.
* Uhlelo lwezifundo (umumo, okuqukethwe kanye nezinsiza zokufunda) luhambisana namazinga emfundo kanye/noma neziqu.
* Uhlelo lwezifundo (umklamo, okuphakathi kanye nezinto zokufunda) lwenziwa luhambisane nezimiso zezifundo kanye/noma amaphepha emfundo.
* Uhlelo lwezifundo (idizayini, okuqukethwe nezinto zokufunda) luhambisana namastandadi amayunithi kanye/noma amakhwalifikheshini.
* Kukhona abasebenzi abafanele nabaqeqeshiwe (ababheki babafundi kanye nabahloli ababhalisiwe).
* Kunabasebenzi abanamaphepha emfundi abafaneleka kahle (abafundisayo nabahlolayo ababhalisiwe).
* Kunabasebenzi abafanele nabakufundele lokho (amafasilitheytha nama-asesa abhalisiwe).
* Kukhona abasebenzi abaqeqeshwe ngokufanele (abasizi nabahloli ababhalisiwe).
* Kunabasebenzi abanamaphepha emfundi abafaneleka kahle (abafundisayo nabahlolayo ababhalisiwe).
* Kunabasebenzi abafanele nabakufundele lokho (amafasilitheytha nama-asesa abhalisiwe).
* Kukhona abasebenzi abaqeqeshwe ngokufanele (abasizi nabahloli ababhalisiwe).
* Kukhona abasebenzi abafanele nabaqeqeshiwe (ababheki babafundi kanye nabahloli ababhalisiwe).
* Kunabasebenzi abafanele nabakufundele lokho (amafasilitheytha nama-asesa abhalisiwe).
* Kukhona abasebenzi abaqeqeshwe ngokufanele (abasizi nabahloli ababhalisiwe).
* Kukhona abasebenzi abafanele nabaqeqeshiwe (ababheki babafundi kanye nabahloli ababhalisiwe).
* Kunabasebenzi abanamaphepha emfundi abafaneleka kahle (abafundisayo nabahlolayo ababhalisiwe).
* Kukhona abasebenzi abaqeqeshwe ngokufanele (abasizi nabahloli ababhalisiwe).
* Kukhona abasebenzi abafanele nabaqeqeshiwe (ababheki babafundi kanye nabahloli ababhalisiwe).
* Kunabasebenzi abanamaphepha emfundi abafaneleka kahle (abafundisayo nabahlolayo ababhalisiwe).
* Kunabasebenzi abafanele nabakufundele lokho (amafasilitheytha nama-asesa abhalisiwe).
* Abafundi bakwazi ukuthola ukwesekwa kwezemfundo okufanele.
* Abafundi bakwazi ukuthola amasevisi anele okusekelwa ngokufunda.
* Abafundi bayakwazi ukufinyelela kumasevisi enele amayelana nokwesekwa ekufundeni.
* Abafundi bayafinyelela ekwesekweni nezifundo abazenzayo.
* Abafundi bakwazi ukuthola amasevisi anele okusekelwa ngokufunda.
* Abafundi bayakwazi ukufinyelela kumasevisi enele amayelana nokwesekwa ekufundeni.
* Abafundi bayafinyelela ekwesekweni nezifundo abazenzayo.
* Abafundi bakwazi ukuthola ukwesekwa kwezemfundo okufanele.
* Abafundi bayakwazi ukufinyelela kumasevisi enele amayelana nokwesekwa ekufundeni.
* Abafundi bayafinyelela ekwesekweni nezifundo abazenzayo.
* Abafundi bakwazi ukuthola ukwesekwa kwezemfundo okufanele.
* Abafundi bakwazi ukuthola amasevisi anele okusekelwa ngokufunda.
* Abafundi bayafinyelela ekwesekweni nezifundo abazenzayo.
* Abafundi bakwazi ukuthola ukwesekwa kwezemfundo okufanele.
* Abafundi bakwazi ukuthola amasevisi anele okusekelwa ngokufunda.
* Abafundi bayakwazi ukufinyelela kumasevisi enele amayelana nokwesekwa ekufundeni.
* Izindlela zokuhlola kanye nezinsiza ezisetshenziselwa ukulinganisa izidingo zamazinga ezifundo kanye/noma iziqu kulungile, kufanelekile futhi kungathenjwa, futhi kusetshenziselwa ukuthuthukisa ukufunda.
* Izindlela zokuhlola namathuluzi asetshenziswa ukukala izimfuneko zezimiso zezifundo kanye/noma iphepha lemfundo zikahle, ziyasebenza futhi zinokwethenjwa, futhi zisetshenziselwa ukuthuthukisa ukufunda.
* Izindlela zokuhlola kanye namathuluzi asetshenziselwa ukukala izidingo zeyunithi standadi kanye/noma ikhwalifikheshini ukuthi zikahle, sisemthethweni futhi zithembekile, futhi zisetshenziselwa ukwenza ngcono ukufunda.
* Izindlela zokuhlola namathuluzi asetshenziswa ukukala izimiso ezidingekayo mayelana nezigaba zezifundo kanye/noma izitifikethi kunobulungiswa, kuyiko futhi kuthembekile, futhi kusetshenziselwa ukulekelela ukufunda.
* Izindlela zokuhlola namathuluzi asetshenziswa ukukala izimfuneko zezimiso zezifundo kanye/noma iphepha lemfundo zikahle, ziyasebenza futhi zinokwethenjwa, futhi zisetshenziselwa ukuthuthukisa ukufunda.

* Thumela incwadi eveza inhloso yakho yokuthola isitifiketi sokugunyazwa njengomhlinzeki wezemfundo nokuqeqesha ku-ETQA efanele.
* Thumela incwadi ebonisa inhloso yakho yokuba ugunyazwe njengomhlinzeki wezemfundo noqeqesho ku-ETQA efanele.

* Uma unganikezwanga isitifiketi sokugunyazwa futhi ubona ukuthi inqubo yenziwe ngokungafanele, unelungelo lokufaka isikhalo.
* Uma unganikezwa isigunyazo futhi unomuzwa wokuthi inqubo ayibanga nokulunga, unelungelo lokudlulisa isinqumo.
* Uma kwenqatshiwe ukuqinisekiswa futhi ubona sengathi inqubo beyichemile, unelungelo lokufaka isicelo sokubuyekezwa kwesinqumo.
* Uma singaphumelelanga isicelo sakho sokufuna ukugunyazwa kepha ubona sengathi udaba lwakho alubhekwanga ngobulungiswa, unelungelo lokuludlulisa udaba.
* Uma unganikezwa isigunyazo futhi unomuzwa wokuthi inqubo ayibanga nokulunga, unelungelo lokudlulisa isinqumo.
* Uma kwenqatshiwe ukuqinisekiswa futhi ubona sengathi inqubo beyichemile, unelungelo lokufaka isicelo sokubuyekezwa kwesinqumo.

* Uhlu lwama-ETQA kanye nemininingwane yokuxhumana kutholakala kuwebhusayithi ye-SAQA.
* Uhlu lwama-ETQA nemininingwane yokuthintana kuyatholakala kuwebhusayithi ye-SAQA.
* Uhla lwama-ETQA kanye nemininingwane yokuxhumana kuyatholakala kuwebhsaythi ye-SAQA.
* Uhla lwama-ETQA kanye nemininingwane yokuwathinta luyatholakala kuwebhusayithi yakwa-SAQA.
* Uhlu lwama-ETQA nemininingwane yokuthintana kuyatholakala kuwebhusayithi ye-SAQA.
* Uhla lwama-ETQA kanye nemininingwane yokuxhumana kuyatholakala kuwebhsaythi ye-SAQA.
* Uhla lwama-ETQA kanye nemininingwane yokuwathinta luyatholakala kuwebhusayithi yakwa-SAQA.
* Uhlu lwama-ETQA kanye nemininingwane yokuxhumana kutholakala kuwebhusayithi ye-SAQA.
* Uhla lwama-ETQA kanye nemininingwane yokuxhumana kuyatholakala kuwebhsaythi ye-SAQA.
* Uhla lwama-ETQA kanye nemininingwane yokuwathinta luyatholakala kuwebhusayithi yakwa-SAQA.
* Uhlu lwama-ETQA kanye nemininingwane yokuxhumana kutholakala kuwebhusayithi ye-SAQA.
* Uhlu lwama-ETQA nemininingwane yokuthintana kuyatholakala kuwebhusayithi ye-SAQA.
* Uhla lwama-ETQA kanye nemininingwane yokuwathinta luyatholakala kuwebhusayithi yakwa-SAQA.
* Uhlu lwama-ETQA kanye nemininingwane yokuxhumana kutholakala kuwebhusayithi ye-SAQA.
* Uhlu lwama-ETQA nemininingwane yokuthintana kuyatholakala kuwebhusayithi ye-SAQA.
* Uhla lwama-ETQA kanye nemininingwane yokuxhumana kuyatholakala kuwebhsaythi ye-SAQA.

Kungase kuthathe inkathi efika ezinyangeni ezingu-6.
Kungathatha ukufikela ezinyangeni eziyisi-6.
Kungaze kuphele izinyanga eziyi-6.

Kungathatha ukufikela ezinyangeni eziyisi-6.

Kunamafomu okumele agcwaliswe
Amafomu omhlinzeki okufaka isicelo sesitifiketi sokugunyazwa kanye nemibhalo ehambisana nawo kungatholakala ku-ETQA efanele.
Amafomu okufaka izicelo zokugunyazwa ukuba ngumhlizeki kanye namanye amaphepha ahambisana nawo angase atholwe e-ETQA efanele.
Amafomu okufaka isicelo sokuqinisekiswa njengomhlinzeki kanye namanye amadokhumenti ahambisana nalokhu kungatholakala kuleyo ETQA efanele.
Amafomu okufaka isicelo sokugunyazwa oMhlinzeki nezinye izincwadi kuyatholakala ku-ETQA eqondene.
Amafomu okufaka izicelo zokugunyazwa ukuba ngumhlizeki kanye namanye amaphepha ahambisana nawo angase atholwe e-ETQA efanele.
